GE07mbh_06_u:72: 06,001.029a rathī ca rathinā yodhyo gajena gajadhūrgataḥ

GE07mbh_06_u:76: 06,001.031a pareṇa saha saṃyuktaḥ pramatto vimukhas tathā

GE07mbh_06_u:82: 06,001.034a niviśya ca mahātmānas tatas te puruṣarṣabhāḥ
GE07mbh_06_u:85: 06,002.001a tataḥ pūrvāpare saṃdhye samīkṣya bhagavān ṛṣiḥ
GE07mbh_06_u:89: 06,002.003a vaicitravīryaṃ rājānaṃ sa rahasyaṃ bravīd idam
GE07mbh_06_u:90: 06,002.003c śocantam ārtaṃ dhyāyantaṃ putrāṇām anayaṃ tadā
GE07mbh_06_u:92: 06,002.004a rājan parītakālās te putrāś cānye ca bhūmipāḥ
GE07mbh_06_u:95: 06,002.005c kālaparyāyam ājñāya mā sma śoke manaḥ kṛthāḥ
GE07mbh_06_u:96: 06,002.006a yadi tv icchasi saṃgrāme draṣṭum enaṃ viśāṃ pate

GE07mbh_06_u:102: 06,002.008a tasminn anicchati draṣṭuṃ saṃgrāmaṃ śrotum icchati
GE07mbh_06_u:103: 06,002.008c varāṇām īśvaro dātā saṃjayāya varaṃ dadau

GE07mbh_06_u:108: 06,002.010c kathayiṣyati te yuddhaṃ sarvajñaś ca bhaviṣyati
GE07mbh_06_u:109: 06,002.011a prakāśaṃ vā rahasyaṃ vā rātrau vā yadi vā divā
GE07mbh_06_u:110: 06,002.011c manasā cintitam api sarvaṃ vetsyati saṃjayaḥ

GE07mbh_06_u:118: 06,002.015a evam uktvā sa bhagavān kurūṇāṃ prapitāmahaḥ
GE07mbh_06_u:119: 06,002.015c punar eva mahābāhuṃ dhṛtarāṣṭram uvāca ha

GE07mbh_06_u:122: 06,002.017a śyenā gṛdhrāś ca kākāś ca kaṅkāś ca sahitā balaiḥ
GE07mbh_06_u:124: 06,002.018a atyugraṃ ca prapaśyanti yuddham ānandino dvijāḥ

GE07mbh_06_u:146: 06,002.028a kokilāḥ śatapatrāś ca cāṣā bhāsāḥ śukās tathā
GE07mbh_06_u:147: 06,002.028c sārasāś ca mayūrāś ca vāco muñcanti dāruṇāḥ

GE07mbh_06_u:159: 06,003.001a kharā goṣu prajāyante ramante mātṛbhiḥ sutāḥ
GE07mbh_06_u:162: 06,003.002c kravyādān pakṣiṇaś caiva gomāyūn aparān mṛgān

GE07mbh_06_u:167: 06,003.005a tathaivānyāś ca dṛśyante striyaś ca brahmavādinām
GE07mbh_06_u:168: 06,003.005c vainateyān mayūrāṃś ca janayantyaḥ pure tava
GE07mbh_06_u:169: 06,003.006a govatsaṃ vaḍavā sūte śvā sṛgālaṃ mahīpate
GE07mbh_06_u:171: 06,003.007a striyaḥ kāś cit prajāyante catasraḥ pañca kanyakāḥ

GE07mbh_06_u:180: 06,003.011a abhīkṣṇaṃ kampate bhūmir arkaṃ rāhus tathāgrasat
GE07mbh_06_u:181: 06,003.011c śveto grahas tathā citrāṃ samatikramya tiṣṭhati
GE07mbh_06_u:185: 06,003.013c maghāsv aṅgārako vakraḥ śravaṇe ca bṛhaspatiḥ
GE07mbh_06_u:187: 06,003.014c śukraḥ proṣṭhapade pūrve samāruhya viśāṃ pate
GE07mbh_06_u:190: 06,003.015c aindraṃ tejasvi nakṣatraṃ jyeṣṭhām ākramya tiṣṭhati
GE07mbh_06_u:192: 06,003.016b*0010_01 rohiṇīṃ pīḍayaty evam ubhau ca śaśibhāskarau
GE07mbh_06_u:197: 06,003.018c pañcaśīrṣā yavāś caiva śataśīrṣāś ca śālayaḥ
GE07mbh_06_u:198: 06,003.019a pradhānāḥ sarvalokasya yāsv āyattam idaṃ jagat
GE07mbh_06_u:199: 06,003.019c tā gāvaḥ prasnutā vatsaiḥ śoṇitaṃ prakṣaranty uta

GE07mbh_06_u:238: 06,003.037a vṛkṣān unmathya vānty ugrā vātāḥ śarkarakarṣiṇaḥ
GE07mbh_06_u:240: 06,003.037c patanti caityavṛkṣāś ca grāmeṣu nagareṣu ca

GE07mbh_06_u:244: 06,003.039a dhūmāyante dhvajā rājñāṃ kampamānā muhur muhuḥ

GE07mbh_06_u:258: 06,003.043a etac chrutvā bhavān atra prāptakālaṃ vyavasyatām
GE07mbh_06_u:259: 06,003.043c yathā lokaḥ samucchedaṃ nāyaṃ gaccheta bhārata
GE07mbh_06_u:262: 06,003.044c diṣṭam etat purā manye bhaviṣyati na saṃśayaḥ
GE07mbh_06_u:265: 06,003.046a iha kīrtiṃ pare loke dīrghakālaṃ mahat sukham
GE07mbh_06_u:268: 06,004.001a evam ukto munis tattvaṃ kavīndro rājasattama
GE07mbh_06_u:272: 06,004.003a sṛjate ca punar lokān neha vidyati śāśvatam
GE07mbh_06_u:273: 06,004.003c jñātīnāṃ ca kurūṇāṃ ca saṃbandhisuhṛdāṃ tathā
GE07mbh_06_u:274: 06,004.004a dharmyaṃ deśaya panthānaṃ samartho hy asi vāraṇe
GE07mbh_06_u:275: 06,004.004c kṣudraṃ jñātivadhaṃ prāhur mā kuruṣva mamāpriyam
GE07mbh_06_u:276: 06,004.005a kālo 'yaṃ putrarūpeṇa tava jāto viśāṃ pate
GE07mbh_06_u:277: 06,004.005c na vadhaḥ pūjyate vede hitaṃ naitat kathaṃ cana
GE07mbh_06_u:278: 06,004.006a hanyāt sa eva yo hanyāt kuladharmaṃ svakāṃ tanum
GE07mbh_06_u:282: 06,004.008a luptaprajñaḥ pareṇāsi dharmaṃ darśaya vai sutān
GE07mbh_06_u:283: 06,004.008c kiṃ te rājyena durdharṣa yena prāpto 'si kilbiṣam
GE07mbh_06_u:284: 06,004.009a yaśo dharmaṃ ca kīrtiṃ ca pālayan svargam āpsyasi
GE07mbh_06_u:285: 06,004.009c labhantāṃ pāṇḍavā rājyaṃ śamaṃ gacchantu kauravāḥ
GE07mbh_06_u:286: 06,004.009d*0016_01 yudhiṣṭhiraṃ ca bhīmaṃ ca vārayiṣyāmi saṃyuge
GE07mbh_06_u:288: 06,004.010c ākṣipya vākyaṃ vākyajño vākpathenāpy ayāt punaḥ
GE07mbh_06_u:290: 06,004.011a yathā bhavān veda tathāsmi vettā; bhāvābhāvau viditau me yathāvat
GE07mbh_06_u:291: 06,004.011c svārthe hi saṃmuhyati tāta loko; māṃ cāpi lokātmakam eva viddhi
GE07mbh_06_u:292: 06,004.012a prasādaye tvām atulaprabhāvaṃ; tvaṃ no gatir darśayitā ca dhīraḥ
GE07mbh_06_u:293: 06,004.012c na cāpi te vaśagā me maharṣe; na kalmaṣaṃ kartum ihārhase mām
GE07mbh_06_u:294: 06,004.013a tvaṃ hi dharmaḥ pavitraṃ ca yaśaḥ kīrtir dhṛtiḥ smṛtiḥ
GE07mbh_06_u:295: 06,004.013c kurūṇāṃ pāṇḍavānāṃ ca mānyaś cāsi pitāmahaḥ
GE07mbh_06_u:296: 06,004.013d*0017_01 kuruṣva kāryaṃ yat satyaṃ tvatto mānyo na vidyate
GE07mbh_06_u:298: 06,004.014a vaicitravīrya nṛpate yat te manasi vartate
GE07mbh_06_u:302: 06,004.015c tāni sarvāṇi bhagavañ śrotum icchāmi tattvataḥ
GE07mbh_06_u:305: 06,004.016c puṇyā gandhāś cāhutīnāṃ pravānti; jayasyaitad bhāvino rūpam āhuḥ
GE07mbh_06_u:306: 06,004.017a gambhīraghoṣāś ca mahāsvanāś ca; śaṅkhā mṛdaṅgāś ca nadanti yatra
GE07mbh_06_u:307: 06,004.017c viśuddharaśmis tapanaḥ śaśī ca; jayasyaitad bhāvino rūpam āhuḥ
GE07mbh_06_u:308: 06,004.018a iṣṭā vācaḥ pṛṣṭhato vāyasānāṃ; saṃprasthitānāṃ ca gamiṣyatāṃ ca
GE07mbh_06_u:309: 06,004.018c ye pṛṣṭhatas te tvarayanti rājan; ye tv agratas te pratiṣedhayanti
GE07mbh_06_u:310: 06,004.019a kalyāṇavācaḥ śakunā rājahaṃsāḥ; śukāḥ krauñcāḥ śatapatrāś ca yatra
GE07mbh_06_u:311: 06,004.019c pradakṣiṇāś caiva bhavanti saṃkhye; dhruvaṃ jayaṃ tatra vadanti viprāḥ
GE07mbh_06_u:312: 06,004.020a alaṃkāraiḥ kavacaiḥ ketubhiś ca; mukhaprasādair hemavarṇaiś ca nṝṇām
GE07mbh_06_u:313: 06,004.020c bhrājiṣmatī duṣpratiprekṣaṇīyā; yeṣāṃ camūs te vijayanti śatrūn
GE07mbh_06_u:314: 06,004.021a hṛṣṭā vācas tathā sattvaṃ yodhānāṃ yatra bhārata
GE07mbh_06_u:315: 06,004.021c na mlāyante srajaś caiva te taranti raṇe ripūn
GE07mbh_06_u:319: 06,004.023c sadā yodhāś ca hṛṣṭāś ca yeṣāṃ teṣāṃ dhruvaṃ jayaḥ
GE07mbh_06_u:320: 06,004.024a anv eva vāyavo vānti tathābhrāṇi vayāṃsi ca
GE07mbh_06_u:324: 06,004.026a alpāyāṃ vā mahatyāṃ vā senāyām iti niścitam
GE07mbh_06_u:326: 06,004.027a eko dīrṇo dārayati senāṃ sumahatīm api
GE07mbh_06_u:327: 06,004.027c taṃ dīrṇam anudīryante yodhāḥ śūratamā api
GE07mbh_06_u:329: 06,004.028c apām iva mahāvegas trastā mṛgagaṇā iva
GE07mbh_06_u:331: 06,004.029c dīrṇā ity eva dīryante yodhāḥ śūratamā api
GE07mbh_06_u:332: 06,004.029e bhītān bhagnāṃś ca saṃprekṣya bhayaṃ bhūyo vivardhate
GE07mbh_06_u:333: 06,004.030a prabhagnā sahasā rājan diśo vibhrāmitā paraiḥ
GE07mbh_06_u:334: 06,004.030c naiva sthāpayituṃ śakyā śūrair api mahācamūḥ
GE07mbh_06_u:336: 06,004.031b*0018_01 śaknoti na samādhātuṃ dīrṇām indrasamo yudhi
GE07mbh_06_u:339: 06,004.032c jaghanya eṣa vijayo yo yuddhena viśāṃ pate
GE07mbh_06_u:340: 06,004.032e mahādoṣaḥ saṃnipātas tato vyaṅgaḥ sa ucyate
GE07mbh_06_u:344: 06,004.033c pañcāśad api ye śūrā mathnanti mahatīṃ camūm
GE07mbh_06_u:345: 06,004.033e atha vā pañca ṣaṭ sapta vijayanty anivartinaḥ
GE07mbh_06_u:348: 06,004.035a na bāhulyena senāyā jayo bhavati bhārata
GE07mbh_06_u:349: 06,004.035c adhruvo hi jayo nāma daivaṃ cātra parāyaṇam
GE07mbh_06_u:350: 06,004.035e jayanto hy api saṃgrāme kṣayavanto bhavanty uta
GE07mbh_06_u:352: 06,005.001a evam uktvā yayau vyāso dhṛtarāṣṭrāya dhīmate
GE07mbh_06_u:354: 06,005.002a sa muhūrtam iva dhyātvā viniḥśvasya muhur muhuḥ
GE07mbh_06_u:359: 06,005.004c na ca śāmyanti nighnanto vardhayanto yamakṣayam
GE07mbh_06_u:360: 06,005.005a bhaumam aiśvaryam icchanto na mṛṣyante parasparam
GE07mbh_06_u:361: 06,005.005c manye bahuguṇā bhūmis tan mamācakṣva saṃjaya
GE07mbh_06_u:362: 06,005.006a bahūni ca sahasrāṇi prayutāny arbudāni ca
GE07mbh_06_u:364: 06,005.007a deśānāṃ ca parīmāṇaṃ nagarāṇāṃ ca saṃjaya
GE07mbh_06_u:365: 06,005.007c śrotum icchāmi tattvena yata ete samāgatāḥ
GE07mbh_06_u:369: 06,005.009a yathāprajñaṃ mahāprājña bhaumān vakṣyāmi te guṇān
GE07mbh_06_u:373: 06,005.011a trasānāṃ khalu sarveṣāṃ śreṣṭhā rājañ jarāyujāḥ
GE07mbh_06_u:374: 06,005.011c jarāyujānāṃ pravarā mānavāḥ paśavaś ca ye
GE07mbh_06_u:378: 06,005.013c ṛkṣāś ca vānarāś caiva saptāraṇyāḥ smṛtā nṛpa
GE07mbh_06_u:380: 06,005.014c ete grāmyāḥ samākhyātāḥ paśavaḥ sapta sādhubhiḥ
GE07mbh_06_u:381: 06,005.015a ete vai paśavo rājan grāmyāraṇyāś caturdaśa
GE07mbh_06_u:385: 06,005.017a udbhijjāḥ sthāvarāḥ proktās teṣāṃ pañcaiva jātayaḥ
GE07mbh_06_u:389: 06,005.019a ya etāṃ veda gāyatrīṃ puṇyāṃ sarvaguṇānvitām
GE07mbh_06_u:390: 06,005.019c tattvena bharataśreṣṭha sa lokān na praṇaśyati
GE07mbh_06_u:391: 06,005.020a bhūmau hi jāyate sarvaṃ bhūmau sarvaṃ praṇaśyati
GE07mbh_06_u:392: 06,005.020c bhūmiḥ pratiṣṭhā bhūtānāṃ bhūmir eva parāyaṇam
GE07mbh_06_u:393: 06,005.021a yasya bhūmis tasya sarvaṃ jagat sthāvarajaṅgamam
GE07mbh_06_u:397: 06,006.001c tathā janapadānāṃ ca ye cānye bhūmim āśritāḥ
GE07mbh_06_u:398: 06,006.002a pramāṇaṃ ca pramāṇajña pṛthivyā api sarvaśaḥ
GE07mbh_06_u:402: 06,006.003c jagat sthitāni sarvāṇi samāny āhur manīṣiṇaḥ
GE07mbh_06_u:403: 06,006.004a bhūmir āpas tathā vāyur agnir ākāśam eva ca
GE07mbh_06_u:405: 06,006.005a śabdaḥ sparśaś ca rūpaṃ ca raso gandhaś ca pañcamaḥ
GE07mbh_06_u:406: 06,006.005c bhūmer ete guṇāḥ proktā ṛṣibhis tattvavedibhiḥ
GE07mbh_06_u:407: 06,006.005d*0020_01 śabdaḥ sparśaś ca rūpaṃ ca rasaś cāpi prakīrtitāḥ
GE07mbh_06_u:408: 06,006.006a catvāro 'psu guṇā rājan gandhas tatra na vidyate
GE07mbh_06_u:409: 06,006.006c śabdaḥ sparśaś ca rūpaṃ ca tejaso 'tha guṇās trayaḥ
GE07mbh_06_u:410: 06,006.006e śabdaḥ sparśaś ca vāyos tu ākāśe śabda eva ca
GE07mbh_06_u:411: 06,006.007a ete pañca guṇā rājan mahābhūteṣu pañcasu
GE07mbh_06_u:413: 06,006.008a anyonyaṃ nābhivartante sāmyaṃ bhavati vai yadā
GE07mbh_06_u:416: 06,006.008f*0021_01 bhāvaṃ na ca bhajantas te nāśaṃ gacchanti nānyathā
GE07mbh_06_u:418: 06,006.009c sarvāṇy aparimeyāni tad eṣāṃ rūpam aiśvaram
GE07mbh_06_u:419: 06,006.010a tatra tatra hi dṛśyante dhātavaḥ pāñcabhautikāḥ
GE07mbh_06_u:421: 06,006.011a acintyāḥ khalu ye bhāvā na tāṃs tarkeṇa sādhayet
GE07mbh_06_u:422: 06,006.011c prakṛtibhyaḥ paraṃ yat tu tad acintyasya lakṣaṇam
GE07mbh_06_u:426: 06,006.013c puraiś ca vividhākārai ramyair janapadais tathā
GE07mbh_06_u:429: 06,006.015a yathā ca puruṣaḥ paśyed ādarśe mukham ātmanaḥ
GE07mbh_06_u:431: 06,006.016a dvir aṃśe pippalas tatra dvir aṃśe ca śaśo mahān
GE07mbh_06_u:433: 06,006.016e āpas tato 'nyā vijñeyā eṣa saṃkṣepa ucyate
GE07mbh_06_u:434: 06,006.016f*0022_01 tato 'nya ucyate cāyam enaṃ saṃkṣepataḥ śṛṇu
GE07mbh_06_u:436: 06,007.001a ukto dvīpasya saṃkṣepo vistaraṃ brūhi saṃjaya
GE07mbh_06_u:440: 06,007.001e tasya pramāṇaṃ prabrūhi tato vakṣyasi pippalam
GE07mbh_06_u:442: 06,007.002a evam uktaḥ sa rājñā tu saṃjayo vākyam abravīt
GE07mbh_06_u:444: 06,007.002d*0024_01 sthitā samudram ākramya avarūḍhā bhavaṃs tataḥ
GE07mbh_06_u:446: 06,007.003a himavān hemakūṭaś ca niṣadhaś ca nagottamaḥ
GE07mbh_06_u:447: 06,007.003c nīlaś ca vaiḍūryamayaḥ śvetaś ca rajataprabhaḥ
GE07mbh_06_u:451: 06,007.005a tatra puṇyā janapadās tāni varṣāṇi bhārata
GE07mbh_06_u:454: 06,007.006a idaṃ tu bhārataṃ varṣaṃ tato haimavataṃ param
GE07mbh_06_u:465: 06,007.010c ūrdhvam antaś ca tiryak ca lokān āvṛtya tiṣṭhati
GE07mbh_06_u:466: 06,007.011a tasya pārśve tv ime dvīpāś catvāraḥ saṃsthitāḥ prabho
GE07mbh_06_u:467: 06,007.011c bhadrāśvaḥ ketumālaś ca jambūdvīpaś ca bhārata
GE07mbh_06_u:468: 06,007.011d*0028_01 ketumālaś caturthaś ca meroḥ paścimataḥ sthitaḥ
GE07mbh_06_u:471: 06,007.012c sa vai vicintayām āsa sauvarṇān prekṣya vāyasān
GE07mbh_06_u:473: 06,007.013c aviśeṣakaro yasmāt tasmād enaṃ tyajāmy aham
GE07mbh_06_u:475: 06,007.014c candramāś ca sanakṣatro vāyuś caiva pradakṣiṇam
GE07mbh_06_u:480: 06,007.017a tatra brahmā ca rudraś ca śakraś cāpi sureśvaraḥ
GE07mbh_06_u:482: 06,007.018a tumburur nāradaś caiva viśvāvasur hahā huhūḥ
GE07mbh_06_u:485: 06,007.019c tatra gacchanti bhadraṃ te sadā parvaṇi parvaṇi
GE07mbh_06_u:486: 06,007.020a tasyaiva mūrdhany uśanāḥ kāvyo daityair mahīpate
GE07mbh_06_u:488: 06,007.021a tasmāt kubero bhagavāṃś caturthaṃ bhāgam aśnute
GE07mbh_06_u:492: 06,007.023a tatra sākṣāt paśupatir divyair bhūtaiḥ samāvṛtaḥ
GE07mbh_06_u:495: 06,007.024c tribhir netraiḥ kṛtoddyotas tribhiḥ sūryair ivoditaiḥ
GE07mbh_06_u:497: 06,007.025c paśyanti na hi durvṛttaiḥ śakyo draṣṭuṃ maheśvaraḥ
GE07mbh_06_u:500: 06,007.027a puṇyā puṇyatamair juṣṭā gaṅgā bhāgīrathī śubhā
GE07mbh_06_u:502: 06,007.027e tayā hy utpāditaḥ puṇyaḥ sa hradaḥ sāgaropamaḥ
GE07mbh_06_u:503: 06,007.028a tāṃ dhārayām āsa purā durdharāṃ parvatair api
GE07mbh_06_u:505: 06,007.029a meros tu paścime pārśve ketumālo mahīpate
GE07mbh_06_u:507: 06,007.030a āyur daśa sahasrāṇi varṣāṇāṃ tatra bhārata
GE07mbh_06_u:516: 06,007.034a tatra kṛṣṇā narā rājaṃs tejoyuktā mahābalāḥ
GE07mbh_06_u:518: 06,007.035a nīlāt parataraṃ śvetaṃ śvetād dhairaṇyakaṃ param
GE07mbh_06_u:519: 06,007.035b*0030_01 hiraṇmayaṃ ca śvetādreḥ paraṃ varṣaṃ narādhipa
GE07mbh_06_u:520: 06,007.035b*0030_02 kuruvarṣaṃ tato rājañ śṛṅgavat parvatāt param
GE07mbh_06_u:521: 06,007.035c varṣam airāvataṃ nāma tataḥ śṛṅgavataḥ param
GE07mbh_06_u:523: 06,007.036c ilāvṛtaṃ madhyamaṃ tu pañca varṣāṇi caiva ha
GE07mbh_06_u:527: 06,007.038c evam eṣā mahārāja parvataiḥ pṛthivī citā
GE07mbh_06_u:528: 06,007.039a hemakūṭas tu sumahān kailāso nāma parvataḥ
GE07mbh_06_u:529: 06,007.039c yatra vaiśravaṇo rājā guhyakaiḥ saha modate
GE07mbh_06_u:530: 06,007.039d*0031_01 tatra devo mahādevo nityam āste sahomayā
GE07mbh_06_u:532: 06,007.040a asty uttareṇa kailāsaṃ mainākaṃ parvataṃ prati
GE07mbh_06_u:534: 06,007.041a tasya pārśve mahad divyaṃ śubhaṃ kāñcanavālukam
GE07mbh_06_u:535: 06,007.041c ramyaṃ bindusaro nāma yatra rājā bhagīrathaḥ
GE07mbh_06_u:536: 06,007.041e dṛṣṭvā bhāgīrathīṃ gaṅgām uvāsa bahulāḥ samāḥ
GE07mbh_06_u:537: 06,007.042a yūpā maṇimayās tatra cityāś cāpi hiraṇmayāḥ
GE07mbh_06_u:538: 06,007.042c tatreṣṭvā tu gataḥ siddhiṃ sahasrākṣo mahāyaśāḥ
GE07mbh_06_u:541: 06,007.043e naranārāyaṇau brahmā manuḥ sthāṇuś ca pañcamaḥ
GE07mbh_06_u:542: 06,007.044a tatra tripathagā devī prathamaṃ tu pratiṣṭhitā
GE07mbh_06_u:545: 06,007.045c jambūnadī ca sītā ca gaṅgā sindhuś ca saptamī
GE07mbh_06_u:548: 06,007.047a dṛśyādṛśyā ca bhavati tatra tatra sarasvatī
GE07mbh_06_u:549: 06,007.047c etā divyāḥ sapta gaṅgās triṣu lokeṣu viśrutāḥ
GE07mbh_06_u:550: 06,007.048a rakṣāṃsi vai himavati hemakūṭe tu guhyakāḥ
GE07mbh_06_u:551: 06,007.048c sarpā nāgāś ca niṣadhe gokarṇe ca tapodhanāḥ
GE07mbh_06_u:552: 06,007.049a devāsurāṇāṃ ca gṛhaṃ śvetaḥ parvata ucyate
GE07mbh_06_u:553: 06,007.049c gandharvā niṣadhe śaile nīle brahmarṣayo nṛpa
GE07mbh_06_u:555: 06,007.050a ity etāni mahārāja sapta varṣāṇi bhāgaśaḥ
GE07mbh_06_u:559: 06,007.052a yāṃ tu pṛcchasi mā rājan divyām etāṃ śaśākṛtim
GE07mbh_06_u:562: 06,007.052c pārśve śaśasya dve varṣe ubhaye dakṣiṇottare
GE07mbh_06_u:563: 06,007.052d*0034_01 anyāni pañca varṣāṇi galāntaṃ kalpitāni ca
GE07mbh_06_u:564: 06,007.052e karṇau tu nāgadvīpaṃ ca kaśyapadvīpam eva ca
GE07mbh_06_u:568: 06,008.001a meror athottaraṃ pārśvaṃ pūrvaṃ cācakṣva saṃjaya
GE07mbh_06_u:571: 06,008.002a dakṣiṇena tu nīlasya meroḥ pārśve tathottare
GE07mbh_06_u:574: 06,008.003c puṣpāṇi ca sugandhīni rasavanti phalāni ca
GE07mbh_06_u:575: 06,008.004a sarvakāmaphalās tatra ke cid vṛkṣā janādhipa
GE07mbh_06_u:576: 06,008.004c apare kṣīriṇo nāma vṛkṣās tatra narādhipa
GE07mbh_06_u:577: 06,008.005a ye kṣaranti sadā kṣīraṃ ṣaḍrasaṃ hy amṛtopamam
GE07mbh_06_u:578: 06,008.005c vastrāṇi ca prasūyante phaleṣv ābharaṇāni ca
GE07mbh_06_u:587: 06,008.008c teṣāṃ te kṣīriṇāṃ kṣīraṃ pibanty amṛtasaṃnibham
GE07mbh_06_u:588: 06,008.009a mithunaṃ jāyamānaṃ vai samaṃ tac ca pravardhate
GE07mbh_06_u:591: 06,008.009f*0037_01 mṛtyuś ca samakālaṃ ca tayor mithunayugmayoḥ
GE07mbh_06_u:594: 06,008.010e jīvanti te mahārāja na cānyonyaṃ jahaty uta
GE07mbh_06_u:596: 06,008.011c te nirharanti hi mṛtān darīṣu prakṣipanti ca
GE07mbh_06_u:597: 06,008.012a uttarāḥ kuravo rājan vyākhyātās te samāsataḥ
GE07mbh_06_u:598: 06,008.012c meroḥ pārśvam ahaṃ pūrvaṃ vakṣyāmy atha yathātatham
GE07mbh_06_u:599: 06,008.012d*0038_01 bhadrāśvaṃ nāma varṣaṃ tu puro vai gandhamādanāt
GE07mbh_06_u:600: 06,008.013a tasya pūrvābhiṣekas tu bhadrāśvasya viśāṃ pate
GE07mbh_06_u:604: 06,008.015a tatra te puruṣāḥ śvetās tejoyuktā mahābalāḥ
GE07mbh_06_u:614: 06,008.020a yojanānāṃ sahasraṃ ca śataṃ ca bharatarṣabha
GE07mbh_06_u:616: 06,008.021a aratnīnāṃ sahasraṃ ca śatāni daśa pañca ca
GE07mbh_06_u:618: 06,008.022a patamānāni tāny urvyāṃ kurvanti vipulaṃ svanam
GE07mbh_06_u:619: 06,008.022c muñcanti ca rasaṃ rājaṃs tasmin rajatasaṃnibham
GE07mbh_06_u:620: 06,008.023a tasyā jambvāḥ phalaraso nadī bhūtvā janādhipa
GE07mbh_06_u:621: 06,008.023c meruṃ pradakṣiṇaṃ kṛtvā saṃprayāty uttarān kurūn
GE07mbh_06_u:622: 06,008.024a pibanti tad rasaṃ hṛṣṭā janā nityaṃ janādhipa
GE07mbh_06_u:623: 06,008.024c tasmin phalarase pīte na jarā bādhate ca tān
GE07mbh_06_u:627: 06,008.026a tathā mālyavataḥ śṛṅge dīpyate tatra havyavāṭ
GE07mbh_06_u:632: 06,008.028c brahmalokāc cyutāḥ sarve sarve ca brahmavādinaḥ
GE07mbh_06_u:633: 06,008.029a tapas tu tapyamānās te bhavanti hy ūrdhvaretasaḥ
GE07mbh_06_u:635: 06,008.030a ṣaṣṭis tāni sahasrāṇi ṣaṣṭir eva śatāni ca
GE07mbh_06_u:637: 06,008.031a ṣaṣṭiṃ varṣasahasrāṇi ṣaṣṭim eva śatāni ca
GE07mbh_06_u:640: 06,009.001a varṣāṇāṃ caiva nāmāni parvatānāṃ ca saṃjaya
GE07mbh_06_u:641: 06,009.001c ācakṣva me yathātattvaṃ ye ca parvatavāsinaḥ
GE07mbh_06_u:644: 06,009.002c varṣaṃ ramaṇakaṃ nāma jāyante tatra mānavāḥ
GE07mbh_06_u:646: 06,009.003c ratipradhānāś ca tathā jāyante tatra mānavāḥ
GE07mbh_06_u:647: 06,009.004a daśa varṣasahasrāṇi śatāni daśa pañca ca
GE07mbh_06_u:650: 06,009.005c varṣaṃ hairaṇvataṃ nāma yatra hairaṇvatī nadī
GE07mbh_06_u:656: 06,009.007c āyuṣpramāṇaṃ jīvanti śatāni daśa pañca ca
GE07mbh_06_u:657: 06,009.008a śṛṅgāṇi vai śṛṅgavatas trīṇy eva manujādhipa
GE07mbh_06_u:658: 06,009.008c ekaṃ maṇimayaṃ tatra tathaikaṃ raukmam adbhutam
GE07mbh_06_u:660: 06,009.009c tatra svayaṃprabhā devī nityaṃ vasati śāṇḍilī
GE07mbh_06_u:662: 06,009.010c varṣam airāvataṃ nāma tasmāc chṛṅgavataḥ param
GE07mbh_06_u:663: 06,009.011a na tatra sūryas tapati na te jīryanti mānavāḥ
GE07mbh_06_u:664: 06,009.011c candramāś ca sanakṣatro jyotir bhūta ivāvṛtaḥ
GE07mbh_06_u:673: 06,009.016a aṣṭacakraṃ hi tad yānaṃ bhūtayuktaṃ manojavam
GE07mbh_06_u:675: 06,009.017a sa prabhuḥ sarvabhūtānāṃ vibhuś ca bharatarṣabha
GE07mbh_06_u:676: 06,009.017c saṃkṣepo vistaraś caiva kartā kārayitā ca saḥ
GE07mbh_06_u:677: 06,009.018a pṛthivy āpas tathākāśaṃ vāyus tejaś ca pārthiva
GE07mbh_06_u:678: 06,009.018c sa yajñaḥ sarvabhūtānām āsyaṃ tasya hutāśanaḥ
GE07mbh_06_u:679: 06,009.018d*0042_01 sthitaḥ sthānasahasreṣu vyāpya vai sa carācaram
GE07mbh_06_u:682: 06,009.019c dhyānam anvagamad rājā putrān prati janādhipa
GE07mbh_06_u:683: 06,009.020a sa vicintya mahārāja punar evābravīd vacaḥ
GE07mbh_06_u:685: 06,009.020e sṛjate ca punaḥ sarvaṃ neha vidyati śāśvatam
GE07mbh_06_u:687: 06,009.021c devā vaikuṇṭha ity āhur vedā viṣṇur iti prabhum
GE07mbh_06_u:689: 06,010.001a yad idaṃ bhārataṃ varṣaṃ yatredaṃ mūrchitaṃ balam
GE07mbh_06_u:691: 06,010.002a yatra gṛddhāḥ pāṇḍusutā yatra me sajjate manaḥ
GE07mbh_06_u:692: 06,010.002c etan me tattvam ācakṣva kuśalo hy asi saṃjaya
GE07mbh_06_u:694: 06,010.003a na tatra pāṇḍavā gṛddhāḥ śṛṇu rājan vaco mama
GE07mbh_06_u:695: 06,010.003c gṛddho duryodhanas tatra śakuniś cāpi saubalaḥ
GE07mbh_06_u:697: 06,010.004c ye gṛddhā bhārate varṣe na mṛṣyanti parasparam
GE07mbh_06_u:698: 06,010.005a atra te varṇayiṣyāmi varṣaṃ bhārata bhāratam
GE07mbh_06_u:699: 06,010.005c priyam indrasya devasya manor vaivasvatasya ca
GE07mbh_06_u:700: 06,010.006a pṛthoś ca rājan vainyasya tathekṣvākor mahātmanaḥ
GE07mbh_06_u:704: 06,010.007d*0043_01 kuśikasya ca durdharṣa gādheś caiva mahātmanaḥ
GE07mbh_06_u:705: 06,010.007d*0043_02 somakasya ca durdharṣa dilīpasya tathaiva ca
GE07mbh_06_u:707: 06,010.008c sarveṣām eva rājendra priyaṃ bhārata bhāratam
GE07mbh_06_u:708: 06,010.009a tat te varṣaṃ pravakṣyāmi yathāśrutam ariṃdama
GE07mbh_06_u:709: 06,010.009c śṛṇu me gadato rājan yan māṃ tvaṃ paripṛcchasi
GE07mbh_06_u:710: 06,010.010a mahendro malayaḥ sahyaḥ śuktimān ṛkṣavān api
GE07mbh_06_u:711: 06,010.010c vindhyaś ca pāriyātraś ca saptaite kulaparvatāḥ
GE07mbh_06_u:712: 06,010.011a teṣāṃ sahasraśo rājan parvatās tu samīpataḥ
GE07mbh_06_u:715: 06,010.012c āryā mlecchāś ca kauravya tair miśrāḥ puruṣā vibho
GE07mbh_06_u:716: 06,010.013a nadīḥ pibanti bahulā gaṅgāṃ sindhuṃ sarasvatīm
GE07mbh_06_u:717: 06,010.013c godāvarīṃ narmadāṃ ca bāhudāṃ ca mahānadīm
GE07mbh_06_u:718: 06,010.014a śatadruṃ candrabhāgāṃ ca yamunāṃ ca mahānadīm
GE07mbh_06_u:720: 06,010.015a nadīṃ vetravatīṃ caiva kṛṣṇaveṇāṃ ca nimnagām
GE07mbh_06_u:721: 06,010.015c irāvatīṃ vitastāṃ ca payoṣṇīṃ devikām api
GE07mbh_06_u:724: 06,010.017a gomatīṃ dhūtapāpāṃ ca vandanāṃ ca mahānadīm
GE07mbh_06_u:726: 06,010.018a rathasthāṃ śatakumbhāṃ ca sarayūṃ ca nareśvara
GE07mbh_06_u:728: 06,010.019a śatāvarīṃ payoṣṇīṃ ca parāṃ bhaimarathīṃ tathā
GE07mbh_06_u:729: 06,010.019c kāverīṃ culukāṃ cāpi vāpīṃ śatabalām api
GE07mbh_06_u:732: 06,010.021a pūrvābhirāmāṃ vīrāṃ ca bhīmām oghavatīṃ tathā
GE07mbh_06_u:735: 06,010.022c puruhīṃ pravarāṃ menāṃ moghāṃ ghṛtavatīṃ tathā
GE07mbh_06_u:736: 06,010.023a dhūmatyām atikṛṣṇāṃ ca sūcīṃ chāvīṃ ca kaurava
GE07mbh_06_u:738: 06,010.024a śaśikāntāṃ śivāṃ caiva tathā vīravatīm api

GE07mbh_06_u:1101: 06,014.008a mahendrasadṛśaḥ śaurye sthairye ca himavān iva
GE07mbh_06_u:1105: 06,014.010a pāṇḍavānāṃ mahat sainyaṃ yaṃ dṛṣṭvodyantam āhave

GE07mbh_06_u:1905: 06,023.030c na ca śaknomy avasthātuṃ bhramatīva ca me manaḥ
GE07mbh_06_u:1907: 06,023.031c na ca śreyo 'nupaśyāmi hatvā svajanam āhave
GE07mbh_06_u:1908: 06,023.032a na kāṅkṣe vijayaṃ kṛṣṇa na ca rājyaṃ sukhāni ca
GE07mbh_06_u:1909: 06,023.032c kiṃ no rājyena govinda kiṃ bhogair jīvitena vā
GE07mbh_06_u:1910: 06,023.033a yeṣām arthe kāṅkṣitaṃ no rājyaṃ bhogāḥ sukhāni ca
GE07mbh_06_u:1911: 06,023.033c ta ime 'vasthitā yuddhe prāṇāṃs tyaktvā dhanāni ca
GE07mbh_06_u:1912: 06,023.034a ācāryāḥ pitaraḥ putrās tathaiva ca pitāmahāḥ
GE07mbh_06_u:1913: 06,023.034c mātulāḥ śvaśurāḥ pautrāḥ syālāḥ saṃbandhinas tathā
GE07mbh_06_u:1914: 06,023.035a etān na hantum icchāmi ghnato 'pi madhusūdana
GE07mbh_06_u:1915: 06,023.035c api trailokyarājyasya hetoḥ kiṃ nu mahīkṛte
GE07mbh_06_u:1916: 06,023.036a nihatya dhārtarāṣṭrān naḥ kā prītiḥ syāj janārdana
