GE07mbh_06_u:1919: 06,023.037c svajanaṃ hi kathaṃ hatvā sukhinaḥ syāma mādhava
GE07mbh_06_u:1920: 06,023.038a yady apy ete na paśyanti lobhopahatacetasaḥ
GE07mbh_06_u:1922: 06,023.039a kathaṃ na jñeyam asmābhiḥ pāpād asmān nivartitum
GE07mbh_06_u:1925: 06,023.040c dharme naṣṭe kulaṃ kṛtsnam adharmo 'bhibhavaty uta
GE07mbh_06_u:1934: 06,023.045a aho bata mahat pāpaṃ kartuṃ vyavasitā vayam
GE07mbh_06_u:1937: 06,023.046c dhārtarāṣṭrā raṇe hanyus tan me kṣemataraṃ bhavet
GE07mbh_06_u:1944: 06,024.002a kutas tvā kaśmalam idaṃ viṣame samupasthitam
GE07mbh_06_u:1946: 06,024.003a klaibyaṃ mā sma gamaḥ pārtha naitat tvayy upapadyate
GE07mbh_06_u:1949: 06,024.004a kathaṃ bhīṣmam ahaṃ saṃkhye droṇaṃ ca madhusūdana
GE07mbh_06_u:1951: 06,024.005a gurūn ahatvā hi mahānubhāvāñ; śreyo bhoktuṃ bhaikṣam apīha loke
GE07mbh_06_u:1952: 06,024.005c hatvārthakāmāṃs tu gurūn ihaiva; bhuñjīya bhogān rudhirapradigdhān
GE07mbh_06_u:1953: 06,024.006a na caitad vidmaḥ kataran no garīyo; yad vā jayema yadi vā no jayeyuḥ
GE07mbh_06_u:1954: 06,024.006c yān eva hatvā na jijīviṣāmas; te 'vasthitāḥ pramukhe dhārtarāṣṭrāḥ
GE07mbh_06_u:1956: 06,024.007c yac chreyaḥ syān niścitaṃ brūhi tan me; śiṣyas te 'haṃ śādhi māṃ tvāṃ prapannam
GE07mbh_06_u:1957: 06,024.008a na hi prapaśyāmi mamāpanudyād; yac chokam ucchoṣaṇam indriyāṇām
GE07mbh_06_u:1958: 06,024.008c avāpya bhūmāv asapatnam ṛddhaṃ; rājyaṃ surāṇām api cādhipatyam
GE07mbh_06_u:1961: 06,024.009c na yotsya iti govindam uktvā tūṣṇīṃ babhūva ha
GE07mbh_06_u:1962: 06,024.010a tam uvāca hṛṣīkeśaḥ prahasann iva bhārata
GE07mbh_06_u:1963: 06,024.010c senayor ubhayor madhye viṣīdantam idaṃ vacaḥ
GE07mbh_06_u:1965: 06,024.011a aśocyān anvaśocas tvaṃ prajñāvādāṃś ca bhāṣase
GE07mbh_06_u:1971: 06,024.012a na tv evāhaṃ jātu nāsaṃ na tvaṃ neme janādhipāḥ
GE07mbh_06_u:1972: 06,024.012c na caiva na bhaviṣyāmaḥ sarve vayam ataḥ param
GE07mbh_06_u:1973: 06,024.013a dehino 'smin yathā dehe kaumāraṃ yauvanaṃ jarā
GE07mbh_06_u:1974: 06,024.013c tathā dehāntaraprāptir dhīras tatra na muhyati
GE07mbh_06_u:1977: 06,024.015a yaṃ hi na vyathayanty ete puruṣaṃ puruṣarṣabha
GE07mbh_06_u:1979: 06,024.016a nāsato vidyate bhāvo nābhāvo vidyate sataḥ
GE07mbh_06_u:1980: 06,024.016c ubhayor api dṛṣṭo 'ntas tv anayos tattvadarśibhiḥ
GE07mbh_06_u:1981: 06,024.017a avināśi tu tad viddhi yena sarvam idaṃ tatam
GE07mbh_06_u:1982: 06,024.017c vināśam avyayasyāsya na kaś cit kartum arhati
GE07mbh_06_u:1985: 06,024.019a ya enaṃ vetti hantāraṃ yaś cainaṃ manyate hatam
GE07mbh_06_u:1986: 06,024.019c ubhau tau na vijānīto nāyaṃ hanti na hanyate
GE07mbh_06_u:1987: 06,024.020a na jāyate mriyate vā kadā cin; nāyaṃ bhūtvā bhavitā vā na bhūyaḥ
GE07mbh_06_u:1988: 06,024.020c ajo nityaḥ śāśvato 'yaṃ purāṇo; na hanyate hanyamāne śarīre
GE07mbh_06_u:1989: 06,024.021a vedāvināśinaṃ nityaṃ ya enam ajam avyayam
GE07mbh_06_u:1990: 06,024.021c kathaṃ sa puruṣaḥ pārtha kaṃ ghātayati hanti kam
GE07mbh_06_u:1991: 06,024.022a vāsāṃsi jīrṇāni yathā vihāya; navāni gṛhṇāti naro 'parāṇi
GE07mbh_06_u:1992: 06,024.022c tathā śarīrāṇi vihāya jīrṇāny; anyāni saṃyāti navāni dehī
GE07mbh_06_u:1993: 06,024.023a nainaṃ chindanti śastrāṇi nainaṃ dahati pāvakaḥ
GE07mbh_06_u:1994: 06,024.023c na cainaṃ kledayanty āpo na śoṣayati mārutaḥ
GE07mbh_06_u:1999: 06,024.026a atha cainaṃ nityajātaṃ nityaṃ vā manyase mṛtam
GE07mbh_06_u:2000: 06,024.026c tathāpi tvaṃ mahābāho nainaṃ śocitum arhasi
GE07mbh_06_u:2001: 06,024.027a jātasya hi dhruvo mṛtyur dhruvaṃ janma mṛtasya ca
GE07mbh_06_u:2002: 06,024.027c tasmād aparihārye 'rthe na tvaṃ śocitum arhasi
GE07mbh_06_u:2005: 06,024.029a āścaryavat paśyati kaś cid enam; āścaryavad vadati tathaiva cānyaḥ
GE07mbh_06_u:2006: 06,024.029c āścaryavac cainam anyaḥ śṛṇoti; śrutvāpy enaṃ veda na caiva kaś cit
GE07mbh_06_u:2007: 06,024.030a dehī nityam avadhyo 'yaṃ dehe sarvasya bhārata
GE07mbh_06_u:2008: 06,024.030c tasmāt sarvāṇi bhūtāni na tvaṃ śocitum arhasi
GE07mbh_06_u:2009: 06,024.031a svadharmam api cāvekṣya na vikampitum arhasi
GE07mbh_06_u:2010: 06,024.031c dharmyād dhi yuddhāc chreyo 'nyat kṣatriyasya na vidyate
GE07mbh_06_u:2012: 06,024.032c sukhinaḥ kṣatriyāḥ pārtha labhante yuddham īdṛśam
GE07mbh_06_u:2013: 06,024.033a atha cet tvam imaṃ dharmyaṃ saṃgrāmaṃ na kariṣyasi
GE07mbh_06_u:2014: 06,024.033c tataḥ svadharmaṃ kīrtiṃ ca hitvā pāpam avāpsyasi
GE07mbh_06_u:2017: 06,024.035a bhayād raṇād uparataṃ maṃsyante tvāṃ mahārathāḥ
GE07mbh_06_u:2018: 06,024.035c yeṣāṃ ca tvaṃ bahumato bhūtvā yāsyasi lāghavam
GE07mbh_06_u:2020: 06,024.036c nindantas tava sāmarthyaṃ tato duḥkhataraṃ nu kim
GE07mbh_06_u:2021: 06,024.037a hato vā prāpsyasi svargaṃ jitvā vā bhokṣyase mahīm
GE07mbh_06_u:2024: 06,024.038c tato yuddhāya yujyasva naivaṃ pāpam avāpsyasi
GE07mbh_06_u:2025: 06,024.039a eṣā te 'bhihitā sāṃkhye buddhir yoge tv imāṃ śṛṇu
GE07mbh_06_u:2026: 06,024.039c buddhyā yukto yayā pārtha karmabandhaṃ prahāsyasi
GE07mbh_06_u:2028: 06,024.040c svalpam apy asya dharmasya trāyate mahato bhayāt
GE07mbh_06_u:2031: 06,024.042a yām imāṃ puṣpitāṃ vācaṃ pravadanty avipaścitaḥ
GE07mbh_06_u:2041: 06,024.047a karmaṇy evādhikāras te mā phaleṣu kadā cana
GE07mbh_06_u:2042: 06,024.047c mā karmaphalahetur bhūr mā te saṅgo 'stv akarmaṇi
GE07mbh_06_u:2043: 06,024.048a yogasthaḥ kuru karmāṇi saṅgaṃ tyaktvā dhanaṃjaya
GE07mbh_06_u:2044: 06,024.048c siddhyasiddhyoḥ samo bhūtvā samatvaṃ yoga ucyate
GE07mbh_06_u:2045: 06,024.048d*0088_01 yasya sarve samārambhā nirāśīrbandhanās tv iha
GE07mbh_06_u:2046: 06,024.048d*0088_02 tyāge yasya hutaṃ sarvaṃ sa tyāgī sa ca buddhimān
GE07mbh_06_u:2047: 06,024.049a dūreṇa hy avaraṃ karma buddhiyogād dhanaṃjaya
GE07mbh_06_u:2050: 06,024.050c tasmād yogāya yujyasva yogaḥ karmasu kauśalam
GE07mbh_06_u:2051: 06,024.051a karmajaṃ buddhiyuktā hi phalaṃ tyaktvā manīṣiṇaḥ
GE07mbh_06_u:2054: 06,024.052c tadā gantāsi nirvedaṃ śrotavyasya śrutasya ca
GE07mbh_06_u:2056: 06,024.053c samādhāv acalā buddhis tadā yogam avāpsyasi
GE07mbh_06_u:2059: 06,024.054c sthitadhīḥ kiṃ prabhāṣeta kim āsīta vrajeta kim
GE07mbh_06_u:2061: 06,024.055a prajahāti yadā kāmān sarvān pārtha manogatān
GE07mbh_06_u:2065: 06,024.057a yaḥ sarvatrānabhisnehas tat tat prāpya śubhāśubham
GE07mbh_06_u:2066: 06,024.057c nābhinandati na dveṣṭi tasya prajñā pratiṣṭhitā
GE07mbh_06_u:2070: 06,024.059c rasavarjaṃ raso 'py asya paraṃ dṛṣṭvā nivartate
GE07mbh_06_u:2071: 06,024.060a yatato hy api kaunteya puruṣasya vipaścitaḥ
GE07mbh_06_u:2073: 06,024.061a tāni sarvāṇi saṃyamya yukta āsīta matparaḥ
GE07mbh_06_u:2074: 06,024.061c vaśe hi yasyendriyāṇi tasya prajñā pratiṣṭhitā
GE07mbh_06_u:2083: 06,024.066a nāsti buddhir ayuktasya na cāyuktasya bhāvanā
GE07mbh_06_u:2084: 06,024.066c na cābhāvayataḥ śāntir aśāntasya kutaḥ sukham
GE07mbh_06_u:2086: 06,024.067c tad asya harati prajñāṃ vāyur nāvam ivāmbhasi
GE07mbh_06_u:2089: 06,024.069a yā niśā sarvabhūtānāṃ tasyāṃ jāgarti saṃyamī
GE07mbh_06_u:2090: 06,024.069c yasyāṃ jāgrati bhūtāni sā niśā paśyato muneḥ
GE07mbh_06_u:2091: 06,024.070a āpūryamāṇam acalapratiṣṭhaṃ; samudram āpaḥ praviśanti yadvat
GE07mbh_06_u:2092: 06,024.070c tadvat kāmā yaṃ praviśanti sarve; sa śāntim āpnoti na kāmakāmī
GE07mbh_06_u:2093: 06,024.071a vihāya kāmān yaḥ sarvān pumāṃś carati niḥspṛhaḥ
GE07mbh_06_u:2095: 06,024.072a eṣā brāhmī sthitiḥ pārtha naināṃ prāpya vimuhyati
GE07mbh_06_u:2098: 06,025.001a jyāyasī cet karmaṇas te matā buddhir janārdana
GE07mbh_06_u:2099: 06,025.001c tat kiṃ karmaṇi ghore māṃ niyojayasi keśava
GE07mbh_06_u:2101: 06,025.002c tad ekaṃ vada niścitya yena śreyo 'ham āpnuyām
GE07mbh_06_u:2103: 06,025.003a loke 'smin dvividhā niṣṭhā purā proktā mayānagha
GE07mbh_06_u:2106: 06,025.004c na ca saṃnyasanād eva siddhiṃ samadhigacchati
GE07mbh_06_u:2107: 06,025.005a na hi kaś cit kṣaṇam api jātu tiṣṭhaty akarmakṛt
GE07mbh_06_u:2108: 06,025.005c kāryate hy avaśaḥ karma sarvaḥ prakṛtijair guṇaiḥ
GE07mbh_06_u:2109: 06,025.006a karmendriyāṇi saṃyamya ya āste manasā smaran
GE07mbh_06_u:2113: 06,025.008a niyataṃ kuru karma tvaṃ karma jyāyo hy akarmaṇaḥ
GE07mbh_06_u:2114: 06,025.008c śarīrayātrāpi ca te na prasidhyed akarmaṇaḥ
GE07mbh_06_u:2119: 06,025.011a devān bhāvayatānena te devā bhāvayantu vaḥ
GE07mbh_06_u:2121: 06,025.012a iṣṭān bhogān hi vo devā dāsyante yajñabhāvitāḥ
GE07mbh_06_u:2122: 06,025.012c tair dattān apradāyaibhyo yo bhuṅkte stena eva saḥ
GE07mbh_06_u:2124: 06,025.013c bhuñjate te tv aghaṃ pāpā ye pacanty ātmakāraṇāt
GE07mbh_06_u:2128: 06,025.015c tasmāt sarvagataṃ brahma nityaṃ yajñe pratiṣṭhitam
GE07mbh_06_u:2130: 06,025.016c aghāyur indriyārāmo moghaṃ pārtha sa jīvati
GE07mbh_06_u:2131: 06,025.017a yas tv ātmaratir eva syād ātmatṛptaś ca mānavaḥ
GE07mbh_06_u:2132: 06,025.017c ātmany eva ca saṃtuṣṭas tasya kāryaṃ na vidyate
GE07mbh_06_u:2133: 06,025.018a naiva tasya kṛtenārtho nākṛteneha kaś cana
GE07mbh_06_u:2134: 06,025.018c na cāsya sarvabhūteṣu kaś cid arthavyapāśrayaḥ
GE07mbh_06_u:2135: 06,025.019a tasmād asaktaḥ satataṃ kāryaṃ karma samācara
GE07mbh_06_u:2136: 06,025.019c asakto hy ācaran karma param āpnoti pūruṣaḥ
GE07mbh_06_u:2139: 06,025.021a yad yad ācarati śreṣṭhas tat tad evetaro janaḥ
GE07mbh_06_u:2140: 06,025.021c sa yat pramāṇaṃ kurute lokas tad anuvartate
GE07mbh_06_u:2141: 06,025.022a na me pārthāsti kartavyaṃ triṣu lokeṣu kiṃ cana
GE07mbh_06_u:2142: 06,025.022c nānavāptam avāptavyaṃ varta eva ca karmaṇi
GE07mbh_06_u:2143: 06,025.023a yadi hy ahaṃ na varteyaṃ jātu karmaṇy atandritaḥ
GE07mbh_06_u:2145: 06,025.024a utsīdeyur ime lokā na kuryāṃ karma ced aham
GE07mbh_06_u:2146: 06,025.024c saṃkarasya ca kartā syām upahanyām imāḥ prajāḥ
GE07mbh_06_u:2147: 06,025.025a saktāḥ karmaṇy avidvāṃso yathā kurvanti bhārata
GE07mbh_06_u:2154: 06,025.028c guṇā guṇeṣu vartanta iti matvā na sajjate
GE07mbh_06_u:2156: 06,025.029c tān akṛtsnavido mandān kṛtsnavin na vicālayet
GE07mbh_06_u:2159: 06,025.031a ye me matam idaṃ nityam anutiṣṭhanti mānavāḥ
GE07mbh_06_u:2161: 06,025.032a ye tv etad abhyasūyanto nānutiṣṭhanti me matam
GE07mbh_06_u:2163: 06,025.033a sadṛśaṃ ceṣṭate svasyāḥ prakṛter jñānavān api
GE07mbh_06_u:2164: 06,025.033c prakṛtiṃ yānti bhūtāni nigrahaḥ kiṃ kariṣyati
GE07mbh_06_u:2166: 06,025.034c tayor na vaśam āgacchet tau hy asya paripanthinau
GE07mbh_06_u:2170: 06,025.036a atha kena prayukto 'yaṃ pāpaṃ carati pūruṣaḥ
GE07mbh_06_u:2171: 06,025.036c anicchann api vārṣṇeya balād iva niyojitaḥ
GE07mbh_06_u:2174: 06,025.037c mahāśano mahāpāpmā viddhy enam iha vairiṇam
GE07mbh_06_u:2176: 06,025.037d*0089_01 bhavaty eṣa kathaṃ kṛṣṇa kathaṃ caiva vivardhate
GE07mbh_06_u:2178: 06,025.037d*0089_02 kim ātmakaḥ kim ācāras tan mamācakṣva pṛcchataḥ
GE07mbh_06_u:2179: 06,025.037d*0089_03 eṣa sūkṣmaḥ paraḥ śatrur dehinām indriyaiḥ saha
GE07mbh_06_u:2183: 06,025.037d*0089_07 harṣam asya nivartyaiṣa śokam asya dadāti ca
GE07mbh_06_u:2184: 06,025.037d*0089_08 bhayaṃ cāsya karoty eṣa mohayaṃs tu muhur muhuḥ
GE07mbh_06_u:2185: 06,025.037d*0089_09 sa eṣa kaluṣaḥ kṣudraś chidraprekṣī dhanaṃjaya
GE07mbh_06_u:2192: 06,025.040c etair vimohayaty eṣa jñānam āvṛtya dehinam
GE07mbh_06_u:2193: 06,025.041a tasmāt tvam indriyāṇy ādau niyamya bharatarṣabha
GE07mbh_06_u:2195: 06,025.042a indriyāṇi parāṇy āhur indriyebhyaḥ paraṃ manaḥ
GE07mbh_06_u:2196: 06,025.042c manasas tu parā buddhir yo buddheḥ paratas tu saḥ
GE07mbh_06_u:2197: 06,025.043a evaṃ buddheḥ paraṃ buddhvā saṃstabhyātmānam ātmanā
GE07mbh_06_u:2200: 06,026.001a imaṃ vivasvate yogaṃ proktavān aham avyayam
GE07mbh_06_u:2203: 06,026.002c sa kāleneha mahatā yogo naṣṭaḥ paraṃtapa
GE07mbh_06_u:2204: 06,026.003a sa evāyaṃ mayā te 'dya yogaḥ proktaḥ purātanaḥ
GE07mbh_06_u:2205: 06,026.003c bhakto 'si me sakhā ceti rahasyaṃ hy etad uttamam
GE07mbh_06_u:2207: 06,026.004a aparaṃ bhavato janma paraṃ janma vivasvataḥ
GE07mbh_06_u:2208: 06,026.004c katham etad vijānīyāṃ tvam ādau proktavān iti
GE07mbh_06_u:2210: 06,026.005a bahūni me vyatītāni janmāni tava cārjuna
GE07mbh_06_u:2211: 06,026.005c tāny ahaṃ veda sarvāṇi na tvaṃ vettha paraṃtapa
GE07mbh_06_u:2212: 06,026.006a ajo 'pi sann avyayātmā bhūtānām īśvaro 'pi san
GE07mbh_06_u:2214: 06,026.007a yadā yadā hi dharmasya glānir bhavati bhārata
GE07mbh_06_u:2218: 06,026.009a janma karma ca me divyam evaṃ yo vetti tattvataḥ
GE07mbh_06_u:2219: 06,026.009c tyaktvā dehaṃ punarjanma naiti mām eti so 'rjuna
GE07mbh_06_u:2222: 06,026.011a ye yathā māṃ prapadyante tāṃs tathaiva bhajāmy aham
GE07mbh_06_u:2224: 06,026.012a kāṅkṣantaḥ karmaṇāṃ siddhiṃ yajanta iha devatāḥ
GE07mbh_06_u:2225: 06,026.012c kṣipraṃ hi mānuṣe loke siddhir bhavati karmajā
GE07mbh_06_u:2227: 06,026.013c tasya kartāram api māṃ viddhy akartāram avyayam
GE07mbh_06_u:2228: 06,026.014a na māṃ karmāṇi limpanti na me karmaphale spṛhā
GE07mbh_06_u:2229: 06,026.014c iti māṃ yo 'bhijānāti karmabhir na sa badhyate
GE07mbh_06_u:2230: 06,026.015a evaṃ jñātvā kṛtaṃ karma pūrvair api mumukṣubhiḥ
GE07mbh_06_u:2231: 06,026.015c kuru karmaiva tasmāt tvaṃ pūrvaiḥ pūrvataraṃ kṛtam
GE07mbh_06_u:2232: 06,026.016a kiṃ karma kim akarmeti kavayo 'py atra mohitāḥ
GE07mbh_06_u:2233: 06,026.016c tat te karma pravakṣyāmi yaj jñātvā mokṣyase 'śubhāt
GE07mbh_06_u:2234: 06,026.017a karmaṇo hy api boddhavyaṃ boddhavyaṃ ca vikarmaṇaḥ
GE07mbh_06_u:2235: 06,026.017c akarmaṇaś ca boddhavyaṃ gahanā karmaṇo gatiḥ
GE07mbh_06_u:2236: 06,026.018a karmaṇy akarma yaḥ paśyed akarmaṇi ca karma yaḥ
GE07mbh_06_u:2237: 06,026.018c sa buddhimān manuṣyeṣu sa yuktaḥ kṛtsnakarmakṛt
GE07mbh_06_u:2241: 06,026.020c karmaṇy abhipravṛtto 'pi naiva kiṃ cit karoti saḥ
GE07mbh_06_u:2243: 06,026.021c śārīraṃ kevalaṃ karma kurvan nāpnoti kilbiṣam
GE07mbh_06_u:2245: 06,026.022c samaḥ siddhāv asiddhau ca kṛtvāpi na nibadhyate
GE07mbh_06_u:2264: 06,026.032a evaṃ bahuvidhā yajñā vitatā brahmaṇo mukhe
GE07mbh_06_u:2265: 06,026.032c karmajān viddhi tān sarvān evaṃ jñātvā vimokṣyase
GE07mbh_06_u:2270: 06,026.035a yaj jñātvā na punar moham evaṃ yāsyasi pāṇḍava
GE07mbh_06_u:2271: 06,026.035c yena bhūtāny aśeṣeṇa drakṣyasy ātmany atho mayi
GE07mbh_06_u:2272: 06,026.036a api ced asi pāpebhyaḥ sarvebhyaḥ pāpakṛttamaḥ
GE07mbh_06_u:2276: 06,026.038a na hi jñānena sadṛśaṃ pavitram iha vidyate
GE07mbh_06_u:2281: 06,026.040c nāyaṃ loko 'sti na paro na sukhaṃ saṃśayātmanaḥ
GE07mbh_06_u:2287: 06,027.001a saṃnyāsaṃ karmaṇāṃ kṛṣṇa punar yogaṃ ca śaṃsasi
GE07mbh_06_u:2288: 06,027.001c yac chreya etayor ekaṃ tan me brūhi suniścitam
GE07mbh_06_u:2292: 06,027.003a jñeyaḥ sa nityasaṃnyāsī yo na dveṣṭi na kāṅkṣati
GE07mbh_06_u:2293: 06,027.003c nirdvaṃdvo hi mahābāho sukhaṃ bandhāt pramucyate
GE07mbh_06_u:2294: 06,027.004a sāṃkhyayogau pṛthag bālāḥ pravadanti na paṇḍitāḥ
GE07mbh_06_u:2295: 06,027.004c ekam apy āsthitaḥ samyag ubhayor vindate phalam
GE07mbh_06_u:2296: 06,027.005a yat sāṃkhyaiḥ prāpyate sthānaṃ tad yogair api gamyate
GE07mbh_06_u:2297: 06,027.005c ekaṃ sāṃkhyaṃ ca yogaṃ ca yaḥ paśyati sa paśyati
GE07mbh_06_u:2298: 06,027.006a saṃnyāsas tu mahābāho duḥkham āptum ayogataḥ
GE07mbh_06_u:2302: 06,027.008a naiva kiṃ cit karomīti yukto manyeta tattvavit
GE07mbh_06_u:2303: 06,027.008c paśyañ śṛṇvan spṛśañ jighrann aśnan gacchan svapañ śvasan
GE07mbh_06_u:2304: 06,027.009a pralapan visṛjan gṛhṇann unmiṣan nimiṣann api
GE07mbh_06_u:2306: 06,027.010a brahmaṇy ādhāya karmāṇi saṅgaṃ tyaktvā karoti yaḥ
GE07mbh_06_u:2307: 06,027.010c lipyate na sa pāpena padmapatram ivāmbhasā
GE07mbh_06_u:2308: 06,027.011a kāyena manasā buddhyā kevalair indriyair api
GE07mbh_06_u:2310: 06,027.012a yuktaḥ karmaphalaṃ tyaktvā śāntim āpnoti naiṣṭhikīm
GE07mbh_06_u:2313: 06,027.013c navadvāre pure dehī naiva kurvan na kārayan
GE07mbh_06_u:2314: 06,027.014a na kartṛtvaṃ na karmāṇi lokasya sṛjati prabhuḥ
GE07mbh_06_u:2316: 06,027.015a nādatte kasya cit pāpaṃ na caiva sukṛtaṃ vibhuḥ
GE07mbh_06_u:2318: 06,027.016a jñānena tu tad ajñānaṃ yeṣāṃ nāśitam ātmanaḥ
GE07mbh_06_u:2322: 06,027.017d*0090_01 smaranto 'pi muhus tv etat spṛśanto 'pi svakarmaṇi
GE07mbh_06_u:2323: 06,027.017d*0090_02 saktā api na sajjanti paṅke ravikarā iva
GE07mbh_06_u:2325: 06,027.018c śuni caiva śvapāke ca paṇḍitāḥ samadarśinaḥ
GE07mbh_06_u:2326: 06,027.019a ihaiva tair jitaḥ sargo yeṣāṃ sāmye sthitaṃ manaḥ
GE07mbh_06_u:2327: 06,027.019c nirdoṣaṃ hi samaṃ brahma tasmād brahmaṇi te sthitāḥ
GE07mbh_06_u:2328: 06,027.020a na prahṛṣyet priyaṃ prāpya nodvijet prāpya cāpriyam
GE07mbh_06_u:2330: 06,027.021a bāhyasparśeṣv asaktātmā vindaty ātmani yat sukham
GE07mbh_06_u:2332: 06,027.022a ye hi saṃsparśajā bhogā duḥkhayonaya eva te
GE07mbh_06_u:2333: 06,027.022c ādyantavantaḥ kaunteya na teṣu ramate budhaḥ
GE07mbh_06_u:2335: 06,027.023c kāmakrodhodbhavaṃ vegaṃ sa yuktaḥ sa sukhī naraḥ
GE07mbh_06_u:2342: 06,027.027a sparśān kṛtvā bahir bāhyāṃś cakṣuś caivāntare bhruvoḥ
GE07mbh_06_u:2345: 06,027.028c vigatecchābhayakrodho yaḥ sadā mukta eva saḥ
GE07mbh_06_u:2347: 06,027.029c suhṛdaṃ sarvabhūtānāṃ jñātvā māṃ śāntim ṛcchati
GE07mbh_06_u:2349: 06,028.001a anāśritaḥ karmaphalaṃ kāryaṃ karma karoti yaḥ
GE07mbh_06_u:2350: 06,028.001c sa saṃnyāsī ca yogī ca na niragnir na cākriyaḥ
GE07mbh_06_u:2351: 06,028.002a yaṃ saṃnyāsam iti prāhur yogaṃ taṃ viddhi pāṇḍava
GE07mbh_06_u:2352: 06,028.002c na hy asaṃnyastasaṃkalpo yogī bhavati kaś cana
GE07mbh_06_u:2353: 06,028.003a ārurukṣor muner yogaṃ karma kāraṇam ucyate
GE07mbh_06_u:2355: 06,028.004a yadā hi nendriyārtheṣu na karmasv anuṣajjate
GE07mbh_06_u:2358: 06,028.005c ātmaiva hy ātmano bandhur ātmaiva ripur ātmanaḥ
GE07mbh_06_u:2366: 06,028.009c sādhuṣv api ca pāpeṣu samabuddhir viśiṣyate
GE07mbh_06_u:2367: 06,028.010a yogī yuñjīta satatam ātmānaṃ rahasi sthitaḥ
GE07mbh_06_u:2369: 06,028.011a śucau deśe pratiṣṭhāpya sthiram āsanam ātmanaḥ
GE07mbh_06_u:2376: 06,028.014c manaḥ saṃyamya maccitto yukta āsīta matparaḥ
GE07mbh_06_u:2379: 06,028.016a nātyaśnatas tu yogo 'sti na caikāntam anaśnataḥ
GE07mbh_06_u:2384: 06,028.018c niḥspṛhaḥ sarvakāmebhyo yukta ity ucyate tadā
GE07mbh_06_u:2385: 06,028.019a yathā dīpo nivātastho neṅgate sopamā smṛtā
GE07mbh_06_u:2389: 06,028.021a sukham ātyantikaṃ yat tad buddhigrāhyam atīndriyam
GE07mbh_06_u:2390: 06,028.021c vetti yatra na caivāyaṃ sthitaś calati tattvataḥ
GE07mbh_06_u:2391: 06,028.022a yaṃ labdhvā cāparaṃ lābhaṃ manyate nādhikaṃ tataḥ
GE07mbh_06_u:2392: 06,028.022c yasmin sthito na duḥkhena guruṇāpi vicālyate
GE07mbh_06_u:2398: 06,028.025c ātmasaṃsthaṃ manaḥ kṛtvā na kiṃ cid api cintayet
GE07mbh_06_u:2399: 06,028.026a yato yato niścarati manaś cañcalam asthiram
GE07mbh_06_u:2400: 06,028.026c tatas tato niyamyaitad ātmany eva vaśaṃ nayet
GE07mbh_06_u:2401: 06,028.027a praśāntamanasaṃ hy enaṃ yoginaṃ sukham uttamam
GE07mbh_06_u:2407: 06,028.030a yo māṃ paśyati sarvatra sarvaṃ ca mayi paśyati
GE07mbh_06_u:2408: 06,028.030c tasyāhaṃ na praṇaśyāmi sa ca me na praṇaśyati
GE07mbh_06_u:2409: 06,028.031a sarvabhūtasthitaṃ yo māṃ bhajaty ekatvam āsthitaḥ
GE07mbh_06_u:2410: 06,028.031c sarvathā vartamāno 'pi sa yogī mayi vartate
GE07mbh_06_u:2412: 06,028.032c sukhaṃ vā yadi vā duḥkhaṃ sa yogī paramo mataḥ
GE07mbh_06_u:2414: 06,028.033a yo 'yaṃ yogas tvayā proktaḥ sāmyena madhusūdana
GE07mbh_06_u:2415: 06,028.033c etasyāhaṃ na paśyāmi cañcalatvāt sthitiṃ sthirām
GE07mbh_06_u:2416: 06,028.034a cañcalaṃ hi manaḥ kṛṣṇa pramāthi balavad dṛḍham
GE07mbh_06_u:2417: 06,028.034c tasyāhaṃ nigrahaṃ manye vāyor iva suduṣkaram
GE07mbh_06_u:2420: 06,028.035c abhyāsena tu kaunteya vairāgyeṇa ca gṛhyate
GE07mbh_06_u:2421: 06,028.036a asaṃyatātmanā yogo duṣprāpa iti me matiḥ
GE07mbh_06_u:2425: 06,028.037b*0091_01 lipsamānaḥ satāṃ mārgaṃ pramūḍho brahmaṇaḥ pathi
GE07mbh_06_u:2427: 06,028.037c aprāpya yogasaṃsiddhiṃ kāṃ gatiṃ kṛṣṇa gacchati
GE07mbh_06_u:2430: 06,028.039a etan me saṃśayaṃ kṛṣṇa chettum arhasy aśeṣataḥ
GE07mbh_06_u:2431: 06,028.039c tvad anyaḥ saṃśayasyāsya chettā na hy upapadyate
GE07mbh_06_u:2433: 06,028.040a pārtha naiveha nāmutra vināśas tasya vidyate
GE07mbh_06_u:2434: 06,028.040c na hi kalyāṇakṛt kaś cid durgatiṃ tāta gacchati
GE07mbh_06_u:2435: 06,028.041a prāpya puṇyakṛtāṃl lokān uṣitvā śāśvatīḥ samāḥ
GE07mbh_06_u:2437: 06,028.042a atha vā yoginām eva kule bhavati dhīmatām
GE07mbh_06_u:2438: 06,028.042c etad dhi durlabhataraṃ loke janma yad īdṛśam
GE07mbh_06_u:2440: 06,028.043c yatate ca tato bhūyaḥ saṃsiddhau kurunandana
GE07mbh_06_u:2441: 06,028.044a pūrvābhyāsena tenaiva hriyate hy avaśo 'pi saḥ
GE07mbh_06_u:2446: 06,028.046c karmibhyaś cādhiko yogī tasmād yogī bhavārjuna
GE07mbh_06_u:2448: 06,028.047c śraddhāvān bhajate yo māṃ sa me yuktatamo mataḥ
GE07mbh_06_u:2452: 06,029.001a mayy āsaktamanāḥ pārtha yogaṃ yuñjan madāśrayaḥ
GE07mbh_06_u:2453: 06,029.001c asaṃśayaṃ samagraṃ māṃ yathā jñāsyasi tac chṛṇu
GE07mbh_06_u:2454: 06,029.002a jñānaṃ te 'haṃ savijñānam idaṃ vakṣyāmy aśeṣataḥ
GE07mbh_06_u:2455: 06,029.002c yaj jñātvā neha bhūyo 'nyaj jñātavyam avaśiṣyate
GE07mbh_06_u:2456: 06,029.003a manuṣyāṇāṃ sahasreṣu kaś cid yatati siddhaye
GE07mbh_06_u:2457: 06,029.003c yatatām api siddhānāṃ kaś cin māṃ vetti tattvataḥ
GE07mbh_06_u:2458: 06,029.004a bhūmir āpo 'nalo vāyuḥ khaṃ mano buddhir eva ca
GE07mbh_06_u:2459: 06,029.004c ahaṃkāra itīyaṃ me bhinnā prakṛtir aṣṭadhā
GE07mbh_06_u:2460: 06,029.005a apareyam itas tv anyāṃ prakṛtiṃ viddhi me parām
GE07mbh_06_u:2463: 06,029.006c ahaṃ kṛtsnasya jagataḥ prabhavaḥ pralayas tathā
GE07mbh_06_u:2464: 06,029.007a mattaḥ parataraṃ nānyat kiṃ cid asti dhanaṃjaya
GE07mbh_06_u:2465: 06,029.007c mayi sarvam idaṃ protaṃ sūtre maṇigaṇā iva
GE07mbh_06_u:2467: 06,029.008c praṇavaḥ sarvavedeṣu śabdaḥ khe pauruṣaṃ nṛṣu
GE07mbh_06_u:2468: 06,029.009a puṇyo gandhaḥ pṛthivyāṃ ca tejaś cāsmi vibhāvasau
GE07mbh_06_u:2470: 06,029.010a bījaṃ māṃ sarvabhūtānāṃ viddhi pārtha sanātanam
GE07mbh_06_u:2471: 06,029.010c buddhir buddhimatām asmi tejas tejasvinām aham
GE07mbh_06_u:2474: 06,029.012a ye caiva sāttvikā bhāvā rājasās tāmasāś ca ye
GE07mbh_06_u:2475: 06,029.012c matta eveti tān viddhi na tv ahaṃ teṣu te mayi
GE07mbh_06_u:2476: 06,029.013a tribhir guṇamayair bhāvair ebhiḥ sarvam idaṃ jagat
GE07mbh_06_u:2477: 06,029.013c mohitaṃ nābhijānāti mām ebhyaḥ param avyayam
GE07mbh_06_u:2478: 06,029.014a daivī hy eṣā guṇamayī mama māyā duratyayā
GE07mbh_06_u:2479: 06,029.014c mām eva ye prapadyante māyām etāṃ taranti te
GE07mbh_06_u:2480: 06,029.015a na māṃ duṣkṛtino mūḍhāḥ prapadyante narādhamāḥ
GE07mbh_06_u:2483: 06,029.016c ārto jijñāsur arthārthī jñānī ca bharatarṣabha
GE07mbh_06_u:2485: 06,029.017c priyo hi jñānino 'tyartham ahaṃ sa ca mama priyaḥ
GE07mbh_06_u:2486: 06,029.018a udārāḥ sarva evaite jñānī tv ātmaiva me matam
GE07mbh_06_u:2487: 06,029.018c āsthitaḥ sa hi yuktātmā mām evānuttamāṃ gatim
GE07mbh_06_u:2488: 06,029.019a bahūnāṃ janmanām ante jñānavān māṃ prapadyate
GE07mbh_06_u:2489: 06,029.019c vāsudevaḥ sarvam iti sa mahātmā sudurlabhaḥ
GE07mbh_06_u:2491: 06,029.020c taṃ taṃ niyamam āsthāya prakṛtyā niyatāḥ svayā
GE07mbh_06_u:2492: 06,029.021a yo yo yāṃ yāṃ tanuṃ bhaktaḥ śraddhayārcitum icchati
GE07mbh_06_u:2493: 06,029.021c tasya tasyācalāṃ śraddhāṃ tām eva vidadhāmy aham
GE07mbh_06_u:2494: 06,029.022a sa tayā śraddhayā yuktas tasyā rādhanam īhate
GE07mbh_06_u:2495: 06,029.022c labhate ca tataḥ kāmān mayaiva vihitān hi tān
GE07mbh_06_u:2496: 06,029.023a antavat tu phalaṃ teṣāṃ tad bhavaty alpamedhasām
GE07mbh_06_u:2497: 06,029.023c devān devayajo yānti madbhaktā yānti mām api
GE07mbh_06_u:2502: 06,029.024a avyaktaṃ vyaktim āpannaṃ manyante mām abuddhayaḥ
GE07mbh_06_u:2505: 06,029.025c mūḍho 'yaṃ nābhijānāti loko mām ajam avyayam
GE07mbh_06_u:2507: 06,029.026c bhaviṣyāṇi ca bhūtāni māṃ tu veda na kaś cana
GE07mbh_06_u:2510: 06,029.028a yeṣāṃ tv antagataṃ pāpaṃ janānāṃ puṇyakarmaṇām
GE07mbh_06_u:2513: 06,029.029c te brahma tad viduḥ kṛtsnam adhyātmaṃ karma cākhilam
GE07mbh_06_u:2514: 06,029.030a sādhibhūtādhidaivaṃ māṃ sādhiyajñaṃ ca ye viduḥ
GE07mbh_06_u:2515: 06,029.030c prayāṇakāle 'pi ca māṃ te vidur yuktacetasaḥ
GE07mbh_06_u:2519: 06,030.001a kiṃ tad brahma kim adhyātmaṃ kiṃ karma puruṣottama
GE07mbh_06_u:2520: 06,030.001c adhibhūtaṃ ca kiṃ proktam adhidaivaṃ kim ucyate
GE07mbh_06_u:2528: 06,030.005a antakāle ca mām eva smaran muktvā kalevaram
GE07mbh_06_u:2529: 06,030.005c yaḥ prayāti sa madbhāvaṃ yāti nāsty atra saṃśayaḥ
GE07mbh_06_u:2530: 06,030.006a yaṃ yaṃ vāpi smaran bhāvaṃ tyajaty ante kalevaram
GE07mbh_06_u:2531: 06,030.006c taṃ tam evaiti kaunteya sadā tadbhāvabhāvitaḥ
GE07mbh_06_u:2532: 06,030.007a tasmāt sarveṣu kāleṣu mām anusmara yudhya ca
GE07mbh_06_u:2536: 06,030.009a kaviṃ purāṇam anuśāsitāram; aṇor aṇīyāṃsam anusmared yaḥ
GE07mbh_06_u:2537: 06,030.009c sarvasya dhātāram acintyarūpam; ādityavarṇaṃ tamasaḥ parastāt
GE07mbh_06_u:2538: 06,030.010a prayāṇakāle manasācalena; bhaktyā yukto yogabalena caiva
GE07mbh_06_u:2539: 06,030.010c bhruvor madhye prāṇam āveśya samyak; sa taṃ paraṃ puruṣam upaiti divyam
GE07mbh_06_u:2540: 06,030.011a yad akṣaraṃ vedavido vadanti; viśanti yad yatayo vītarāgāḥ
GE07mbh_06_u:2541: 06,030.011c yad icchanto brahmacaryaṃ caranti; tat te padaṃ saṃgraheṇa pravakṣye
GE07mbh_06_u:2546: 06,030.012a sarvadvārāṇi saṃyamya mano hṛdi nirudhya ca
GE07mbh_06_u:2548: 06,030.013a om ity ekākṣaraṃ brahma vyāharan mām anusmaran
GE07mbh_06_u:2549: 06,030.013c yaḥ prayāti tyajan dehaṃ sa yāti paramāṃ gatim
GE07mbh_06_u:2550: 06,030.014a ananyacetāḥ satataṃ yo māṃ smarati nityaśaḥ
GE07mbh_06_u:2555: 06,030.016c mām upetya tu kaunteya punarjanma na vidyate
GE07mbh_06_u:2560: 06,030.019a bhūtagrāmaḥ sa evāyaṃ bhūtvā bhūtvā pralīyate
GE07mbh_06_u:2563: 06,030.020c yaḥ sa sarveṣu bhūteṣu naśyatsu na vinaśyati
GE07mbh_06_u:2564: 06,030.021a avyakto 'kṣara ity uktas tam āhuḥ paramāṃ gatim
GE07mbh_06_u:2565: 06,030.021c yaṃ prāpya na nivartante tad dhāma paramaṃ mama
GE07mbh_06_u:2566: 06,030.022a puruṣaḥ sa paraḥ pārtha bhaktyā labhyas tv ananyayā
GE07mbh_06_u:2567: 06,030.022b*0097_01 yaṃ prāpya na punarjanma labhante yogino 'rjuna
GE07mbh_06_u:2568: 06,030.022c yasyāntaḥsthāni bhūtāni yena sarvam idaṃ tatam
GE07mbh_06_u:2569: 06,030.023a yatra kāle tv anāvṛttim āvṛttiṃ caiva yoginaḥ
GE07mbh_06_u:2570: 06,030.023c prayātā yānti taṃ kālaṃ vakṣyāmi bharatarṣabha
GE07mbh_06_u:2571: 06,030.024a agnir jyotir ahaḥ śuklaḥ ṣaṇmāsā uttarāyaṇam
GE07mbh_06_u:2572: 06,030.024c tatra prayātā gacchanti brahma brahmavido janāḥ
GE07mbh_06_u:2573: 06,030.025a dhūmo rātris tathā kṛṣṇaḥ ṣaṇmāsā dakṣiṇāyanam
GE07mbh_06_u:2574: 06,030.025c tatra cāndramasaṃ jyotir yogī prāpya nivartate
GE07mbh_06_u:2575: 06,030.026a śuklakṛṣṇe gatī hy ete jagataḥ śāśvate mate
GE07mbh_06_u:2577: 06,030.027a naite sṛtī pārtha jānan yogī muhyati kaś cana
GE07mbh_06_u:2579: 06,030.028a vedeṣu yajñeṣu tapaḥsu caiva; dāneṣu yat puṇyaphalaṃ pradiṣṭam
GE07mbh_06_u:2580: 06,030.028c atyeti tat sarvam idaṃ viditvā; yogī paraṃ sthānam upaiti cādyam
GE07mbh_06_u:2582: 06,030.028d*0098_02 antar bahir na sāvasthā na yasyāṃ bhāsate vibhuḥ
GE07mbh_06_u:2584: 06,031.001a idaṃ tu te guhyatamaṃ pravakṣyāmy anasūyave
GE07mbh_06_u:2590: 06,031.004a mayā tatam idaṃ sarvaṃ jagad avyaktamūrtinā
GE07mbh_06_u:2591: 06,031.004c matsthāni sarvabhūtāni na cāhaṃ teṣv avasthitaḥ
GE07mbh_06_u:2592: 06,031.005a na ca matsthāni bhūtāni paśya me yogam aiśvaram
GE07mbh_06_u:2593: 06,031.005c bhūtabhṛn na ca bhūtastho mamātmā bhūtabhāvanaḥ
GE07mbh_06_u:2599: 06,031.006d*0100_02 bhūtaprakṛtim āsthāya sahaiva ca vinaiva ca
GE07mbh_06_u:2601: 06,031.007c kalpakṣaye punas tāni kalpādau visṛjāmy aham
GE07mbh_06_u:2602: 06,031.008a prakṛtiṃ svām avaṣṭabhya visṛjāmi punaḥ punaḥ
GE07mbh_06_u:2603: 06,031.008c bhūtagrāmam imaṃ kṛtsnam avaśaṃ prakṛter vaśāt
GE07mbh_06_u:2604: 06,031.009a na ca māṃ tāni karmāṇi nibadhnanti dhanaṃjaya
GE07mbh_06_u:2608: 06,031.011a avajānanti māṃ mūḍhā mānuṣīṃ tanum āśritam
GE07mbh_06_u:2611: 06,031.012c rākṣasīm āsurīṃ caiva prakṛtiṃ mohinīṃ śritāḥ
GE07mbh_06_u:2612: 06,031.013a mahātmānas tu māṃ pārtha daivīṃ prakṛtim āśritāḥ
GE07mbh_06_u:2614: 06,031.014a satataṃ kīrtayanto māṃ yatantaś ca dṛḍhavratāḥ
GE07mbh_06_u:2615: 06,031.014c namasyantaś ca māṃ bhaktyā nityayuktā upāsate
GE07mbh_06_u:2616: 06,031.015a jñānayajñena cāpy anye yajanto mām upāsate
GE07mbh_06_u:2618: 06,031.016a ahaṃ kratur ahaṃ yajñaḥ svadhāham aham auṣadham
GE07mbh_06_u:2619: 06,031.016c mantro 'ham aham evājyam aham agnir ahaṃ hutam
GE07mbh_06_u:2620: 06,031.017a pitāham asya jagato mātā dhātā pitāmahaḥ
GE07mbh_06_u:2621: 06,031.017c vedyaṃ pavitram oṃkāra ṛk sāma yajur eva ca
GE07mbh_06_u:2622: 06,031.018a gatir bhartā prabhuḥ sākṣī nivāsaḥ śaraṇaṃ suhṛt
GE07mbh_06_u:2623: 06,031.018c prabhavaḥ pralayaḥ sthānaṃ nidhānaṃ bījam avyayam
GE07mbh_06_u:2624: 06,031.019a tapāmy aham ahaṃ varṣaṃ nigṛhṇāmy utsṛjāmi ca
GE07mbh_06_u:2625: 06,031.019c amṛtaṃ caiva mṛtyuś ca sad asac cāham arjuna
GE07mbh_06_u:2626: 06,031.020a traividyā māṃ somapāḥ pūtapāpā; yajñair iṣṭvā svargatiṃ prārthayante
GE07mbh_06_u:2627: 06,031.020c te puṇyam āsādya surendralokam; aśnanti divyān divi devabhogān
GE07mbh_06_u:2628: 06,031.021a te taṃ bhuktvā svargalokaṃ viśālaṃ; kṣīṇe puṇye martyalokaṃ viśanti
GE07mbh_06_u:2629: 06,031.021c evaṃ trayīdharmam anuprapannā; gatāgataṃ kāmakāmā labhante
GE07mbh_06_u:2630: 06,031.022a ananyāś cintayanto māṃ ye janāḥ paryupāsate
GE07mbh_06_u:2633: 06,031.023c te 'pi mām eva kaunteya yajanty avidhipūrvakam
GE07mbh_06_u:2634: 06,031.024a ahaṃ hi sarvayajñānāṃ bhoktā ca prabhur eva ca
GE07mbh_06_u:2635: 06,031.024c na tu mām abhijānanti tattvenātaś cyavanti te
GE07mbh_06_u:2636: 06,031.025a yānti devavratā devān pitṝn yānti pitṛvratāḥ
GE07mbh_06_u:2637: 06,031.025c bhūtāni yānti bhūtejyā yānti madyājino 'pi mām
GE07mbh_06_u:2638: 06,031.026a patraṃ puṣpaṃ phalaṃ toyaṃ yo me bhaktyā prayacchati
GE07mbh_06_u:2640: 06,031.027a yat karoṣi yad aśnāsi yaj juhoṣi dadāsi yat
GE07mbh_06_u:2641: 06,031.027c yat tapasyasi kaunteya tat kuruṣva madarpaṇam
GE07mbh_06_u:2644: 06,031.029a samo 'haṃ sarvabhūteṣu na me dveṣyo 'sti na priyaḥ
GE07mbh_06_u:2645: 06,031.029c ye bhajanti tu māṃ bhaktyā mayi te teṣu cāpy aham
GE07mbh_06_u:2646: 06,031.030a api cet sudurācāro bhajate mām ananyabhāk
GE07mbh_06_u:2647: 06,031.030c sādhur eva sa mantavyaḥ samyag vyavasito hi saḥ
GE07mbh_06_u:2649: 06,031.031c kaunteya pratijānīhi na me bhaktaḥ praṇaśyati
GE07mbh_06_u:2650: 06,031.032a māṃ hi pārtha vyapāśritya ye 'pi syuḥ pāpayonayaḥ
GE07mbh_06_u:2651: 06,031.032c striyo vaiśyās tathā śūdrās te 'pi yānti parāṃ gatim
GE07mbh_06_u:2652: 06,031.033a kiṃ punar brāhmaṇāḥ puṇyā bhaktā rājarṣayas tathā
GE07mbh_06_u:2653: 06,031.033c anityam asukhaṃ lokam imaṃ prāpya bhajasva mām
GE07mbh_06_u:2654: 06,031.034a manmanā bhava madbhakto madyājī māṃ namaskuru
GE07mbh_06_u:2657: 06,032.001a bhūya eva mahābāho śṛṇu me paramaṃ vacaḥ
GE07mbh_06_u:2659: 06,032.002a na me viduḥ suragaṇāḥ prabhavaṃ na maharṣayaḥ
GE07mbh_06_u:2660: 06,032.002c aham ādir hi devānāṃ maharṣīṇāṃ ca sarvaśaḥ
GE07mbh_06_u:2661: 06,032.003a yo mām ajam anādiṃ ca vetti lokamaheśvaram
GE07mbh_06_u:2663: 06,032.004a buddhir jñānam asaṃmohaḥ kṣamā satyaṃ damaḥ śamaḥ
GE07mbh_06_u:2664: 06,032.004c sukhaṃ duḥkhaṃ bhavo 'bhāvo bhayaṃ cābhayam eva ca
GE07mbh_06_u:2665: 06,032.005a ahiṃsā samatā tuṣṭis tapo dānaṃ yaśo 'yaśaḥ
GE07mbh_06_u:2666: 06,032.005c bhavanti bhāvā bhūtānāṃ matta eva pṛthagvidhāḥ
GE07mbh_06_u:2667: 06,032.006a maharṣayaḥ sapta pūrve catvāro manavas tathā
GE07mbh_06_u:2668: 06,032.006c madbhāvā mānasā jātā yeṣāṃ loka imāḥ prajāḥ
GE07mbh_06_u:2669: 06,032.007a etāṃ vibhūtiṃ yogaṃ ca mama yo vetti tattvataḥ
GE07mbh_06_u:2671: 06,032.008a ahaṃ sarvasya prabhavo mattaḥ sarvaṃ pravartate
GE07mbh_06_u:2672: 06,032.008c iti matvā bhajante māṃ budhā bhāvasamanvitāḥ
GE07mbh_06_u:2674: 06,032.009c kathayantaś ca māṃ nityaṃ tuṣyanti ca ramanti ca
GE07mbh_06_u:2676: 06,032.010c dadāmi buddhiyogaṃ taṃ yena mām upayānti te
GE07mbh_06_u:2680: 06,032.012a paraṃ brahma paraṃ dhāma pavitraṃ paramaṃ bhavān
GE07mbh_06_u:2681: 06,032.012c puruṣaṃ śāśvataṃ divyam ādidevam ajaṃ vibhum
GE07mbh_06_u:2682: 06,032.013a āhus tvām ṛṣayaḥ sarve devarṣir nāradas tathā
GE07mbh_06_u:2683: 06,032.013c asito devalo vyāsaḥ svayaṃ caiva bravīṣi me
GE07mbh_06_u:2684: 06,032.014a sarvam etad ṛtaṃ manye yan māṃ vadasi keśava
GE07mbh_06_u:2685: 06,032.014c na hi te bhagavan vyaktiṃ vidur devā na dānavāḥ
GE07mbh_06_u:2688: 06,032.016a vaktum arhasy aśeṣeṇa divyā hy ātmavibhūtayaḥ
GE07mbh_06_u:2689: 06,032.016c yābhir vibhūtibhir lokān imāṃs tvaṃ vyāpya tiṣṭhasi
GE07mbh_06_u:2690: 06,032.017a kathaṃ vidyām ahaṃ yogiṃs tvāṃ sadā paricintayan
GE07mbh_06_u:2691: 06,032.017c keṣu keṣu ca bhāveṣu cintyo 'si bhagavan mayā
GE07mbh_06_u:2693: 06,032.018c bhūyaḥ kathaya tṛptir hi śṛṇvato nāsti me 'mṛtam
GE07mbh_06_u:2695: 06,032.019a hanta te kathayiṣyāmi divyā hy ātmavibhūtayaḥ
GE07mbh_06_u:2696: 06,032.019c prādhānyataḥ kuruśreṣṭha nāsty anto vistarasya me
GE07mbh_06_u:2698: 06,032.020c aham ādiś ca madhyaṃ ca bhūtānām anta eva ca
GE07mbh_06_u:2699: 06,032.021a ādityānām ahaṃ viṣṇur jyotiṣāṃ ravir aṃśumān
GE07mbh_06_u:2700: 06,032.021c marīcir marutām asmi nakṣatrāṇām ahaṃ śaśī
GE07mbh_06_u:2702: 06,032.022c indriyāṇāṃ manaś cāsmi bhūtānām asmi cetanā
GE07mbh_06_u:2704: 06,032.023c vasūnāṃ pāvakaś cāsmi meruḥ śikhariṇām aham
GE07mbh_06_u:2705: 06,032.024a purodhasāṃ ca mukhyaṃ māṃ viddhi pārtha bṛhaspatim
GE07mbh_06_u:2706: 06,032.024c senānīnām ahaṃ skandaḥ sarasām asmi sāgaraḥ
GE07mbh_06_u:2707: 06,032.025a maharṣīṇāṃ bhṛgur ahaṃ girām asmy ekam akṣaram
GE07mbh_06_u:2713: 06,032.028a āyudhānām ahaṃ vajraṃ dhenūnām asmi kāmadhuk
GE07mbh_06_u:2714: 06,032.028c prajanaś cāsmi kandarpaḥ sarpāṇām asmi vāsukiḥ
GE07mbh_06_u:2715: 06,032.029a anantaś cāsmi nāgānāṃ varuṇo yādasām aham
GE07mbh_06_u:2716: 06,032.029c pitṝṇām aryamā cāsmi yamaḥ saṃyamatām aham
GE07mbh_06_u:2717: 06,032.030a prahlādaś cāsmi daityānāṃ kālaḥ kalayatām aham
GE07mbh_06_u:2718: 06,032.030c mṛgāṇāṃ ca mṛgendro 'haṃ vainateyaś ca pakṣiṇām
GE07mbh_06_u:2719: 06,032.031a pavanaḥ pavatām asmi rāmaḥ śastrabhṛtām aham
GE07mbh_06_u:2720: 06,032.031c jhaṣāṇāṃ makaraś cāsmi srotasām asmi jāhnavī
GE07mbh_06_u:2721: 06,032.032a sargāṇām ādir antaś ca madhyaṃ caivāham arjuna
GE07mbh_06_u:2725: 06,032.034a mṛtyuḥ sarvaharaś cāham udbhavaś ca bhaviṣyatām
GE07mbh_06_u:2726: 06,032.034c kīrtiḥ śrīr vāk ca nārīṇāṃ smṛtir medhā dhṛtiḥ kṣamā
GE07mbh_06_u:2727: 06,032.035a bṛhatsāma tathā sāmnāṃ gāyatrī chandasām aham
GE07mbh_06_u:2729: 06,032.035d*0101_01 oṣadhīnāṃ yavaś cāsmi dhātūnām asmi kāñcanam
GE07mbh_06_u:2730: 06,032.035d*0101_02 saurabheyo gavām asmi snehānāṃ sarpir apy aham
GE07mbh_06_u:2732: 06,032.036a dyūtaṃ chalayatām asmi tejas tejasvinām aham
GE07mbh_06_u:2735: 06,032.037c munīnām apy ahaṃ vyāsaḥ kavīnām uśanā kaviḥ
GE07mbh_06_u:2736: 06,032.038a daṇḍo damayatām asmi nītir asmi jigīṣatām
GE07mbh_06_u:2737: 06,032.038c maunaṃ caivāsmi guhyānāṃ jñānaṃ jñānavatām aham
GE07mbh_06_u:2738: 06,032.039a yac cāpi sarvabhūtānāṃ bījaṃ tad aham arjuna
GE07mbh_06_u:2739: 06,032.039c na tad asti vinā yat syān mayā bhūtaṃ carācaram
GE07mbh_06_u:2741: 06,032.040c eṣa tūddeśataḥ prokto vibhūter vistaro mayā
GE07mbh_06_u:2742: 06,032.041a yad yad vibhūtimat sattvaṃ śrīmad ūrjitam eva vā
GE07mbh_06_u:2743: 06,032.041c tat tad evāvagaccha tvaṃ mama tejoṃśasaṃbhavam
GE07mbh_06_u:2744: 06,032.042a atha vā bahunaitena kiṃ jñātena tavārjuna
GE07mbh_06_u:2745: 06,032.042c viṣṭabhyāham idaṃ kṛtsnam ekāṃśena sthito jagat
GE07mbh_06_u:2748: 06,033.001c yat tvayoktaṃ vacas tena moho 'yaṃ vigato mama
GE07mbh_06_u:2749: 06,033.002a bhavāpyayau hi bhūtānāṃ śrutau vistaraśo mayā
GE07mbh_06_u:2751: 06,033.003a evam etad yathāttha tvam ātmānaṃ parameśvara
GE07mbh_06_u:2752: 06,033.003c draṣṭum icchāmi te rūpam aiśvaraṃ puruṣottama
GE07mbh_06_u:2753: 06,033.004a manyase yadi tac chakyaṃ mayā draṣṭum iti prabho
GE07mbh_06_u:2754: 06,033.004c yogeśvara tato me tvaṃ darśayātmānam avyayam
GE07mbh_06_u:2756: 06,033.005a paśya me pārtha rūpāṇi śataśo 'tha sahasraśaḥ
GE07mbh_06_u:2758: 06,033.006a paśyādityān vasūn rudrān aśvinau marutas tathā
GE07mbh_06_u:2761: 06,033.007c mama dehe guḍākeśa yac cānyad draṣṭum icchasi
GE07mbh_06_u:2762: 06,033.008a na tu māṃ śakyase draṣṭum anenaiva svacakṣuṣā
GE07mbh_06_u:2763: 06,033.008c divyaṃ dadāmi te cakṣuḥ paśya me yogam aiśvaram
GE07mbh_06_u:2765: 06,033.009a evam uktvā tato rājan mahāyogeśvaro hariḥ
GE07mbh_06_u:2766: 06,033.009c darśayām āsa pārthāya paramaṃ rūpam aiśvaram
GE07mbh_06_u:2772: 06,033.012c yadi bhāḥ sadṛśī sā syād bhāsas tasya mahātmanaḥ
GE07mbh_06_u:2778: 06,033.015a paśyāmi devāṃs tava deva dehe; sarvāṃs tathā bhūtaviśeṣasaṃghān
GE07mbh_06_u:2779: 06,033.015c brahmāṇam īśaṃ kamalāsanastham; ṛṣīṃś ca sarvān uragāṃś ca divyān
GE07mbh_06_u:2781: 06,033.016c nāntaṃ na madhyaṃ na punas tavādiṃ; paśyāmi viśveśvara viśvarūpa
GE07mbh_06_u:2782: 06,033.017a kirīṭinaṃ gadinaṃ cakriṇaṃ ca; tejorāśiṃ sarvato dīptimantam
GE07mbh_06_u:2783: 06,033.017c paśyāmi tvāṃ durnirīkṣyaṃ samantād; dīptānalārkadyutim aprameyam
GE07mbh_06_u:2784: 06,033.018a tvam akṣaraṃ paramaṃ veditavyaṃ; tvam asya viśvasya paraṃ nidhānam
GE07mbh_06_u:2785: 06,033.018c tvam avyayaḥ śāśvatadharmagoptā; sanātanas tvaṃ puruṣo mato me
GE07mbh_06_u:2787: 06,033.019c paśyāmi tvāṃ dīptahutāśavaktraṃ; svatejasā viśvam idaṃ tapantam
GE07mbh_06_u:2788: 06,033.020a dyāvāpṛthivyor idam antaraṃ hi; vyāptaṃ tvayaikena diśaś ca sarvāḥ
GE07mbh_06_u:2789: 06,033.020c dṛṣṭvādbhutaṃ rūpam idaṃ tavograṃ; lokatrayaṃ pravyathitaṃ mahātman
GE07mbh_06_u:2790: 06,033.021a amī hi tvā surasaṃghā viśanti; ke cid bhītāḥ prāñjalayo gṛṇanti
GE07mbh_06_u:2791: 06,033.021c svastīty uktvā maharṣisiddhasaṃghāḥ; stuvanti tvāṃ stutibhiḥ puṣkalābhiḥ
GE07mbh_06_u:2792: 06,033.022a rudrādityā vasavo ye ca sādhyā; viśve 'śvinau marutaś coṣmapāś ca
GE07mbh_06_u:2793: 06,033.022c gandharvayakṣāsurasiddhasaṃghā; vīkṣante tvā vismitāś caiva sarve
GE07mbh_06_u:2794: 06,033.023a rūpaṃ mahat te bahuvaktranetraṃ; mahābāho bahubāhūrupādam
GE07mbh_06_u:2795: 06,033.023c bahūdaraṃ bahudaṃṣṭrākarālaṃ; dṛṣṭvā lokāḥ pravyathitās tathāham
GE07mbh_06_u:2797: 06,033.024c dṛṣṭvā hi tvāṃ pravyathitāntarātmā; dhṛtiṃ na vindāmi śamaṃ ca viṣṇo
GE07mbh_06_u:2798: 06,033.025a daṃṣṭrākarālāni ca te mukhāni; dṛṣṭvaiva kālānalasaṃnibhāni
GE07mbh_06_u:2799: 06,033.025c diśo na jāne na labhe ca śarma; prasīda deveśa jagannivāsa
GE07mbh_06_u:2800: 06,033.026a amī ca tvāṃ dhṛtarāṣṭrasya putrāḥ; sarve sahaivāvanipālasaṃghaiḥ
GE07mbh_06_u:2801: 06,033.026c bhīṣmo droṇaḥ sūtaputras tathāsau; sahāsmadīyair api yodhamukhyaiḥ
GE07mbh_06_u:2802: 06,033.027a vaktrāṇi te tvaramāṇā viśanti; daṃṣṭrākarālāni bhayānakāni
GE07mbh_06_u:2811: 06,033.027c ke cid vilagnā daśanāntareṣu; saṃdṛśyante cūrṇitair uttamāṅgaiḥ
GE07mbh_06_u:2812: 06,033.028a yathā nadīnāṃ bahavo 'mbuvegāḥ; samudram evābhimukhā dravanti
GE07mbh_06_u:2813: 06,033.028c tathā tavāmī naralokavīrā; viśanti vaktrāṇy abhivijvalanti
GE07mbh_06_u:2814: 06,033.029a yathā pradīptaṃ jvalanaṃ pataṃgā; viśanti nāśāya samṛddhavegāḥ
GE07mbh_06_u:2815: 06,033.029c tathaiva nāśāya viśanti lokās; tavāpi vaktrāṇi samṛddhavegāḥ
GE07mbh_06_u:2816: 06,033.030a lelihyase grasamānaḥ samantāl; lokān samagrān vadanair jvaladbhiḥ
GE07mbh_06_u:2817: 06,033.030c tejobhir āpūrya jagat samagraṃ; bhāsas tavogrāḥ pratapanti viṣṇo
GE07mbh_06_u:2818: 06,033.031a ākhyāhi me ko bhavān ugrarūpo; namo 'stu te devavara prasīda
GE07mbh_06_u:2819: 06,033.031c vijñātum icchāmi bhavantam ādyaṃ; na hi prajānāmi tava pravṛttim
GE07mbh_06_u:2821: 06,033.032a kālo 'smi lokakṣayakṛt pravṛddho; lokān samāhartum iha pravṛttaḥ
GE07mbh_06_u:2822: 06,033.032c ṛte 'pi tvā na bhaviṣyanti sarve; ye 'vasthitāḥ pratyanīkeṣu yodhāḥ
GE07mbh_06_u:2823: 06,033.033a tasmāt tvam uttiṣṭha yaśo labhasva; jitvā śatrūn bhuṅkṣva rājyaṃ samṛddham
GE07mbh_06_u:2824: 06,033.033c mayaivaite nihatāḥ pūrvam eva; nimittamātraṃ bhava savyasācin
GE07mbh_06_u:2825: 06,033.034a droṇaṃ ca bhīṣmaṃ ca jayadrathaṃ ca; karṇaṃ tathānyān api yodhavīrān
GE07mbh_06_u:2826: 06,033.034c mayā hatāṃs tvaṃ jahi mā vyathiṣṭhā; yudhyasva jetāsi raṇe sapatnān
GE07mbh_06_u:2828: 06,033.035a etac chrutvā vacanaṃ keśavasya; kṛtāñjalir vepamānaḥ kirīṭī
GE07mbh_06_u:2829: 06,033.035c namaskṛtvā bhūya evāha kṛṣṇaṃ; sagadgadaṃ bhītabhītaḥ praṇamya
GE07mbh_06_u:2831: 06,033.036a sthāne hṛṣīkeśa tava prakīrtyā; jagat prahṛṣyaty anurajyate ca
GE07mbh_06_u:2832: 06,033.036c rakṣāṃsi bhītāni diśo dravanti; sarve namasyanti ca siddhasaṃghāḥ
GE07mbh_06_u:2833: 06,033.037a kasmāc ca te na nameran mahātman; garīyase brahmaṇo 'py ādikartre
GE07mbh_06_u:2834: 06,033.037c ananta deveśa jagannivāsa; tvam akṣaraṃ sad asat tatparaṃ yat
GE07mbh_06_u:2835: 06,033.038a tvam ādidevaḥ puruṣaḥ purāṇas; tvam asya viśvasya paraṃ nidhānam
GE07mbh_06_u:2836: 06,033.038c vettāsi vedyaṃ ca paraṃ ca dhāma; tvayā tataṃ viśvam anantarūpa
GE07mbh_06_u:2837: 06,033.039a vāyur yamo 'gnir varuṇaḥ śaśāṅkaḥ; prajāpatis tvaṃ prapitāmahaś ca
GE07mbh_06_u:2838: 06,033.039c namo namas te 'stu sahasrakṛtvaḥ; punaś ca bhūyo 'pi namo namas te
GE07mbh_06_u:2841: 06,033.040a namaḥ purastād atha pṛṣṭhatas te; namo 'stu te sarvata eva sarva
GE07mbh_06_u:2842: 06,033.040b*0105_01 na hi tvad anyaḥ kaś cid apīha deva
GE07mbh_06_u:2844: 06,033.040c anantavīryāmitavikramas tvaṃ; sarvaṃ samāpnoṣi tato 'si sarvaḥ
GE07mbh_06_u:2845: 06,033.041a sakheti matvā prasabhaṃ yad uktaṃ; he kṛṣṇa he yādava he sakheti
GE07mbh_06_u:2846: 06,033.041c ajānatā mahimānaṃ tavedaṃ; mayā pramādāt praṇayena vāpi
GE07mbh_06_u:2848: 06,033.042c eko 'tha vāpy acyuta tatsamakṣaṃ; tat kṣāmaye tvām aham aprameyam
GE07mbh_06_u:2849: 06,033.043a pitāsi lokasya carācarasya; tvam asya pūjyaś ca gurur garīyān
GE07mbh_06_u:2850: 06,033.043c na tvatsamo 'sty abhyadhikaḥ kuto 'nyo; lokatraye 'py apratimaprabhāva
GE07mbh_06_u:2851: 06,033.044a tasmāt praṇamya praṇidhāya kāyaṃ; prasādaye tvām aham īśam īḍyam
GE07mbh_06_u:2852: 06,033.044c piteva putrasya sakheva sakhyuḥ; priyaḥ priyāyārhasi deva soḍhum
GE07mbh_06_u:2856: 06,033.044d*0106_04 dhātā vidhātā ca vibhur bhavaś ca
GE07mbh_06_u:2860: 06,033.044d*0106_08 vibho tataḥ sarvam idaṃ tvam eva
GE07mbh_06_u:2861: 06,033.044d*0106_09 aty adbhutaṃ karma na duṣkaraṃ te
GE07mbh_06_u:2869: 06,033.045a adṛṣṭapūrvaṃ hṛṣito 'smi dṛṣṭvā; bhayena ca pravyathitaṃ mano me
GE07mbh_06_u:2870: 06,033.045c tad eva me darśaya deva rūpaṃ; prasīda deveśa jagannivāsa
GE07mbh_06_u:2871: 06,033.046a kirīṭinaṃ gadinaṃ cakrahastam; icchāmi tvāṃ draṣṭum ahaṃ tathaiva
GE07mbh_06_u:2872: 06,033.046c tenaiva rūpeṇa caturbhujena; sahasrabāho bhava viśvamūrte
GE07mbh_06_u:2874: 06,033.047a mayā prasannena tavārjunedaṃ; rūpaṃ paraṃ darśitam ātmayogāt
GE07mbh_06_u:2875: 06,033.047c tejomayaṃ viśvam anantam ādyaṃ; yan me tvad anyena na dṛṣṭapūrvam
GE07mbh_06_u:2876: 06,033.048a na vedayajñādhyayanair na dānair; na ca kriyābhir na tapobhir ugraiḥ
GE07mbh_06_u:2877: 06,033.048c evaṃrūpaḥ śakya ahaṃ nṛloke; draṣṭuṃ tvad anyena kurupravīra
GE07mbh_06_u:2878: 06,033.049a mā te vyathā mā ca vimūḍhabhāvo; dṛṣṭvā rūpaṃ ghoram īdṛṅ mamedam
GE07mbh_06_u:2879: 06,033.049c vyapetabhīḥ prītamanāḥ punas tvaṃ; tad eva me rūpam idaṃ prapaśya
GE07mbh_06_u:2881: 06,033.050a ity arjunaṃ vāsudevas tathoktvā; svakaṃ rūpaṃ darśayām āsa bhūyaḥ
GE07mbh_06_u:2882: 06,033.050c āśvāsayām āsa ca bhītam enaṃ; bhūtvā punaḥ saumyavapur mahātmā
GE07mbh_06_u:2884: 06,033.051a dṛṣṭvedaṃ mānuṣaṃ rūpaṃ tava saumyaṃ janārdana
GE07mbh_06_u:2885: 06,033.051c idānīm asmi saṃvṛttaḥ sacetāḥ prakṛtiṃ gataḥ
GE07mbh_06_u:2887: 06,033.052a sudurdarśam idaṃ rūpaṃ dṛṣṭavān asi yan mama
GE07mbh_06_u:2888: 06,033.052c devā apy asya rūpasya nityaṃ darśanakāṅkṣiṇaḥ
GE07mbh_06_u:2889: 06,033.053a nāhaṃ vedair na tapasā na dānena na cejyayā
GE07mbh_06_u:2890: 06,033.053c śakya evaṃvidho draṣṭuṃ dṛṣṭavān asi māṃ yathā
GE07mbh_06_u:2891: 06,033.054a bhaktyā tv ananyayā śakya aham evaṃvidho 'rjuna
GE07mbh_06_u:2892: 06,033.054c jñātuṃ draṣṭuṃ ca tattvena praveṣṭuṃ ca paraṃtapa
GE07mbh_06_u:2894: 06,033.055c nirvairaḥ sarvabhūteṣu yaḥ sa mām eti pāṇḍava
GE07mbh_06_u:2896: 06,034.001a evaṃ satatayuktā ye bhaktās tvāṃ paryupāsate
GE07mbh_06_u:2897: 06,034.001c ye cāpy akṣaram avyaktaṃ teṣāṃ ke yogavittamāḥ
GE07mbh_06_u:2899: 06,034.002a mayy āveśya mano ye māṃ nityayuktā upāsate
GE07mbh_06_u:2900: 06,034.002c śraddhayā parayopetās te me yuktatamā matāḥ
GE07mbh_06_u:2901: 06,034.003a ye tv akṣaram anirdeśyam avyaktaṃ paryupāsate
GE07mbh_06_u:2902: 06,034.003c sarvatragam acintyaṃ ca kūṭastham acalaṃ dhruvam
GE07mbh_06_u:2904: 06,034.004c te prāpnuvanti mām eva sarvabhūtahite ratāḥ
GE07mbh_06_u:2906: 06,034.005c avyaktā hi gatir duḥkhaṃ dehavadbhir avāpyate
GE07mbh_06_u:2907: 06,034.006a ye tu sarvāṇi karmāṇi mayi saṃnyasya matparāḥ
GE07mbh_06_u:2911: 06,034.008a mayy eva mana ādhatsva mayi buddhiṃ niveśaya
GE07mbh_06_u:2912: 06,034.008c nivasiṣyasi mayy eva ata ūrdhvaṃ na saṃśayaḥ
GE07mbh_06_u:2913: 06,034.009a atha cittaṃ samādhātuṃ na śaknoṣi mayi sthiram
GE07mbh_06_u:2916: 06,034.010c madartham api karmāṇi kurvan siddhim avāpsyasi
GE07mbh_06_u:2917: 06,034.011a athaitad apy aśakto 'si kartuṃ madyogam āśritaḥ
GE07mbh_06_u:2919: 06,034.012a śreyo hi jñānam abhyāsāj jñānād dhyānaṃ viśiṣyate
GE07mbh_06_u:2921: 06,034.013a adveṣṭā sarvabhūtānāṃ maitraḥ karuṇa eva ca
GE07mbh_06_u:2924: 06,034.014c mayy arpitamanobuddhir yo madbhaktaḥ sa me priyaḥ
GE07mbh_06_u:2925: 06,034.015a yasmān nodvijate loko lokān nodvijate ca yaḥ
GE07mbh_06_u:2926: 06,034.015c harṣāmarṣabhayodvegair mukto yaḥ sa ca me priyaḥ
GE07mbh_06_u:2928: 06,034.016c sarvārambhaparityāgī yo madbhaktaḥ sa me priyaḥ
GE07mbh_06_u:2929: 06,034.017a yo na hṛṣyati na dveṣṭi na śocati na kāṅkṣati
GE07mbh_06_u:2930: 06,034.017c śubhāśubhaparityāgī bhaktimān yaḥ sa me priyaḥ
GE07mbh_06_u:2931: 06,034.018a samaḥ śatrau ca mitre ca tathā mānāvamānayoḥ
GE07mbh_06_u:2933: 06,034.019a tulyanindāstutir maunī saṃtuṣṭo yena kena cit
GE07mbh_06_u:2934: 06,034.019c aniketaḥ sthiramatir bhaktimān me priyo naraḥ
GE07mbh_06_u:2935: 06,034.020a ye tu dharmyāmṛtam idaṃ yathoktaṃ paryupāsate
GE07mbh_06_u:2936: 06,034.020c śraddadhānā matparamā bhaktās te 'tīva me priyāḥ
GE07mbh_06_u:2938: 06,035.000*0108_01 prakṛtiṃ puruṣaṃ caiva kṣetraṃ kṣetrajñam eva ca
GE07mbh_06_u:2939: 06,035.000*0108_02 etad veditum icchāmi jñānaṃ jñeyaṃ ca keśava
GE07mbh_06_u:2941: 06,035.001*0109_01 prakṛtiṃ puruṣaṃ caiva kṣetraṃ kṣetrajñam eva ca
GE07mbh_06_u:2942: 06,035.001*0109_02 etat te kathayiṣyāmi jñānaṃ jñeyaṃ ca bhārata
GE07mbh_06_u:2943: 06,035.001a idaṃ śarīraṃ kaunteya kṣetram ity abhidhīyate
GE07mbh_06_u:2944: 06,035.001c etad yo vetti taṃ prāhuḥ kṣetrajña iti tadvidaḥ
GE07mbh_06_u:2945: 06,035.002a kṣetrajñaṃ cāpi māṃ viddhi sarvakṣetreṣu bhārata
GE07mbh_06_u:2946: 06,035.002c kṣetrakṣetrajñayor jñānaṃ yat taj jñānaṃ mataṃ mama
GE07mbh_06_u:2947: 06,035.003a tat kṣetraṃ yac ca yādṛk ca yadvikāri yataś ca yat
GE07mbh_06_u:2948: 06,035.003c sa ca yo yatprabhāvaś ca tat samāsena me śṛṇu
GE07mbh_06_u:2949: 06,035.004a ṛṣibhir bahudhā gītaṃ chandobhir vividhaiḥ pṛthak
GE07mbh_06_u:2951: 06,035.005a mahābhūtāny ahaṃkāro buddhir avyaktam eva ca
GE07mbh_06_u:2953: 06,035.006a icchā dveṣaḥ sukhaṃ duḥkhaṃ saṃghātaś cetanā dhṛtiḥ
GE07mbh_06_u:2964: 06,035.011c etaj jñānam iti proktam ajñānaṃ yad ato 'nyathā
GE07mbh_06_u:2965: 06,035.012a jñeyaṃ yat tat pravakṣyāmi yaj jñātvāmṛtam aśnute
GE07mbh_06_u:2966: 06,035.012c anādimat paraṃ brahma na sat tan nāsad ucyate
GE07mbh_06_u:2970: 06,035.014c asaktaṃ sarvabhṛc caiva nirguṇaṃ guṇabhoktṛ ca
GE07mbh_06_u:2971: 06,035.015a bahir antaś ca bhūtānām acaraṃ caram eva ca
GE07mbh_06_u:2972: 06,035.015c sūkṣmatvāt tad avijñeyaṃ dūrasthaṃ cāntike ca tat
GE07mbh_06_u:2973: 06,035.016a avibhaktaṃ ca bhūteṣu vibhaktam iva ca sthitam
GE07mbh_06_u:2974: 06,035.016c bhūtabhartṛ ca taj jñeyaṃ grasiṣṇu prabhaviṣṇu ca
GE07mbh_06_u:2975: 06,035.017a jyotiṣām api taj jyotis tamasaḥ param ucyate
GE07mbh_06_u:2976: 06,035.017c jñānaṃ jñeyaṃ jñānagamyaṃ hṛdi sarvasya viṣṭhitam
GE07mbh_06_u:2977: 06,035.018a iti kṣetraṃ tathā jñānaṃ jñeyaṃ coktaṃ samāsataḥ
GE07mbh_06_u:2979: 06,035.019a prakṛtiṃ puruṣaṃ caiva viddhy anādī ubhāv api
GE07mbh_06_u:2980: 06,035.019c vikārāṃś ca guṇāṃś caiva viddhi prakṛtisaṃbhavān
GE07mbh_06_u:2983: 06,035.021a puruṣaḥ prakṛtistho hi bhuṅkte prakṛtijān guṇān
GE07mbh_06_u:2986: 06,035.022c paramātmeti cāpy ukto dehe 'smin puruṣaḥ paraḥ
GE07mbh_06_u:2987: 06,035.023a ya evaṃ vetti puruṣaṃ prakṛtiṃ ca guṇaiḥ saha
GE07mbh_06_u:2989: 06,035.024a dhyānenātmani paśyanti ke cid ātmānam ātmanā
GE07mbh_06_u:2991: 06,035.025a anye tv evam ajānantaḥ śrutvānyebhya upāsate
GE07mbh_06_u:2993: 06,035.026a yāvat saṃjāyate kiṃ cit sattvaṃ sthāvarajaṅgamam
GE07mbh_06_u:2996: 06,035.027c vinaśyatsv avinaśyantaṃ yaḥ paśyati sa paśyati
GE07mbh_06_u:2997: 06,035.028a samaṃ paśyan hi sarvatra samavasthitam īśvaram
GE07mbh_06_u:2998: 06,035.028c na hinasty ātmanātmānaṃ tato yāti parāṃ gatim
GE07mbh_06_u:3000: 06,035.029c yaḥ paśyati tathātmānam akartāraṃ sa paśyati
GE07mbh_06_u:3002: 06,035.030c tata eva ca vistāraṃ brahma saṃpadyate tadā
GE07mbh_06_u:3004: 06,035.031c śarīrastho 'pi kaunteya na karoti na lipyate
GE07mbh_06_u:3007: 06,035.033a yathā prakāśayaty ekaḥ kṛtsnaṃ lokam imaṃ raviḥ
GE07mbh_06_u:3008: 06,035.033c kṣetraṃ kṣetrī tathā kṛtsnaṃ prakāśayati bhārata
GE07mbh_06_u:3010: 06,035.034c bhūtaprakṛtimokṣaṃ ca ye vidur yānti te param
GE07mbh_06_u:3012: 06,036.001a paraṃ bhūyaḥ pravakṣyāmi jñānānāṃ jñānam uttamam
GE07mbh_06_u:3013: 06,036.001c yaj jñātvā munayaḥ sarve parāṃ siddhim ito gatāḥ
GE07mbh_06_u:3014: 06,036.002a idaṃ jñānam upāśritya mama sādharmyam āgatāḥ
GE07mbh_06_u:3015: 06,036.002c sarge 'pi nopajāyante pralaye na vyathanti ca
GE07mbh_06_u:3016: 06,036.003a mama yonir mahad brahma tasmin garbhaṃ dadhāmy aham
GE07mbh_06_u:3019: 06,036.004c tāsāṃ brahma mahad yonir ahaṃ bījapradaḥ pitā
GE07mbh_06_u:3020: 06,036.005a sattvaṃ rajas tama iti guṇāḥ prakṛtisaṃbhavāḥ
GE07mbh_06_u:3026: 06,036.008a tamas tv ajñānajaṃ viddhi mohanaṃ sarvadehinām
GE07mbh_06_u:3028: 06,036.009a sattvaṃ sukhe sañjayati rajaḥ karmaṇi bhārata
GE07mbh_06_u:3029: 06,036.009c jñānam āvṛtya tu tamaḥ pramāde sañjayaty uta
GE07mbh_06_u:3030: 06,036.010a rajas tamaś cābhibhūya sattvaṃ bhavati bhārata
GE07mbh_06_u:3031: 06,036.010c rajaḥ sattvaṃ tamaś caiva tamaḥ sattvaṃ rajas tathā
GE07mbh_06_u:3033: 06,036.011c jñānaṃ yadā tadā vidyād vivṛddhaṃ sattvam ity uta
GE07mbh_06_u:3034: 06,036.012a lobhaḥ pravṛttir ārambhaḥ karmaṇām aśamaḥ spṛhā
GE07mbh_06_u:3036: 06,036.013a aprakāśo 'pravṛttiś ca pramādo moha eva ca
GE07mbh_06_u:3038: 06,036.014a yadā sattve pravṛddhe tu pralayaṃ yāti dehabhṛt
GE07mbh_06_u:3043: 06,036.016c rajasas tu phalaṃ duḥkham ajñānaṃ tamasaḥ phalam
GE07mbh_06_u:3044: 06,036.017a sattvāt saṃjāyate jñānaṃ rajaso lobha eva ca
GE07mbh_06_u:3046: 06,036.018a ūrdhvaṃ gacchanti sattvasthā madhye tiṣṭhanti rājasāḥ
GE07mbh_06_u:3049: 06,036.019c guṇebhyaś ca paraṃ vetti madbhāvaṃ so 'dhigacchati
GE07mbh_06_u:3050: 06,036.020a guṇān etān atītya trīn dehī dehasamudbhavān
GE07mbh_06_u:3053: 06,036.021a kair liṅgais trīn guṇān etān atīto bhavati prabho
GE07mbh_06_u:3054: 06,036.021c kimācāraḥ kathaṃ caitāṃs trīn guṇān ativartate
GE07mbh_06_u:3056: 06,036.022a prakāśaṃ ca pravṛttiṃ ca moham eva ca pāṇḍava
GE07mbh_06_u:3057: 06,036.022c na dveṣṭi saṃpravṛttāni na nivṛttāni kāṅkṣati
GE07mbh_06_u:3058: 06,036.023a udāsīnavad āsīno guṇair yo na vicālyate
GE07mbh_06_u:3059: 06,036.023c guṇā vartanta ity eva yo 'vatiṣṭhati neṅgate
GE07mbh_06_u:3070: 06,037.001c chandāṃsi yasya parṇāni yas taṃ veda sa vedavit
GE07mbh_06_u:3071: 06,037.002a adhaś cordhvaṃ prasṛtās tasya śākhā; guṇapravṛddhā viṣayapravālāḥ
GE07mbh_06_u:3072: 06,037.002c adhaś ca mūlāny anusaṃtatāni; karmānubandhīni manuṣyaloke
GE07mbh_06_u:3073: 06,037.003a na rūpam asyeha tathopalabhyate; nānto na cādir na ca saṃpratiṣṭhā
GE07mbh_06_u:3074: 06,037.003c aśvattham enaṃ suvirūḍhamūlam; asaṅgaśastreṇa dṛḍhena chittvā
GE07mbh_06_u:3075: 06,037.004a tataḥ padaṃ tatparimārgitavyaṃ; yasmin gatā na nivartanti bhūyaḥ
GE07mbh_06_u:3076: 06,037.004c tam eva cādyaṃ puruṣaṃ prapadye; yataḥ pravṛttiḥ prasṛtā purāṇī
GE07mbh_06_u:3078: 06,037.005c dvaṃdvair vimuktāḥ sukhaduḥkhasaṃjñair; gacchanty amūḍhāḥ padam avyayaṃ tat
GE07mbh_06_u:3079: 06,037.006a na tad bhāsayate sūryo na śaśāṅko na pāvakaḥ
GE07mbh_06_u:3080: 06,037.006c yad gatvā na nivartante tad dhāma paramaṃ mama
GE07mbh_06_u:3083: 06,037.008a śarīraṃ yad avāpnoti yac cāpy utkrāmatīśvaraḥ
GE07mbh_06_u:3085: 06,037.009a śrotraṃ cakṣuḥ sparśanaṃ ca rasanaṃ ghrāṇam eva ca
GE07mbh_06_u:3087: 06,037.010a utkrāmantaṃ sthitaṃ vāpi bhuñjānaṃ vā guṇānvitam
GE07mbh_06_u:3089: 06,037.011a yatanto yoginaś cainaṃ paśyanty ātmany avasthitam
GE07mbh_06_u:3092: 06,037.012c yac candramasi yac cāgnau tat tejo viddhi māmakam
GE07mbh_06_u:3093: 06,037.013a gām āviśya ca bhūtāni dhārayāmy aham ojasā
GE07mbh_06_u:3094: 06,037.013c puṣṇāmi cauṣadhīḥ sarvāḥ somo bhūtvā rasātmakaḥ
GE07mbh_06_u:3095: 06,037.014a ahaṃ vaiśvānaro bhūtvā prāṇināṃ deham āśritaḥ
GE07mbh_06_u:3097: 06,037.015a sarvasya cāhaṃ hṛdi saṃniviṣṭo; mattaḥ smṛtir jñānam apohanaṃ ca
GE07mbh_06_u:3098: 06,037.015c vedaiś ca sarvair aham eva vedyo; vedāntakṛd vedavid eva cāham
GE07mbh_06_u:3099: 06,037.016a dvāv imau puruṣau loke kṣaraś cākṣara eva ca
GE07mbh_06_u:3101: 06,037.017a uttamaḥ puruṣas tv anyaḥ paramātmety udāhṛtaḥ
GE07mbh_06_u:3102: 06,037.017c yo lokatrayam āviśya bibharty avyaya īśvaraḥ
GE07mbh_06_u:3103: 06,037.018a yasmāt kṣaram atīto 'ham akṣarād api cottamaḥ
GE07mbh_06_u:3104: 06,037.018c ato 'smi loke vede ca prathitaḥ puruṣottamaḥ
GE07mbh_06_u:3105: 06,037.019a yo mām evam asaṃmūḍho jānāti puruṣottamam
GE07mbh_06_u:3106: 06,037.019c sa sarvavid bhajati māṃ sarvabhāvena bhārata
GE07mbh_06_u:3107: 06,037.020a iti guhyatamaṃ śāstram idam uktaṃ mayānagha
GE07mbh_06_u:3108: 06,037.020c etad buddhvā buddhimān syāt kṛtakṛtyaś ca bhārata
GE07mbh_06_u:3111: 06,038.001c dānaṃ damaś ca yajñaś ca svādhyāyas tapa ārjavam
GE07mbh_06_u:3112: 06,038.002a ahiṃsā satyam akrodhas tyāgaḥ śāntir apaiśunam
GE07mbh_06_u:3113: 06,038.002c dayā bhūteṣv aloluptvaṃ mārdavaṃ hrīr acāpalam
GE07mbh_06_u:3114: 06,038.003a tejaḥ kṣamā dhṛtiḥ śaucam adroho nātimānitā
GE07mbh_06_u:3116: 06,038.004a dambho darpo 'timānaś ca krodhaḥ pāruṣyam eva ca
GE07mbh_06_u:3119: 06,038.005c mā śucaḥ saṃpadaṃ daivīm abhijāto 'si pāṇḍava
GE07mbh_06_u:3120: 06,038.006a dvau bhūtasargau loke 'smin daiva āsura eva ca
GE07mbh_06_u:3121: 06,038.006c daivo vistaraśaḥ prokta āsuraṃ pārtha me śṛṇu
GE07mbh_06_u:3122: 06,038.007a pravṛttiṃ ca nivṛttiṃ ca janā na vidur āsurāḥ
GE07mbh_06_u:3123: 06,038.007c na śaucaṃ nāpi cācāro na satyaṃ teṣu vidyate
GE07mbh_06_u:3124: 06,038.008a asatyam apratiṣṭhaṃ te jagad āhur anīśvaram
GE07mbh_06_u:3134: 06,038.013a idam adya mayā labdham idaṃ prāpsye manoratham
GE07mbh_06_u:3135: 06,038.013c idam astīdam api me bhaviṣyati punar dhanam
GE07mbh_06_u:3136: 06,038.014a asau mayā hataḥ śatrur haniṣye cāparān api
GE07mbh_06_u:3137: 06,038.014c īśvaro 'ham ahaṃ bhogī siddho 'haṃ balavān sukhī
GE07mbh_06_u:3144: 06,038.018a ahaṃkāraṃ balaṃ darpaṃ kāmaṃ krodhaṃ ca saṃśritāḥ
GE07mbh_06_u:3146: 06,038.019a tān ahaṃ dviṣataḥ krūrān saṃsāreṣu narādhamān
GE07mbh_06_u:3147: 06,038.019c kṣipāmy ajasram aśubhān āsurīṣv eva yoniṣu
GE07mbh_06_u:3148: 06,038.020a āsurīṃ yonim āpannā mūḍhā janmani janmani
GE07mbh_06_u:3149: 06,038.020c mām aprāpyaiva kaunteya tato yānty adhamāṃ gatim
GE07mbh_06_u:3151: 06,038.021c kāmaḥ krodhas tathā lobhas tasmād etat trayaṃ tyajet
GE07mbh_06_u:3152: 06,038.022a etair vimuktaḥ kaunteya tamodvārais tribhir naraḥ
GE07mbh_06_u:3153: 06,038.022c ācaraty ātmanaḥ śreyas tato yāti parāṃ gatim
GE07mbh_06_u:3155: 06,038.023c na sa siddhim avāpnoti na sukhaṃ na parāṃ gatim
GE07mbh_06_u:3160: 06,039.001c teṣāṃ niṣṭhā tu kā kṛṣṇa sattvam āho rajas tamaḥ
GE07mbh_06_u:3162: 06,039.002a trividhā bhavati śraddhā dehināṃ sā svabhāvajā
GE07mbh_06_u:3163: 06,039.002c sāttvikī rājasī caiva tāmasī ceti tāṃ śṛṇu
GE07mbh_06_u:3165: 06,039.003c śraddhāmayo 'yaṃ puruṣo yo yacchraddhaḥ sa eva saḥ
GE07mbh_06_u:3167: 06,039.004c pretān bhūtagaṇāṃś cānye yajante tāmasā janāḥ
GE07mbh_06_u:3168: 06,039.005a aśāstravihitaṃ ghoraṃ tapyante ye tapo janāḥ
GE07mbh_06_u:3172: 06,039.007a āhāras tv api sarvasya trividho bhavati priyaḥ
GE07mbh_06_u:3173: 06,039.007c yajñas tapas tathā dānaṃ teṣāṃ bhedam imaṃ śṛṇu
GE07mbh_06_u:3175: 06,039.008c rasyāḥ snigdhāḥ sthirā hṛdyā āhārāḥ sāttvikapriyāḥ
GE07mbh_06_u:3178: 06,039.010a yātayāmaṃ gatarasaṃ pūti paryuṣitaṃ ca yat
GE07mbh_06_u:3181: 06,039.011c yaṣṭavyam eveti manaḥ samādhāya sa sāttvikaḥ
GE07mbh_06_u:3182: 06,039.012a abhisaṃdhāya tu phalaṃ dambhārtham api caiva yat
GE07mbh_06_u:3183: 06,039.012c ijyate bharataśreṣṭha taṃ yajñaṃ viddhi rājasam
GE07mbh_06_u:3187: 06,039.014c brahmacaryam ahiṃsā ca śārīraṃ tapa ucyate
GE07mbh_06_u:3188: 06,039.015a anudvegakaraṃ vākyaṃ satyaṃ priyahitaṃ ca yat
GE07mbh_06_u:3191: 06,039.016c bhāvasaṃśuddhir ity etat tapo mānasam ucyate
GE07mbh_06_u:3192: 06,039.017a śraddhayā parayā taptaṃ tapas tat trividhaṃ naraiḥ
GE07mbh_06_u:3195: 06,039.018c kriyate tad iha proktaṃ rājasaṃ calam adhruvam
GE07mbh_06_u:3199: 06,039.020c deśe kāle ca pātre ca tad dānaṃ sāttvikaṃ smṛtam
GE07mbh_06_u:3200: 06,039.021a yat tu pratyupakārārthaṃ phalam uddiśya vā punaḥ
GE07mbh_06_u:3201: 06,039.021c dīyate ca parikliṣṭaṃ tad dānaṃ rājasaṃ smṛtam
GE07mbh_06_u:3202: 06,039.022a adeśakāle yad dānam apātrebhyaś ca dīyate
GE07mbh_06_u:3204: 06,039.023a oṃ tat sad iti nirdeśo brahmaṇas trividhaḥ smṛtaḥ
GE07mbh_06_u:3205: 06,039.023c brāhmaṇās tena vedāś ca yajñāś ca vihitāḥ purā
GE07mbh_06_u:3210: 06,039.026a sadbhāve sādhubhāve ca sad ity etat prayujyate
GE07mbh_06_u:3211: 06,039.026c praśaste karmaṇi tathā sacchabdaḥ pārtha yujyate
GE07mbh_06_u:3212: 06,039.027a yajñe tapasi dāne ca sthitiḥ sad iti cocyate
GE07mbh_06_u:3213: 06,039.027c karma caiva tadarthīyaṃ sad ity evābhidhīyate
GE07mbh_06_u:3214: 06,039.028a aśraddhayā hutaṃ dattaṃ tapas taptaṃ kṛtaṃ ca yat
GE07mbh_06_u:3215: 06,039.028c asad ity ucyate pārtha na ca tat pretya no iha
GE07mbh_06_u:3220: 06,040.002a kāmyānāṃ karmaṇāṃ nyāsaṃ saṃnyāsaṃ kavayo viduḥ
GE07mbh_06_u:3222: 06,040.003a tyājyaṃ doṣavad ity eke karma prāhur manīṣiṇaḥ
GE07mbh_06_u:3224: 06,040.004a niścayaṃ śṛṇu me tatra tyāge bharatasattama
GE07mbh_06_u:3226: 06,040.005a yajñadānatapaḥkarma na tyājyaṃ kāryam eva tat
GE07mbh_06_u:3227: 06,040.005c yajño dānaṃ tapaś caiva pāvanāni manīṣiṇām
GE07mbh_06_u:3228: 06,040.006a etāny api tu karmāṇi saṅgaṃ tyaktvā phalāni ca
GE07mbh_06_u:3229: 06,040.006c kartavyānīti me pārtha niścitaṃ matam uttamam
GE07mbh_06_u:3232: 06,040.008a duḥkham ity eva yat karma kāyakleśabhayāt tyajet
GE07mbh_06_u:3233: 06,040.008c sa kṛtvā rājasaṃ tyāgaṃ naiva tyāgaphalaṃ labhet
GE07mbh_06_u:3234: 06,040.009a kāryam ity eva yat karma niyataṃ kriyate 'rjuna
GE07mbh_06_u:3235: 06,040.009c saṅgaṃ tyaktvā phalaṃ caiva sa tyāgaḥ sāttviko mataḥ
GE07mbh_06_u:3236: 06,040.010a na dveṣṭy akuśalaṃ karma kuśale nānuṣajjate
GE07mbh_06_u:3238: 06,040.011a na hi dehabhṛtā śakyaṃ tyaktuṃ karmāṇy aśeṣataḥ
GE07mbh_06_u:3239: 06,040.011c yas tu karmaphalatyāgī sa tyāgīty abhidhīyate
GE07mbh_06_u:3240: 06,040.012a aniṣṭam iṣṭaṃ miśraṃ ca trividhaṃ karmaṇaḥ phalam
GE07mbh_06_u:3241: 06,040.012c bhavaty atyāgināṃ pretya na tu saṃnyāsināṃ kva cit
GE07mbh_06_u:3244: 06,040.014a adhiṣṭhānaṃ tathā kartā karaṇaṃ ca pṛthagvidham
GE07mbh_06_u:3245: 06,040.014c vividhāś ca pṛthakceṣṭā daivaṃ caivātra pañcamam
GE07mbh_06_u:3247: 06,040.015c nyāyyaṃ vā viparītaṃ vā pañcaite tasya hetavaḥ
GE07mbh_06_u:3248: 06,040.016a tatraivaṃ sati kartāram ātmānaṃ kevalaṃ tu yaḥ
GE07mbh_06_u:3249: 06,040.016c paśyaty akṛtabuddhitvān na sa paśyati durmatiḥ
GE07mbh_06_u:3250: 06,040.017a yasya nāhaṃkṛto bhāvo buddhir yasya na lipyate
GE07mbh_06_u:3251: 06,040.017c hatvāpi sa imāṃl lokān na hanti na nibadhyate
GE07mbh_06_u:3254: 06,040.019a jñānaṃ karma ca kartā ca tridhaiva guṇabhedataḥ
GE07mbh_06_u:3255: 06,040.019c procyate guṇasaṃkhyāne yathāvac chṛṇu tāny api
GE07mbh_06_u:3257: 06,040.020c avibhaktaṃ vibhakteṣu taj jñānaṃ viddhi sāttvikam
GE07mbh_06_u:3258: 06,040.021a pṛthaktvena tu yaj jñānaṃ nānābhāvān pṛthagvidhān
GE07mbh_06_u:3259: 06,040.021c vetti sarveṣu bhūteṣu taj jñānaṃ viddhi rājasam
GE07mbh_06_u:3260: 06,040.022a yat tu kṛtsnavad ekasmin kārye saktam ahaitukam
GE07mbh_06_u:3261: 06,040.022c atattvārthavad alpaṃ ca tat tāmasam udāhṛtam
GE07mbh_06_u:3263: 06,040.023c aphalaprepsunā karma yat tat sāttvikam ucyate
GE07mbh_06_u:3264: 06,040.024a yat tu kāmepsunā karma sāhaṃkāreṇa vā punaḥ
GE07mbh_06_u:3266: 06,040.025a anubandhaṃ kṣayaṃ hiṃsām anapekṣya ca pauruṣam
GE07mbh_06_u:3267: 06,040.025c mohād ārabhyate karma yat tat tāmasam ucyate
GE07mbh_06_u:3273: 06,040.028c viṣādī dīrghasūtrī ca kartā tāmasa ucyate
GE07mbh_06_u:3274: 06,040.029a buddher bhedaṃ dhṛteś caiva guṇatas trividhaṃ śṛṇu
GE07mbh_06_u:3276: 06,040.030a pravṛttiṃ ca nivṛttiṃ ca kāryākārye bhayābhaye
GE07mbh_06_u:3277: 06,040.030c bandhaṃ mokṣaṃ ca yā vetti buddhiḥ sā pārtha sāttvikī
GE07mbh_06_u:3278: 06,040.031a yayā dharmam adharmaṃ ca kāryaṃ cākāryam eva ca
GE07mbh_06_u:3279: 06,040.031c ayathāvat prajānāti buddhiḥ sā pārtha rājasī
GE07mbh_06_u:3280: 06,040.032a adharmaṃ dharmam iti yā manyate tamasāvṛtā
GE07mbh_06_u:3281: 06,040.032c sarvārthān viparītāṃś ca buddhiḥ sā pārtha tāmasī
GE07mbh_06_u:3285: 06,040.034c prasaṅgena phalākāṅkṣī dhṛtiḥ sā pārtha rājasī
GE07mbh_06_u:3286: 06,040.035a yayā svapnaṃ bhayaṃ śokaṃ viṣādaṃ madam eva ca
GE07mbh_06_u:3287: 06,040.035c na vimuñcati durmedhā dhṛtiḥ sā pārtha tāmasī
GE07mbh_06_u:3288: 06,040.036a sukhaṃ tv idānīṃ trividhaṃ śṛṇu me bharatarṣabha
GE07mbh_06_u:3289: 06,040.036c abhyāsād ramate yatra duḥkhāntaṃ ca nigacchati
GE07mbh_06_u:3293: 06,040.038c pariṇāme viṣam iva tat sukhaṃ rājasaṃ smṛtam
GE07mbh_06_u:3294: 06,040.039a yad agre cānubandhe ca sukhaṃ mohanam ātmanaḥ
GE07mbh_06_u:3296: 06,040.040a na tad asti pṛthivyāṃ vā divi deveṣu vā punaḥ
GE07mbh_06_u:3297: 06,040.040c sattvaṃ prakṛtijair muktaṃ yad ebhiḥ syāt tribhir guṇaiḥ
GE07mbh_06_u:3300: 06,040.042a śamo damas tapaḥ śaucaṃ kṣāntir ārjavam eva ca
GE07mbh_06_u:3302: 06,040.043a śauryaṃ tejo dhṛtir dākṣyaṃ yuddhe cāpy apalāyanam
GE07mbh_06_u:3306: 06,040.045a sve sve karmaṇy abhirataḥ saṃsiddhiṃ labhate naraḥ
GE07mbh_06_u:3307: 06,040.045c svakarmanirataḥ siddhiṃ yathā vindati tac chṛṇu
GE07mbh_06_u:3308: 06,040.046a yataḥ pravṛttir bhūtānāṃ yena sarvam idaṃ tatam
GE07mbh_06_u:3309: 06,040.046c svakarmaṇā tam abhyarcya siddhiṃ vindati mānavaḥ
GE07mbh_06_u:3313: 06,040.048a sahajaṃ karma kaunteya sadoṣam api na tyajet
GE07mbh_06_u:3317: 06,040.050a siddhiṃ prāpto yathā brahma tathāpnoti nibodha me
GE07mbh_06_u:3318: 06,040.050c samāsenaiva kaunteya niṣṭhā jñānasya yā parā
GE07mbh_06_u:3319: 06,040.051a buddhyā viśuddhayā yukto dhṛtyātmānaṃ niyamya ca
GE07mbh_06_u:3320: 06,040.051c śabdādīn viṣayāṃs tyaktvā rāgadveṣau vyudasya ca
GE07mbh_06_u:3323: 06,040.053a ahaṃkāraṃ balaṃ darpaṃ kāmaṃ krodhaṃ parigraham
GE07mbh_06_u:3325: 06,040.054a brahmabhūtaḥ prasannātmā na śocati na kāṅkṣati
GE07mbh_06_u:3326: 06,040.054c samaḥ sarveṣu bhūteṣu madbhaktiṃ labhate parām
GE07mbh_06_u:3327: 06,040.055a bhaktyā mām abhijānāti yāvān yaś cāsmi tattvataḥ
GE07mbh_06_u:3328: 06,040.055c tato māṃ tattvato jñātvā viśate tadanantaram
GE07mbh_06_u:3334: 06,040.058c atha cet tvam ahaṃkārān na śroṣyasi vinaṅkṣyasi
GE07mbh_06_u:3335: 06,040.059a yad ahaṃkāram āśritya na yotsya iti manyase
GE07mbh_06_u:3336: 06,040.059c mithyaiṣa vyavasāyas te prakṛtis tvāṃ niyokṣyati
GE07mbh_06_u:3338: 06,040.060c kartuṃ necchasi yan mohāt kariṣyasy avaśo 'pi tat
GE07mbh_06_u:3341: 06,040.062a tam eva śaraṇaṃ gaccha sarvabhāvena bhārata
GE07mbh_06_u:3342: 06,040.062c tatprasādāt parāṃ śāntiṃ sthānaṃ prāpsyasi śāśvatam
GE07mbh_06_u:3343: 06,040.063a iti te jñānam ākhyātaṃ guhyād guhyataraṃ mayā
GE07mbh_06_u:3345: 06,040.064a sarvaguhyatamaṃ bhūyaḥ śṛṇu me paramaṃ vacaḥ
GE07mbh_06_u:3346: 06,040.064c iṣṭo 'si me dṛḍham iti tato vakṣyāmi te hitam
GE07mbh_06_u:3347: 06,040.065a manmanā bhava madbhakto madyājī māṃ namaskuru
GE07mbh_06_u:3348: 06,040.065c mām evaiṣyasi satyaṃ te pratijāne priyo 'si me
GE07mbh_06_u:3349: 06,040.066a sarvadharmān parityajya mām ekaṃ śaraṇaṃ vraja
GE07mbh_06_u:3350: 06,040.066c ahaṃ tvā sarvapāpebhyo mokṣayiṣyāmi mā śucaḥ
GE07mbh_06_u:3351: 06,040.067a idaṃ te nātapaskāya nābhaktāya kadā cana
GE07mbh_06_u:3352: 06,040.067c na cāśuśrūṣave vācyaṃ na ca māṃ yo 'bhyasūyati
GE07mbh_06_u:3353: 06,040.068a ya idaṃ paramaṃ guhyaṃ madbhakteṣv abhidhāsyati
GE07mbh_06_u:3354: 06,040.068c bhaktiṃ mayi parāṃ kṛtvā mām evaiṣyaty asaṃśayaḥ
GE07mbh_06_u:3355: 06,040.069a na ca tasmān manuṣyeṣu kaś cin me priyakṛttamaḥ
GE07mbh_06_u:3356: 06,040.069c bhavitā na ca me tasmād anyaḥ priyataro bhuvi
GE07mbh_06_u:3357: 06,040.070a adhyeṣyate ca ya imaṃ dharmyaṃ saṃvādam āvayoḥ
GE07mbh_06_u:3358: 06,040.070c jñānayajñena tenāham iṣṭaḥ syām iti me matiḥ
GE07mbh_06_u:3359: 06,040.071a śraddhāvān anasūyaś ca śṛṇuyād api yo naraḥ
GE07mbh_06_u:3360: 06,040.071c so 'pi muktaḥ śubhāṃl lokān prāpnuyāt puṇyakarmaṇām
GE07mbh_06_u:3361: 06,040.072a kaccid etac chrutaṃ pārtha tvayaikāgreṇa cetasā
GE07mbh_06_u:3364: 06,040.073a naṣṭo mohaḥ smṛtir labdhā tvatprasādān mayācyuta
GE07mbh_06_u:3367: 06,040.074a ity ahaṃ vāsudevasya pārthasya ca mahātmanaḥ
GE07mbh_06_u:3369: 06,040.075a vyāsaprasādāc chrutavān etad guhyam ahaṃ param
GE07mbh_06_u:3370: 06,040.075c yogaṃ yogeśvarāt kṛṣṇāt sākṣāt kathayataḥ svayam
GE07mbh_06_u:3371: 06,040.076a rājan saṃsmṛtya saṃsmṛtya saṃvādam imam adbhutam
GE07mbh_06_u:3372: 06,040.076c keśavārjunayoḥ puṇyaṃ hṛṣyāmi ca muhur muhuḥ
GE07mbh_06_u:3373: 06,040.077a tac ca saṃsmṛtya saṃsmṛtya rūpam atyadbhutaṃ hareḥ
GE07mbh_06_u:3374: 06,040.077c vismayo me mahān rājan hṛṣyāmi ca punaḥ punaḥ
GE07mbh_06_u:3375: 06,040.078a yatra yogeśvaraḥ kṛṣṇo yatra pārtho dhanurdharaḥ
GE07mbh_06_u:3376: 06,040.078c tatra śrīr vijayo bhūtir dhruvā nītir matir mama
GE07mbh_06_u:3379: 06,040.078d*0112_01 ṣaṭ śatāni saviṃśāni ślokānāṃ prāha keśavaḥ
GE07mbh_06_u:3381: 06,040.078d*0112_03 dhṛtarāṣṭraḥ ślokam ekaṃ gītāyā mānam ucyate
GE07mbh_06_u:3383: 06,040.078d*0113_01 gītā sugītā kartavyā kim anyaiḥ śāstravistaraiḥ
GE07mbh_06_u:3387: 06,040.078d*0113_05 gaṅgā gītā ca gāyatrī govindeti hṛdi sthite
GE07mbh_06_u:3390: 06,040.078d*0114_02 sāram uddhṛtya kṛṣṇena arjunasya mukhe hutam
GE07mbh_06_u:3392: 06,040.078d@003A_0001 yad etan niṣkalaṃ brahma vyomātītaṃ nirañjanam |
GE07mbh_06_u:3401: 06,040.078d@003A_0009 yat tat parataraṃ jyotir dhruvāt parataraṃ sthitam |
GE07mbh_06_u:3402: 06,040.078d@003A_0010 ācaturyugam adyāpi kathitaṃ na hi kasya cit || (5)
GE07mbh_06_u:3403: 06,040.078d@003A_0011 ātmadehe mayā sṛṣṭā prakṛtiḥ kṣetram eva ca |
GE07mbh_06_u:3404: 06,040.078d@003A_0012 sakalaṃ tu bhavet kṣetraṃ niṣkalaṃ paramaṃ padam || (6)
GE07mbh_06_u:3408: 06,040.078d@003A_0016 teṣāṃ na vidyate niṣṭhā sarvaiḥ pāṣaṇḍibhiḥ saha || (8)
GE07mbh_06_u:3409: 06,040.078d@003A_0017 kathitaṃ ca mayā jñānaṃ devānām api durlabham |
GE07mbh_06_u:3412: 06,040.078d@003A_0020 aprakāśam idaṃ praśnaṃ yan mayā kathitaṃ tava || (10)

GE07mbh_06_u:4060: 06,043.033a tasya vai dakṣiṇaṃ vīro nirbibheda raṇe bhujam

GE07mbh_06_u:4098: 06,043.052a drupadas tu tato rājā saindhavaṃ vai jayadratham

GE07mbh_06_u:4125: 06,043.065c śarair bahubhir ānarchad dārayann iva sarvaśaḥ

GE07mbh_06_u:4129: 06,043.067c nanāda sumahan nādaṃ tat sainyaṃ pratyapūrayat
GE07mbh_06_u:4130: 06,043.068a śrutāyus tv atha saṃkruddhaḥ phālguneḥ samare hayān

GE07mbh_06_u:4140: 06,043.073a kekayā bhrātaraḥ pañca gāndhārān pañca māriṣa
