GE07mbh_06_u:5923: 06,055.035c abhajyata mahārāja na ca dvau saha dhāvataḥ
GE07mbh_06_u:5926: 06,055.037a jaghānātra pitā putraṃ putraś ca pitaraṃ tathā
GE07mbh_06_u:5933: 06,055.040c uvāca pārthaṃ bībhatsuṃ nigṛhya ratham uttamam
GE07mbh_06_u:5934: 06,055.041a ayaṃ sa kālaḥ saṃprāptaḥ pārtha yaḥ kāṅkṣitas tvayā
GE07mbh_06_u:5935: 06,055.041c praharāsmai naravyāghra na cen mohād vimuhyase
GE07mbh_06_u:5936: 06,055.042a yat tvayā kathitaṃ vīra purā rājñāṃ samāgame
GE07mbh_06_u:5938: 06,055.043a sānubandhān haniṣyāmi ye māṃ yotsyanti saṃyuge
GE07mbh_06_u:5939: 06,055.043c iti tat kuru kaunteya satyaṃ vākyam ariṃdama
GE07mbh_06_u:5940: 06,055.044a bībhatso paśya sainyaṃ svaṃ bhajyamānaṃ samantataḥ
GE07mbh_06_u:5941: 06,055.044c dravataś ca mahīpālān sarvān yaudhiṣṭhire bale
GE07mbh_06_u:5942: 06,055.045a dṛṣṭvā hi samare bhīṣmaṃ vyāttānanam ivāntakam
GE07mbh_06_u:5948: 06,055.047c yato bhīṣmaratho rājan duṣprekṣyo raśmimān iva
GE07mbh_06_u:5949: 06,055.048a tatas tat punar āvṛttaṃ yudhiṣṭhirabalaṃ mahat
GE07mbh_06_u:5951: 06,055.049a tato bhīṣmaḥ kuruśreṣṭhaḥ siṃhavad vinadan muhuḥ
GE07mbh_06_u:5953: 06,055.050a kṣaṇena sa rathas tasya sahayaḥ sahasārathiḥ
GE07mbh_06_u:5955: 06,055.051a vāsudevas tv asaṃbhrānto dhairyam āsthāya sattvavān
GE07mbh_06_u:5956: 06,055.051c codayām āsa tān aśvān vitunnān bhīṣmasāyakaiḥ
GE07mbh_06_u:5957: 06,055.052a tataḥ pārtho dhanur gṛhya divyaṃ jaladanisvanam
GE07mbh_06_u:5958: 06,055.052c pātayām āsa bhīṣmasya dhanuś chittvā tribhiḥ śaraiḥ
GE07mbh_06_u:5959: 06,055.053a sa cchinnadhanvā kauravyaḥ punar anyan mahad dhanuḥ
GE07mbh_06_u:5962: 06,055.054c athāsya tad api kruddhaś ciccheda dhanur arjunaḥ
GE07mbh_06_u:5963: 06,055.055a tasya tat pūjayām āsa lāghavaṃ śaṃtanoḥ sutaḥ
GE07mbh_06_u:5964: 06,055.055c sādhu pārtha mahābāho sādhu bho pāṇḍunandana
GE07mbh_06_u:5965: 06,055.056a tvayy evaitad yuktarūpaṃ mahat karma dhanaṃjaya
GE07mbh_06_u:5966: 06,055.056c prīto 'smi sudṛḍhaṃ putra kuru yuddhaṃ mayā saha
GE07mbh_06_u:5967: 06,055.057a iti pārthaṃ praśasyātha pragṛhyānyan mahad dhanuḥ
GE07mbh_06_u:5968: 06,055.057c mumoca samare vīraḥ śarān pārtharathaṃ prati
GE07mbh_06_u:5970: 06,055.058c moghān kurvañ śarāṃs tasya maṇḍalāny acaral laghu
GE07mbh_06_u:5976: 06,055.061c kṛṣṇayor yudhi saṃrabdho bhīṣmo vyāvārayad diśaḥ
GE07mbh_06_u:5979: 06,055.062a vārṣṇeyaṃ ca śarais tīkṣṇaiḥ kampayām āsa roṣitaḥ
GE07mbh_06_u:5980: 06,055.062c muhur abhyutsmayan bhīṣmaḥ prahasya svanavat tadā
GE07mbh_06_u:5981: 06,055.063a tataḥ kṛṣṇas tu samare dṛṣṭvā bhīṣmaparākramam
GE07mbh_06_u:5983: 06,055.064a bhīṣmaṃ ca śaravarṣāṇi sṛjantam aniśaṃ yudhi
GE07mbh_06_u:5986: 06,055.065c yugāntam iva kurvāṇaṃ bhīṣmaṃ yaudhiṣṭhire bale
GE07mbh_06_u:5989: 06,055.067a ekāhnā hi raṇe bhīṣmo nāśayed devadānavān
GE07mbh_06_u:5990: 06,055.067c kim u pāṇḍusutān yuddhe sabalān sapadānugān
GE07mbh_06_u:5991: 06,055.068a dravate ca mahat sainyaṃ pāṇḍavasya mahātmanaḥ
GE07mbh_06_u:5992: 06,055.068c ete ca kauravās tūrṇaṃ prabhagnān dṛśya somakān
GE07mbh_06_u:5994: 06,055.069a so 'haṃ bhīṣmaṃ nihanmy adya pāṇḍavārthāya daṃśitaḥ
GE07mbh_06_u:5996: 06,055.070a arjuno 'pi śarais tīkṣṇair vadhyamāno hi saṃyuge
GE07mbh_06_u:5998: 06,055.071a tathā cintayatas tasya bhūya eva pitāmahaḥ
GE07mbh_06_u:5999: 06,055.071c preṣayām āsa saṃkruddhaḥ śarān pārtharathaṃ prati
GE07mbh_06_u:6000: 06,055.072a teṣāṃ bahutvād dhi bhṛśaṃ śarāṇāṃ; diśo 'tha sarvāḥ pihitā babhūvuḥ
GE07mbh_06_u:6001: 06,055.072c na cāntarikṣaṃ na diśo na bhūmir; na bhāskaro 'dṛśyata raśmimālī
GE07mbh_06_u:6002: 06,055.072e vavuś ca vātās tumulāḥ sadhūmā; diśaś ca sarvāḥ kṣubhitā babhūvuḥ
GE07mbh_06_u:6003: 06,055.073a droṇo vikarṇo 'tha jayadrathaś ca; bhūriśravāḥ kṛtavarmā kṛpaś ca
GE07mbh_06_u:6004: 06,055.073c śrutāyur ambaṣṭhapatiś ca rājā; vindānuvindau ca sudakṣiṇaś ca
GE07mbh_06_u:6005: 06,055.074a prācyāś ca sauvīragaṇāś ca sarve; vasātayaḥ kṣudrakamālavāś ca
GE07mbh_06_u:6009: 06,055.075c kirīṭinaṃ saṃparivāryamāṇaṃ; śiner naptā vāraṇayūthapaiś ca
GE07mbh_06_u:6012: 06,055.077a sa tāny anīkāni mahādhanuṣmāñ; śinipravīraḥ sahasābhipatya
GE07mbh_06_u:6013: 06,055.077c cakāra sāhāyyam athārjunasya; viṣṇur yathā vṛtraniṣūdanasya
GE07mbh_06_u:6016: 06,055.079a kva kṣatriyā yāsyatha naiṣa dharmaḥ; satāṃ purastāt kathitaḥ purāṇaiḥ
GE07mbh_06_u:6017: 06,055.079c mā svāṃ pratijñāṃ jahata pravīrāḥ; svaṃ vīradharmaṃ paripālayadhvam
GE07mbh_06_u:6018: 06,055.080a tān vāsavān antarajo niśamya; narendramukhyān dravataḥ samantāt
GE07mbh_06_u:6019: 06,055.080c pārthasya dṛṣṭvā mṛduyuddhatāṃ ca; bhīṣmaṃ ca saṃkhye samudīryamāṇam
GE07mbh_06_u:6020: 06,055.081a amṛṣyamāṇaḥ sa tato mahātmā; yaśasvinaṃ sarvadaśārhabhartā
GE07mbh_06_u:6021: 06,055.081c uvāca śaineyam abhipraśaṃsan; dṛṣṭvā kurūn āpatataḥ samantāt
GE07mbh_06_u:6022: 06,055.082a ye yānti yāntv eva śinipravīra; ye 'pi sthitāḥ sātvata te 'pi yāntu
GE07mbh_06_u:6023: 06,055.082c bhīṣmaṃ rathāt paśya nipātyamānaṃ; droṇaṃ ca saṃkhye sagaṇaṃ mayādya
GE07mbh_06_u:6024: 06,055.083a nāsau rathaḥ sātvata kauravāṇāṃ; kruddhasya mucyeta raṇe 'dya kaś cit
GE07mbh_06_u:6025: 06,055.083c tasmād ahaṃ gṛhya rathāṅgam ugraṃ; prāṇaṃ hariṣyāmi mahāvratasya
GE07mbh_06_u:6026: 06,055.084a nihatya bhīṣmaṃ sagaṇaṃ tathājau; droṇaṃ ca śaineya rathapravīram
GE07mbh_06_u:6027: 06,055.084c prītiṃ kariṣyāmi dhanaṃjayasya; rājñaś ca bhīmasya tathāśvinoś ca
GE07mbh_06_u:6028: 06,055.085a nihatya sarvān dhṛtarāṣṭraputrāṃs; tatpakṣiṇo ye ca narendramukhyāḥ
GE07mbh_06_u:6029: 06,055.085c rājyena rājānam ajātaśatruṃ; saṃpādayiṣyāmy aham adya hṛṣṭaḥ
GE07mbh_06_u:6035: 06,055.086c kṣurāntam udyamya bhujena cakraṃ; rathād avaplutya visṛjya vāhān
GE07mbh_06_u:6036: 06,055.087a saṃkampayan gāṃ caraṇair mahātmā; vegena kṛṣṇaḥ prasasāra bhīṣmam
GE07mbh_06_u:6037: 06,055.087c madāndham ājau samudīrṇadarpaḥ; siṃho jighāṃsann iva vāraṇendram
GE07mbh_06_u:6038: 06,055.088a so 'bhyadravad bhīṣmam anīkamadhye; kruddho mahendrāvarajaḥ pramāthī
GE07mbh_06_u:6040: 06,055.089a sudarśanaṃ cāsya rarāja śaures; tac cakrapadmaṃ subhujorunālam
GE07mbh_06_u:6044: 06,055.091a tam āttacakraṃ praṇadantam uccaiḥ; kruddhaṃ mahendrāvarajaṃ samīkṣya
GE07mbh_06_u:6045: 06,055.091c sarvāṇi bhūtāni bhṛśaṃ vineduḥ; kṣayaṃ kurūṇām iti cintayitvā
GE07mbh_06_u:6046: 06,055.092a sa vāsudevaḥ pragṛhītacakraḥ; saṃvartayiṣyann iva jīvalokam
GE07mbh_06_u:6047: 06,055.092c abhyutpataṃl lokagurur babhāse; bhūtāni dhakṣyann iva kālavahniḥ
GE07mbh_06_u:6048: 06,055.093a tam āpatantaṃ pragṛhītacakraṃ; samīkṣya devaṃ dvipadāṃ variṣṭham
GE07mbh_06_u:6054: 06,055.094a ehy ehi deveśa jagannivāsa; namo 'stu te śārṅgarathāṅgapāṇe
GE07mbh_06_u:6055: 06,055.094c prasahya māṃ pātaya lokanātha; rathottamād bhūtaśaraṇya saṃkhye
GE07mbh_06_u:6057: 06,055.095a tvayā hatasyeha mamādya kṛṣṇa; śreyaḥ parasminn iha caiva loke
GE07mbh_06_u:6058: 06,055.095c saṃbhāvito 'smy andhakavṛṣṇinātha; lokais tribhir vīra tavābhiyānāt
GE07mbh_06_u:6073: 06,055.095d*0204_15 śrotā hitaṃ yasya na kaś cid asti
GE07mbh_06_u:6074: 06,055.095d*0204_16 vaktā bhṛśaṃ syāt sa tu kiṃ bravītu
GE07mbh_06_u:6075: 06,055.096a rathād avaplutya tatas tvarāvān; pārtho 'py anudrutya yadupravīram
GE07mbh_06_u:6077: 06,055.097a nigṛhyamāṇaś ca tadādidevo; bhṛśaṃ saroṣaḥ kila nāma yogī
GE07mbh_06_u:6078: 06,055.097c ādāya vegena jagāma viṣṇur; jiṣṇuṃ mahāvāta ivaikavṛkṣam
GE07mbh_06_u:6079: 06,055.098a pārthas tu viṣṭabhya balena pādau; bhīṣmāntikaṃ tūrṇam abhidravantam
GE07mbh_06_u:6080: 06,055.098c balān nijagrāha kirīṭamālī; pade 'tha rājan daśame kathaṃ cit
GE07mbh_06_u:6081: 06,055.099a avasthitaṃ ca praṇipatya kṛṣṇaṃ; prīto 'rjunaḥ kāñcanacitramālī
GE07mbh_06_u:6082: 06,055.099c uvāca kopaṃ pratisaṃhareti; gatir bhavān keśava pāṇḍavānām
GE07mbh_06_u:6083: 06,055.100a na hāsyate karma yathāpratijñaṃ; putraiḥ śape keśava sodaraiś ca
GE07mbh_06_u:6084: 06,055.100c antaṃ kariṣyāmi yathā kurūṇāṃ; tvayāham indrānuja saṃprayuktaḥ
GE07mbh_06_u:6085: 06,055.101a tataḥ pratijñāṃ samayaṃ ca tasmai; janārdanaḥ prītamanā niśamya
GE07mbh_06_u:6086: 06,055.101c sthitaḥ priye kauravasattamasya; rathaṃ sacakraḥ punar āruroha
GE07mbh_06_u:6091: 06,055.102a sa tān abhīṣūn punar ādadānaḥ; pragṛhya śaṅkhaṃ dviṣatāṃ nihantā
GE07mbh_06_u:6092: 06,055.102c vinādayām āsa tato diśaś ca; sa pāñcajanyasya raveṇa śauriḥ
GE07mbh_06_u:6096: 06,055.104c sasiṃhanādāś ca babhūvur ugrāḥ; sarveṣv anīkeṣu tataḥ kurūṇām
GE07mbh_06_u:6097: 06,055.105a gāṇḍīvaghoṣaḥ stanayitnukalpo; jagāma pārthasya nabho diśaś ca
GE07mbh_06_u:6098: 06,055.105c jagmuś ca bāṇā vimalāḥ prasannāḥ; sarvā diśaḥ pāṇḍavacāpamuktāḥ
GE07mbh_06_u:6099: 06,055.106a taṃ kauravāṇām adhipo balena; bhīṣmeṇa bhūriśravasā ca sārdham
GE07mbh_06_u:6100: 06,055.106c abhyudyayāv udyatabāṇapāṇiḥ; kakṣaṃ didhakṣann iva dhūmaketuḥ
GE07mbh_06_u:6101: 06,055.107a athārjunāya prajahāra bhallān; bhūriśravāḥ sapta suvarṇapuṅkhān
GE07mbh_06_u:6102: 06,055.107c duryodhanas tomaram ugravegaṃ; śalyo gadāṃ śāṃtanavaś ca śaktim
GE07mbh_06_u:6103: 06,055.108a sa saptabhiḥ sapta śarapravekān; saṃvārya bhūriśravasā visṛṣṭān
GE07mbh_06_u:6104: 06,055.108c śitena duryodhanabāhumuktaṃ; kṣureṇa tat tomaram unmamātha
GE07mbh_06_u:6105: 06,055.109a tataḥ śubhām āpatatīṃ sa śaktiṃ; vidyutprabhāṃ śāṃtanavena muktām
GE07mbh_06_u:6106: 06,055.109c gadāṃ ca madrādhipabāhumuktāṃ; dvābhyāṃ śarābhyāṃ nicakarta vīraḥ
GE07mbh_06_u:6107: 06,055.110a tato bhujābhyāṃ balavad vikṛṣya; citraṃ dhanur gāṇḍivam aprameyam
GE07mbh_06_u:6108: 06,055.110c māhendram astraṃ vidhivat sughoraṃ; prāduścakārādbhutam antarikṣe
GE07mbh_06_u:6109: 06,055.111a tenottamāstreṇa tato mahātmā; sarvāṇy anīkāni mahādhanuṣmān
GE07mbh_06_u:6115: 06,055.112a śilīmukhāḥ pārthadhanuḥpramuktā; rathān dhvajāgrāṇi dhanūṃṣi bāhūn
GE07mbh_06_u:6117: 06,055.113a tato diśaś cānudiśaś ca pārthaḥ; śaraiḥ sudhārair niśitair vitatya
GE07mbh_06_u:6118: 06,055.113c gāṇḍīvaśabdena manāṃsi teṣāṃ; kirīṭamālī vyathayāṃ cakāra
GE07mbh_06_u:6119: 06,055.114a tasmiṃs tathā ghoratame pravṛtte; śaṅkhasvanā dundubhinisvanāś ca
GE07mbh_06_u:6120: 06,055.114c antarhitā gāṇḍivanisvanena; bhabhūvur ugrāś ca raṇapraṇādāḥ
GE07mbh_06_u:6121: 06,055.115a gāṇḍīvaśabdaṃ tam atho viditvā; virāṭarājapramukhā nṛvīrāḥ
GE07mbh_06_u:6122: 06,055.115c pāñcālarājo drupadaś ca vīras; taṃ deśam ājagmur adīnasattvāḥ
GE07mbh_06_u:6123: 06,055.116a sarvāṇi sainyāni tu tāvakāni; yato yato gāṇḍivajaḥ praṇādaḥ
GE07mbh_06_u:6124: 06,055.116c tatas tataḥ saṃnatim eva jagmur; na taṃ pratīpo 'bhisasāra kaś cit
GE07mbh_06_u:6126: 06,055.117a tasmin sughore nṛpasaṃprahāre; hatāḥ pravīrāḥ sarathāḥ sasūtāḥ
GE07mbh_06_u:6129: 06,055.118c dṛḍhāhatāḥ patribhir ugravegaiḥ; pārthena bhallair niśitaiḥ śitāgraiḥ
GE07mbh_06_u:6131: 06,055.119c padātisaṃghāś ca rathāś ca saṃkhye; hayāś ca nāgāś ca dhanaṃjayena
GE07mbh_06_u:6132: 06,055.120a bāṇāhatās tūrṇam apetasattvā; viṣṭabhya gātrāṇi nipetur urvyām
GE07mbh_06_u:6135: 06,055.121c nadī sughorā naradehaphenā; pravartitā tatra raṇājire vai
GE07mbh_06_u:6145: 06,055.124c tāṃ kaṅkamālāvṛtagṛdhrakahvaiḥ; kravyādasaṃghaiś ca tarakṣubhiś ca
GE07mbh_06_u:6150: 06,055.126a te cedipāñcālakarūṣamatsyāḥ; pārthāś ca sarve sahitāḥ praṇeduḥ
GE07mbh_06_u:6155: 06,055.126c vitrāsya senāṃ dhvajinīpatīnāṃ; siṃho mṛgāṇām iva yūthasaṃghān
GE07mbh_06_u:6158: 06,055.126e vinedatus tāv atiharṣayuktau; gāṇḍīvadhanvā ca janārdanaś ca
GE07mbh_06_u:6159: 06,055.127a tato raviṃ saṃhṛtaraśmijālaṃ; dṛṣṭvā bhṛśaṃ śastraparikṣatāṅgāḥ
GE07mbh_06_u:6160: 06,055.127c tad aindram astraṃ vitataṃ sughoram; asahyam udvīkṣya yugāntakalpam
GE07mbh_06_u:6162: 06,055.128c cakrur niśāṃ saṃdhigatāṃ samīkṣya; vibhāvasor lohitarājiyuktām
GE07mbh_06_u:6167: 06,055.129a avāpya kīrtiṃ ca yaśaś ca loke; vijitya śatrūṃś ca dhanaṃjayo 'pi
GE07mbh_06_u:6168: 06,055.129c yayau narendraiḥ saha sodaraiś ca; samāptakarmā śibiraṃ niśāyām
GE07mbh_06_u:6171: 06,055.129e tataḥ prajajñe tumulaḥ kurūṇāṃ; niśāmukhe ghorataraḥ praṇādaḥ
GE07mbh_06_u:6172: 06,055.130a raṇe rathānām ayutaṃ nihatya; hatā gajāḥ saptaśatārjunena
GE07mbh_06_u:6173: 06,055.130c prācyāś ca sauvīragaṇāś ca sarve; nipātitāḥ kṣudrakamālavāś ca
GE07mbh_06_u:6174: 06,055.130e mahat kṛtaṃ karma dhanaṃjayena; kartuṃ yathā nārhati kaś cid anyaḥ
GE07mbh_06_u:6175: 06,055.131a śrutāyur ambaṣṭhapatiś ca rājā; tathaiva durmarṣaṇacitrasenau
GE07mbh_06_u:6176: 06,055.131c droṇaḥ kṛpaḥ saindhavabāhlikau ca; bhūriśravāḥ śalyaśalau ca rājan
GE07mbh_06_u:6184: 06,055.132a iti bruvantaḥ śibirāṇi jagmuḥ; sarve gaṇā bhārata ye tvadīyāḥ
GE07mbh_06_u:6185: 06,055.132c ulkāsahasraiś ca susaṃpradīptair; vibhrājamānaiś ca tathā pradīpaiḥ
GE07mbh_06_u:6190: 06,056.001a vyuṣṭāṃ niśāṃ bhārata bhāratānām; anīkinīnāṃ pramukhe mahātmā
GE07mbh_06_u:6191: 06,056.001c yayau sapatnān prati jātakopo; vṛtaḥ samagreṇa balena bhīṣmaḥ
GE07mbh_06_u:6193: 06,056.002c jayadrathaś cātibalo balaughair; nṛpās tathānye 'nuyayuḥ samantāt
GE07mbh_06_u:6194: 06,056.003a sa tair mahadbhiś ca mahārathaiś; ca tejasvibhir vīryavadbhiś ca rājan
GE07mbh_06_u:6195: 06,056.003c rarāja rājottama rājamukhyair; vṛtaḥ sa devair iva vajrapāṇiḥ

GE07mbh_06_u:6613: 06,060.025c durmukho duṣpradharṣaś ca vivitsur vikaṭaḥ samaḥ
GE07mbh_06_u:6616: 06,060.027a putrāṃs tu tava saṃprekṣya bhīmaseno mahābalaḥ
GE07mbh_06_u:6617: 06,060.027c sṛkkiṇī vilihan vīraḥ paśumadhye vṛko yathā
GE07mbh_06_u:6620: 06,060.027f*0247_01 saṃprahṛṣya ca hṛṣṭātmā tribhir bāṇair mahābhujaḥ
GE07mbh_06_u:6622: 06,060.028c suṣeṇaṃ ca tato hatvā preṣayām āsa mṛtyave
GE07mbh_06_u:6623: 06,060.028d*0248_01 vicitraṃ ca tathā hatvā preṣayām āsa mṛtyave
GE07mbh_06_u:6628: 06,060.031a bhīmaṃ bhīmarathaṃ cobhau bhīmaseno hasann iva
GE07mbh_06_u:6632: 06,060.033a putrās tu tava taṃ dṛṣṭvā bhīmasenaparākramam
GE07mbh_06_u:6633: 06,060.033c śeṣā ye 'nye 'bhavaṃs tatra te bhīmasya bhayārditāḥ
GE07mbh_06_u:6636: 06,060.034c eṣa bhīmo raṇe kruddho dhārtarāṣṭrān mahārathān
GE07mbh_06_u:6639: 06,060.036a evam uktās tataḥ sarve dhārtarāṣṭrasya sainikāḥ
GE07mbh_06_u:6642: 06,060.037c apatat sahasā tatra yatra bhīmo vyavasthitaḥ
GE07mbh_06_u:6643: 06,060.038a āpatann eva ca raṇe bhīmasenaṃ śilāśitaiḥ
GE07mbh_06_u:6644: 06,060.038c adṛśyaṃ samare cakre jīmūta iva bhāskaram
GE07mbh_06_u:6648: 06,060.040c gajaṃ ca śaravṛṣṭyā taṃ bibhidus te samantataḥ
GE07mbh_06_u:6655: 06,060.043e dviguṇaṃ javam āsthāya kampayaṃś caraṇair mahīm
GE07mbh_06_u:6656: 06,060.044a tasya tat sumahad rūpaṃ dṛṣṭvā sarve mahārathāḥ
GE07mbh_06_u:6658: 06,060.045a tatas tu nṛpatiḥ kruddho bhīmasenaṃ stanāntare
GE07mbh_06_u:6662: 06,060.047a tāṃs tu bhītān samālakṣya bhīmasenaṃ ca mūrchitam
GE07mbh_06_u:6664: 06,060.047d*0249_01 bhīmo 'pi labdhasaṃjñas tu adravat sa tato raṇe
GE07mbh_06_u:6665: 06,060.048a tato ghaṭotkaco rājan prekṣya bhīmaṃ tathāgatam
GE07mbh_06_u:6667: 06,060.049a sa kṛtvā dāruṇāṃ māyāṃ bhīrūṇāṃ bhayavardhinīm
GE07mbh_06_u:6672: 06,060.051a añjano vāmanaś caiva mahāpadmaś ca suprabhaḥ
GE07mbh_06_u:6674: 06,060.051d*0251_01 madhye trigartā(sic)n rākṣasyo labhante prasravanti ca
GE07mbh_06_u:6676: 06,060.051d*0251_03 praṇamya vikacaḥ pādāv agṛhṇāt pitaraṃ tadā
GE07mbh_06_u:6677: 06,060.051d*0251_04 mātuś ca parameṣvāsas tau ca nāmāsya cakratuḥ
GE07mbh_06_u:6679: 06,060.051d*0251_06 abravīt tena nāmāsya ghaṭotkaca iti sma ha
GE07mbh_06_u:6680: 06,060.051d*0251_07 sa hi sṛṣṭo maghavatā karṇahetor mahātmanā
GE07mbh_06_u:6682: 06,060.052a mahākāyās tridhā rājan prasravanto madaṃ bahu
GE07mbh_06_u:6684: 06,060.052d*0252_01 preṣitāś ca mahārāja rākṣasaiś ca caturdiśam
GE07mbh_06_u:6685: 06,060.053a ghaṭotkacas tu svaṃ nāgaṃ codayām āsa taṃ tataḥ
GE07mbh_06_u:6687: 06,060.054a te cānye coditā nāgā rākṣasais tair mahābalaiḥ
GE07mbh_06_u:6694: 06,060.056a tasya taṃ nadato nādaṃ sughoraṃ bhīmanisvanam
GE07mbh_06_u:6695: 06,060.056c śrutvā bhīṣmo 'bravīd droṇaṃ rājānaṃ ca suyodhanam
GE07mbh_06_u:6698: 06,060.058a rākṣasaś ca mahāmāyaḥ sa ca rājātikopanaḥ
GE07mbh_06_u:6700: 06,060.059a śrūyate hy eṣa hṛṣṭānāṃ pāṇḍavānāṃ mahāsvanaḥ
GE07mbh_06_u:6701: 06,060.059c hastinaś caiva sumahān bhītasya ruvato dhvaniḥ
GE07mbh_06_u:6702: 06,060.060a tatra gacchāma bhadraṃ vo rājānaṃ parirakṣitum
GE07mbh_06_u:6704: 06,060.061a te tvaradhvaṃ mahāvīryāḥ kiṃ cireṇa prayāmahe
GE07mbh_06_u:6705: 06,060.061c mahān hi vartate raudraḥ saṃgrāmo lomaharṣaṇaḥ
GE07mbh_06_u:6706: 06,060.062a bhaktaś ca kulaputraś ca śūraś ca pṛtanāpatiḥ
GE07mbh_06_u:6707: 06,060.062c yuktaṃ tasya paritrāṇaṃ kartum asmābhir acyutāḥ
GE07mbh_06_u:6710: 06,060.063e uttamaṃ javam āsthāya prayayur yatra so 'bhavat
GE07mbh_06_u:6715: 06,060.066a tasya taṃ ninadaṃ śrutvā dṛṣṭvā nāgāṃś ca yudhyataḥ
GE07mbh_06_u:6717: 06,060.067a na rocate me saṃgrāmo haiḍimbena durātmanā
GE07mbh_06_u:6719: 06,060.068a naiṣa śakyo yudhā jetum api vajrabhṛtā svayam
GE07mbh_06_u:6720: 06,060.068c labdhalakṣyaḥ prahārī ca vayaṃ ca śrāntavāhanāḥ
GE07mbh_06_u:6722: 06,060.068f*0254_01 idānīṃ yudhi nirjetuṃ na śakyo 'sau sa rākṣasaḥ
GE07mbh_06_u:6723: 06,060.068f*0254_02 astam abhyeti savitā rātrau yoddhuṃ na śakyate
GE07mbh_06_u:6724: 06,060.069a tan na me rocate yuddhaṃ pāṇḍavair jitakāśibhiḥ
GE07mbh_06_u:6725: 06,060.069c ghuṣyatām avahāro 'dya śvo yotsyāmaḥ paraiḥ saha
GE07mbh_06_u:6726: 06,060.070a pitāmahavacaḥ śrutvā tathā cakruḥ sma kauravāḥ
GE07mbh_06_u:6730: 06,060.072a evaṃ tad abhavad yuddhaṃ divasaṃ bharatarṣabha
GE07mbh_06_u:6732: 06,060.073a kauravās tu tato rājan prayayuḥ śibiraṃ svakam
GE07mbh_06_u:6741: 06,060.077c ghaṭṭayantaś ca marmāṇi tava putrasya māriṣa
GE07mbh_06_u:6742: 06,060.077d*0255_01 kampayantaś ca putrāṇāṃ tava cetāṃsi bhūmipa
GE07mbh_06_u:6743: 06,060.077d*0255_02 putrāś ca tava rājendra tathaiva śaravikṣatāḥ
GE07mbh_06_u:6745: 06,060.078a duryodhanas tu nṛpatir dīno bhrātṛvadhena ca
GE07mbh_06_u:6747: 06,060.079a tataḥ kṛtvā vidhiṃ sarvaṃ śibirasya yathāvidhi
GE07mbh_06_u:6750: 06,061.001a bhayaṃ me sumahaj jātaṃ vismayaś caiva saṃjaya
GE07mbh_06_u:6752: 06,061.002a putrāṇāṃ ca parābhavaṃ śrutvā saṃjaya sarvaśaḥ
GE07mbh_06_u:6753: 06,061.002c cintā me mahatī sūta bhaviṣyati kathaṃ tv iti
GE07mbh_06_u:6755: 06,061.003c yathā hi dṛśyate sarvaṃ daivayogena saṃjaya
GE07mbh_06_u:6759: 06,061.005c kena dattavarās tāta kiṃ vā jñānaṃ vidanti te
GE07mbh_06_u:6760: 06,061.005e yena kṣayaṃ na gacchanti divi tārāgaṇā iva
GE07mbh_06_u:6761: 06,061.006a punaḥ punar na mṛṣyāmi hataṃ sainyaṃ sma pāṇḍavaiḥ
GE07mbh_06_u:6762: 06,061.006c mayy eva daṇḍaḥ patati daivāt paramadāruṇaḥ
GE07mbh_06_u:6763: 06,061.007a yathāvadhyāḥ pāṇḍusutā yathā vadhyāś ca me sutāḥ
GE07mbh_06_u:6764: 06,061.007c etan me sarvam ācakṣva yathātattvena saṃjaya
GE07mbh_06_u:6765: 06,061.008a na hi pāraṃ prapaśyāmi duḥkhasyāsya kathaṃ cana
GE07mbh_06_u:6767: 06,061.009a putrāṇāṃ vyasanaṃ manye dhruvaṃ prāptaṃ sudāruṇam
GE07mbh_06_u:6768: 06,061.009c ghātayiṣyati me putrān sarvān bhīmo na saṃśayaḥ
GE07mbh_06_u:6769: 06,061.010a na hi paśyāmi taṃ vīraṃ yo me rakṣet sutān raṇe
GE07mbh_06_u:6770: 06,061.010c dhruvaṃ vināśaḥ samare putrāṇāṃ mama saṃjaya
GE07mbh_06_u:6771: 06,061.011a tasmān me kāraṇaṃ sūta yuktiṃ caiva viśeṣataḥ
GE07mbh_06_u:6773: 06,061.012a duryodhano 'pi yac cakre dṛṣṭvā svān vimukhān raṇe
GE07mbh_06_u:6775: 06,061.012e drauṇir vāpi maheṣvāso vikarṇo vā mahābalaḥ
GE07mbh_06_u:6776: 06,061.013a niścayo vāpi kas teṣāṃ tadā hy āsīn mahātmanām
GE07mbh_06_u:6778: 06,061.013d*0256_01 yad vṛttaṃ tatra saṃgrāme tad bhavān vaktum arhati
GE07mbh_06_u:6781: 06,061.014c naiva mantrakṛtaṃ kiṃ cin naiva māyāṃ tathāvidhām
GE07mbh_06_u:6782: 06,061.014e na vai vibhīṣikāṃ kāṃ cid rājan kurvanti pāṇḍavāḥ
GE07mbh_06_u:6783: 06,061.015a yudhyanti te yathānyāyaṃ śaktimantaś ca saṃyuge
GE07mbh_06_u:6785: 06,061.015e ārabhante sadā pārthāḥ prārthayānā mahad yaśaḥ
GE07mbh_06_u:6786: 06,061.016a na te yuddhān nivartante dharmopetā mahābalāḥ
GE07mbh_06_u:6787: 06,061.016c śriyā paramayā yuktā yato dharmas tato jayaḥ
GE07mbh_06_u:6788: 06,061.016e tenāvadhyā raṇe pārthā jayayuktāś ca pārthiva
GE07mbh_06_u:6789: 06,061.017a tava putrā durātmānaḥ pāpeṣv abhiratāḥ sadā
GE07mbh_06_u:6792: 06,061.018c nikṛtānīha pāṇḍūnāṃ nīcair iva yathā naraiḥ
GE07mbh_06_u:6793: 06,061.019a sarvaṃ ca tad anādṛtya putrāṇāṃ tava kilbiṣam
GE07mbh_06_u:6795: 06,061.019e na cainān bahu manyante putrās tava viśāṃ pate
GE07mbh_06_u:6798: 06,061.020e sa tad bhuṅkṣva mahārāja saputraḥ sasuhṛjjanaḥ
GE07mbh_06_u:6801: 06,061.022a tathā mayā cāpy asakṛd vāryamāṇo na gṛhṇasi
GE07mbh_06_u:6802: 06,061.022c vākyaṃ hitaṃ ca pathyaṃ ca martyaḥ pathyam ivauṣadham
GE07mbh_06_u:6803: 06,061.022e putrāṇāṃ matam āsthāya jitān manyasi pāṇḍavān
GE07mbh_06_u:6804: 06,061.023a śṛṇu bhūyo yathātattvaṃ yan māṃ tvaṃ paripṛcchasi
GE07mbh_06_u:6808: 06,061.024c dṛṣṭvā bhrātṝn raṇe sarvān nirjitān sumahārathān
GE07mbh_06_u:6811: 06,061.025e yad abravīt sutas te 'sau tan me śṛṇu janeśvara
GE07mbh_06_u:6813: 06,061.026a tvaṃ ca droṇaś ca śalyaś ca kṛpo drauṇis tathaiva ca
GE07mbh_06_u:6814: 06,061.026c kṛtavarmā ca hārdikyaḥ kāmbojaś ca sudakṣiṇaḥ
GE07mbh_06_u:6815: 06,061.027a bhūriśravā vikarṇaś ca bhagadattaś ca vīryavān
GE07mbh_06_u:6817: 06,061.028a trayāṇām api lokānāṃ paryāptā iti me matiḥ
GE07mbh_06_u:6818: 06,061.028c pāṇḍavānāṃ samastāś ca na tiṣṭhanti parākrame
GE07mbh_06_u:6819: 06,061.029a tatra me saṃśayo jātas tan mamācakṣva pṛcchataḥ
GE07mbh_06_u:6820: 06,061.029c yaṃ samāśritya kaunteyā jayanty asmān pade pade
GE07mbh_06_u:6822: 06,061.030a śṛṇu rājan vaco mahyaṃ yat tvāṃ vakṣyāmi kaurava
GE07mbh_06_u:6823: 06,061.030c bahuśaś ca mamokto 'si na ca me tattvayā kṛtam
GE07mbh_06_u:6825: 06,061.031c etat kṣamam ahaṃ manye pṛthivyās tava cābhibho
GE07mbh_06_u:6826: 06,061.032a bhuñjemāṃ pṛthivīṃ rājan bhrātṛbhiḥ sahitaḥ sukhī
GE07mbh_06_u:6827: 06,061.032c durhṛdas tāpayan sarvān nandayaṃś cāpi bāndhavān
GE07mbh_06_u:6828: 06,061.033a na ca me krośatas tāta śrutavān asi vai purā
GE07mbh_06_u:6829: 06,061.033c tad idaṃ samanuprāptaṃ yat pāṇḍūn avamanyase
GE07mbh_06_u:6830: 06,061.034a yaś ca hetur avadhyatve teṣām akliṣṭakarmaṇām
GE07mbh_06_u:6831: 06,061.034c taṃ śṛṇuṣva mahārāja mama kīrtayataḥ prabho
GE07mbh_06_u:6832: 06,061.035a nāsti lokeṣu tad bhūtaṃ bhavitā no bhaviṣyati
GE07mbh_06_u:6833: 06,061.035c yo jayet pāṇḍavān saṃkhye pālitāñ śārṅgadhanvanā
GE07mbh_06_u:6834: 06,061.036a yat tu me kathitaṃ tāta munibhir bhāvitātmabhiḥ
GE07mbh_06_u:6836: 06,061.037a purā kila surāḥ sarve ṛṣayaś ca samāgatāḥ
GE07mbh_06_u:6839: 06,061.038c vimānaṃ jājvalad bhāsā sthitaṃ pravaram ambare
GE07mbh_06_u:6840: 06,061.039a dhyānenāvedya taṃ brahmā kṛtvā ca niyato 'ñjalim
GE07mbh_06_u:6842: 06,061.040a ṛṣayas tv atha devāś ca dṛṣṭvā brahmāṇam utthitam
GE07mbh_06_u:6843: 06,061.040c sthitāḥ prāñjalayaḥ sarve paśyanto mahad adbhutam
GE07mbh_06_u:6844: 06,061.041a yathāvac ca tam abhyarcya brahmā brahmavidāṃ varaḥ
GE07mbh_06_u:6846: 06,061.042a viśvāvasur viśvamūrtir viśveśo; viṣvakseno viśvakarmā vaśī ca
GE07mbh_06_u:6847: 06,061.042c viśveśvaro vāsudevo 'si tasmād; yogātmānaṃ daivataṃ tvām upaimi
GE07mbh_06_u:6851: 06,061.043a jaya viśva mahādeva jaya lokahite rata
GE07mbh_06_u:6873: 06,061.054a pādau tava dharā devī diśo bāhur divaṃ śiraḥ
GE07mbh_06_u:6874: 06,061.054c mūrtis te 'haṃ surāḥ kāyaś candrādityau ca cakṣuṣī
GE07mbh_06_u:6875: 06,061.055a balaṃ tapaś ca satyaṃ ca dharmaḥ kāmātmajaḥ prabho
GE07mbh_06_u:6876: 06,061.055c tejo 'gniḥ pavanaḥ śvāsa āpas te svedasaṃbhavāḥ
GE07mbh_06_u:6877: 06,061.056a aśvinau śravaṇau nityaṃ devī jihvā sarasvatī
GE07mbh_06_u:6878: 06,061.056c vedāḥ saṃskāraniṣṭhā hi tvayīdaṃ jagad āśritam
GE07mbh_06_u:6879: 06,061.057a na saṃkhyāṃ na parīmāṇaṃ na tejo na parākramam
GE07mbh_06_u:6880: 06,061.057c na balaṃ yogayogīśa jānīmas te na saṃbhavam
GE07mbh_06_u:6887: 06,061.061a tvaṃ gatiḥ sarvabhūtānāṃ tvaṃ netā tvaṃ jaganmukham
GE07mbh_06_u:6892: 06,061.063c jagato dhāraṇārthāya vijñāpyaṃ kuru me prabho
GE07mbh_06_u:6893: 06,061.064a yad etat paramaṃ guhyaṃ tvatprasādamayaṃ vibho
GE07mbh_06_u:6894: 06,061.064c vāsudeva tad etat te mayodgītaṃ yathātatham
GE07mbh_06_u:6895: 06,061.065a sṛṣṭvā saṃkarṣaṇaṃ devaṃ svayam ātmānam ātmanā
GE07mbh_06_u:6897: 06,061.066a pradyumnāc cāniruddhaṃ tvaṃ yaṃ vidur viṣṇum avyayam
GE07mbh_06_u:6900: 06,061.067b*0258_01 vāsudeveti taṃ vidyād yenāhaṃ nirmitaḥ prabho
GE07mbh_06_u:6904: 06,061.068c dharmaṃ sthāpya yaśaḥ prāpya yogaṃ prāpsyasi tattvataḥ
GE07mbh_06_u:6905: 06,061.069a tvāṃ hi brahmarṣayo loke devāś cāmitavikrama
GE07mbh_06_u:6906: 06,061.069c tais taiś ca nāmabhir bhaktā gāyanti paramātmakam
GE07mbh_06_u:6908: 06,061.070a sthitāś ca sarve tvayi bhūtasaṃghāḥ; kṛtvāśrayaṃ tvāṃ varadaṃ subāho
GE07mbh_06_u:6909: 06,061.070c anādimadhyāntam apārayogaṃ; lokasya setuṃ pravadanti viprāḥ
GE07mbh_06_u:6911: 06,062.001a tataḥ sa bhagavān devo lokānāṃ parameśvaraḥ
GE07mbh_06_u:6913: 06,062.002a viditaṃ tāta yogān me sarvam etat tavepsitam
GE07mbh_06_u:6917: 06,062.004a ko nv ayaṃ yo bhagavatā praṇamya vinayād vibho
GE07mbh_06_u:6918: 06,062.004c vāgbhiḥ stuto variṣṭhābhiḥ śrotum icchāma taṃ vayam
GE07mbh_06_u:6919: 06,062.005a evam uktas tu bhagavān pratyuvāca pitāmahaḥ
GE07mbh_06_u:6921: 06,062.006a yat tatparaṃ bhaviṣyaṃ ca bhavitavyaṃ ca yat param
GE07mbh_06_u:6922: 06,062.006c bhūtātmā yaḥ prabhuś caiva brahma yac ca paraṃ padam
GE07mbh_06_u:6925: 06,062.008a mānuṣaṃ lokam ātiṣṭha vāsudeva iti śrutaḥ
GE07mbh_06_u:6930: 06,062.009c ta ime nṛṣu saṃbhūtā ghorarūpā mahābalāḥ
GE07mbh_06_u:6931: 06,062.010a teṣāṃ vadhārthaṃ bhagavān nareṇa sahito vaśī
GE07mbh_06_u:6935: 06,062.012a ajeyau samare yattau sahitāv amarair api
GE07mbh_06_u:6936: 06,062.012c mūḍhās tv etau na jānanti naranārāyaṇāv ṛṣī
GE07mbh_06_u:6937: 06,062.012d*0261_01 jagataś cāgrajau vidmas tato devau surarṣabhāḥ
GE07mbh_06_u:6938: 06,062.013a tasyāham ātmajo brahmā sarvasya jagataḥ patiḥ
GE07mbh_06_u:6940: 06,062.014a tathā manuṣyo 'yam iti kadā cit surasattamāḥ
GE07mbh_06_u:6942: 06,062.014d*0262_01 etat puruṣasaṃjñaṃ vai purāṇaṃ rūpam uttamam
GE07mbh_06_u:6943: 06,062.015a etat paramakaṃ guhyam etat paramakaṃ padam
GE07mbh_06_u:6944: 06,062.015c etat paramakaṃ brahma etat paramakaṃ yaśaḥ
GE07mbh_06_u:6945: 06,062.016a etad akṣaram avyaktam etat tac chāśvataṃ mahat
GE07mbh_06_u:6946: 06,062.016c etat puruṣasaṃjñaṃ vai gīyate jñāyate na ca
GE07mbh_06_u:6947: 06,062.017a etat paramakaṃ teja etat paramakaṃ sukham
GE07mbh_06_u:6949: 06,062.018a tasmāt sarvaiḥ suraiḥ sendrair lokaiś cāmitavikramaḥ

GE07mbh_06_u:7721: 06,073.001a ātmadoṣāt tvayā rājan prāptaṃ vyasanam īdṛśam

GE07mbh_06_u:7731: 06,073.005a bhīmasenas tu niśitair bāṇair bhittvā mahācamūm

GE07mbh_06_u:7736: 06,073.007c etān anyāṃś ca subahūn samīpasthān mahārathān
GE07mbh_06_u:7740: 06,073.009b*0294_01 athālokya praviṣṭaṃ tam ūcus te sarva eva tu
GE07mbh_06_u:7742: 06,073.010a sa taiḥ parivṛtaḥ pārtho bhrātṛbhiḥ kṛtaniścayaiḥ
GE07mbh_06_u:7744: 06,073.011a saṃprāpya madhyaṃ vyūhasya na bhīḥ pāṇḍavam āviśat

GE07mbh_06_u:7766: 06,073.016c droṇam utsṛjya tarasā prayayau yatra saubalaḥ

GE07mbh_06_u:7819: 06,073.039a bhrātṝn athopetya tavāpi putras; tasmin vimarde mahati pravṛtte

GE07mbh_06_u:7825: 06,073.040a śrutvā tu vākyaṃ tam amṛṣyamāṇā; jyeṣṭhājñayā coditā dhārtarāṣṭrāḥ
GE07mbh_06_u:7826: 06,073.040c vadhāya niṣpetur udāyudhās te; yugakṣaye ketavo yadvad ugrāḥ
GE07mbh_06_u:7827: 06,073.041a pragṛhya citrāṇi dhanūṃṣi vīrā; jyānemighoṣaiḥ pravikampayantaḥ

GE07mbh_06_u:7882: 06,073.060a dṛṣṭvā ca sahasāyāntaṃ pāñcālyo gurum ātmanaḥ
GE07mbh_06_u:7883: 06,073.060c nāśaṃsata vadhaṃ vīraḥ putrāṇāṃ tava pārṣataḥ
GE07mbh_06_u:7888: 06,073.063a anyāṃś ca śataśo bāṇān preṣayām āsa pārṣate
GE07mbh_06_u:7893: 06,073.065c hayāṃś ca caturas tūrṇaṃ caturbhiḥ sāyakottamaiḥ
GE07mbh_06_u:7895: 06,073.066c sārathiṃ cāsya bhallena preṣayām āsa mṛtyave

GE07mbh_06_u:7897: 06,073.067a hatāśvāt sa rathāt tūrṇam avaplutya mahārathaḥ
GE07mbh_06_u:7903: 06,073.070a vadhyamānaṃ tu tat sainyaṃ droṇena niśitaiḥ śaraiḥ
GE07mbh_06_u:7905: 06,073.071a tathā dṛṣṭvā ca tat sainyaṃ jahṛṣe ca balaṃ tava

GE07mbh_06_u:7909: 06,074.001a tato duryodhano rājā mohāt pratyāgatas tadā
GE07mbh_06_u:7911: 06,074.002a ekībhūtāḥ punaś caiva tava putrā mahārathāḥ

GE07mbh_06_u:7929: 06,074.011a bhṛśaṃ kruddhaś ca tejasvī nārācena samarpayat
GE07mbh_06_u:7931: 06,074.012a tathetarāṃs tava sutāṃs tāḍayām āsa bhārata
GE07mbh_06_u:7933: 06,074.013a tataḥ saṃsthāpya samare svāny anīkāni sarvaśaḥ

GE07mbh_06_u:7953: 06,074.022a hatāśvaṃ ratham utsṛjya vikarṇas tu mahārathaḥ
GE07mbh_06_u:7955: 06,074.023a sthitāv ekarathe tau tu bhrātarau kuruvardhanau
GE07mbh_06_u:7957: 06,074.024a durjayo 'tha vikarṇaś ca kārṣṇiṃ pañcabhir āyasaiḥ

GE07mbh_06_u:7959: 06,074.025a duḥśāsanas tu samare kekayān pañca māriṣa

GE07mbh_06_u:7963: 06,074.027a putro 'pi tava durdharṣo draupadyās tanayān raṇe
GE07mbh_06_u:7964: 06,074.027c sāyakair niśitai rājann ājaghāna pṛthak pṛthak

GE07mbh_06_u:7968: 06,074.029c kālayām āsa balavān pālaḥ paśugaṇān iva

GE07mbh_06_u:7980: 06,074.035c na tatrāsīt pumān kaś cid yo yoddhuṃ nābhikāṅkṣati
GE07mbh_06_u:7981: 06,074.036a evaṃ yuyudhire vīrāḥ prārthayānā mahad yaśaḥ
GE07mbh_06_u:7982: 06,074.036c tāvakāḥ pāṇḍavaiḥ sārdhaṃ kāṅkṣamāṇā jayaṃ yudhi
GE07mbh_06_u:7989: 06,075.003c adya tvāṃ nihaniṣyāmi yadi notsṛjase raṇam
GE07mbh_06_u:7990: 06,075.004a adya kuntyāḥ parikleśaṃ vanavāsaṃ ca kṛtsnaśaḥ
GE07mbh_06_u:7991: 06,075.004c draupadyāś ca parikleśaṃ praṇotsyāmi hate tvayi

GE07mbh_06_u:7995: 06,075.006c acintya pāṇḍavān kāmād yatheṣṭaṃ kṛtavān asi
GE07mbh_06_u:7996: 06,075.007a yācamānaṃ ca yan mohād dāśārham avamanyase
GE07mbh_06_u:7997: 06,075.007c ulūkasya samādeśaṃ yad dadāsi ca hṛṣṭavat
GE07mbh_06_u:7999: 06,075.008c samīkariṣye tat pāpaṃ yat purā kṛtavān asi
GE07mbh_06_u:8000: 06,075.009a evam uktvā dhanur ghoraṃ vikṛṣyodbhrāmya cāsakṛt
GE07mbh_06_u:8004: 06,075.011a tato 'sya kārmukaṃ dvābhyāṃ sūtaṃ dvābhyāṃ ca vivyadhe
GE07mbh_06_u:8007: 06,075.012c chatraṃ ciccheda samare rājñas tasya rathottamāt
GE07mbh_06_u:8008: 06,075.013a tribhiś ca tasya ciccheda jvalantaṃ dhvajam uttamam
GE07mbh_06_u:8009: 06,075.013b*0312_01 tribhir anyair maheṣvāsaś cicchedāsya dhvajaṃ tathā
GE07mbh_06_u:8010: 06,075.013c chittvā taṃ ca nanādoccais tava putrasya paśyataḥ
GE07mbh_06_u:8011: 06,075.014a rathāc ca sa dhvajaḥ śrīmān nānāratnavibhūṣitaḥ
GE07mbh_06_u:8012: 06,075.014c papāta sahasā bhūmiṃ vidyuj jaladharād iva
GE07mbh_06_u:8015: 06,075.016a athainaṃ daśabhir bāṇais tottrair iva mahāgajam
GE07mbh_06_u:8016: 06,075.016c ājaghāna raṇe bhīmaḥ smayann iva mahārathaḥ

GE07mbh_06_u:8018: 06,075.017a tatas tu rājā sindhūnāṃ rathaśreṣṭho jayadrathaḥ
GE07mbh_06_u:8020: 06,075.018a kṛpaś ca rathināṃ śreṣṭhaḥ kauravyam amitaujasam
GE07mbh_06_u:8026: 06,075.021a dhṛṣṭaketus tato rājann abhimanyuś ca vīryavān
GE07mbh_06_u:8027: 06,075.021c kekayā draupadeyāś ca tava putrān ayodhayan
GE07mbh_06_u:8036: 06,075.025c vavarṣur mārgaṇais tīkṣṇair giriṃ merum ivāmbudāḥ
GE07mbh_06_u:8040: 06,075.027a vikarṇasya tato bhallān preṣayām āsa bhārata
GE07mbh_06_u:8042: 06,075.027d*0314_01 sa tair vikarṇasya rathāt pātayām āsa vīryavān
GE07mbh_06_u:8043: 06,075.027e dhvajaṃ sūtaṃ hayāṃś cāsya chittvā nṛtyann ivāhave
GE07mbh_06_u:8044: 06,075.028a punaś cānyāñ śarān pītān akuṇṭhāgrāñ śilāśitān
GE07mbh_06_u:8047: 06,075.029c bhittvā dehaṃ gatā bhūmiṃ jvalanta iva pannagāḥ
GE07mbh_06_u:8055: 06,075.033c dhvajam ekena ciccheda sārathiṃ cāsya saptabhiḥ
GE07mbh_06_u:8058: 06,075.035a sa hatāśve rathe tiṣṭhañ śrutakarmā mahārathaḥ
GE07mbh_06_u:8059: 06,075.035c śaktiṃ cikṣepa saṃkruddho maholkāṃ jvalitām iva
GE07mbh_06_u:8060: 06,075.036a sā durmukhasya vipulaṃ varma bhittvā yaśasvinaḥ
GE07mbh_06_u:8062: 06,075.036d*0315_01 durmukho vihvalas tatra niṣasāda rathe vibho
GE07mbh_06_u:8063: 06,075.036d*0315_02 visaṃjñaṃ prekṣya te sarve bhrātaraḥ paryavārayan
GE07mbh_06_u:8064: 06,075.037a taṃ dṛṣṭvā virathaṃ tatra sutasomo mahābalaḥ
GE07mbh_06_u:8066: 06,075.038a śrutakīrtis tathā vīro jayatsenaṃ sutaṃ tava
GE07mbh_06_u:8069: 06,075.039c ciccheda samare rājañ jayatsenaḥ sutas tava
GE07mbh_06_u:8073: 06,075.041a śatānīkas tu samare dṛḍhaṃ visphārya kārmukam
GE07mbh_06_u:8078: 06,075.043a tathā tasmin vartamāne duṣkarṇo bhrātur antike
GE07mbh_06_u:8083: 06,075.045a tiṣṭha tiṣṭheti cāmantrya duṣkarṇaṃ bhrātur agrataḥ
GE07mbh_06_u:8084: 06,075.045c mumoca niśitān bāṇāñ jvalitān pannagān iva
GE07mbh_06_u:8085: 06,075.046a tato 'sya dhanur ekena dvābhyāṃ sūtaṃ ca māriṣa
GE07mbh_06_u:8086: 06,075.046c ciccheda samare tūrṇaṃ taṃ ca vivyādha saptabhiḥ
GE07mbh_06_u:8088: 06,075.047c jaghāna niśitais tūrṇaṃ sarvān dvādaśabhiḥ śaraiḥ
GE07mbh_06_u:8090: 06,075.048c duṣkarṇaṃ samare kruddho vivyādha hṛdaye bhṛśam
GE07mbh_06_u:8091: 06,075.048d*0318_01 sa papāta tato bhūmau vajrarugṇa iva drumaḥ
GE07mbh_06_u:8092: 06,075.048d*0319_01 sa vihvalo rathopasthe niṣasāda sutas tava
GE07mbh_06_u:8093: 06,075.049a duṣkarṇaṃ nihataṃ dṛṣṭvā pañca rājan mahārathāḥ
GE07mbh_06_u:8097: 06,075.051a tān abhyāpatataḥ prekṣya tava putrā mahārathāḥ
GE07mbh_06_u:8099: 06,075.052a durmukho durjayaś caiva tathā durmarṣaṇo yuvā
GE07mbh_06_u:8105: 06,075.054c viviśus te paraṃ sainyaṃ siṃhā iva vanād vanam
GE07mbh_06_u:8112: 06,075.057c nāśayām āsa senāṃ vai bhīṣmas teṣāṃ mahātmanām
GE07mbh_06_u:8113: 06,075.057e pāñcālānāṃ ca sainyāni śarair ninye yamakṣayam
GE07mbh_06_u:8119: 06,075.059c mūrdhni caitāv upāghrāya saṃhṛṣṭaḥ śibiraṃ yayau
GE07mbh_06_u:8121: 06,075.059d*0321_02 hatvā vidrāvya ca śaraiḥ śibirāyaiva jagmatuḥ
GE07mbh_06_u:8129: 06,076.004a sainyāni raudrāṇi bhayānakāni; vyūḍhāni samyag bahuladhvajāni
GE07mbh_06_u:8130: 06,076.004c vidārya hatvā ca nipīḍya śūrās; te pāṇḍavānāṃ tvaritā rathaughāḥ
GE07mbh_06_u:8131: 06,076.005a saṃmohya sarvān yudhi kīrtimanto; vyūhaṃ ca taṃ makaraṃ vajrakalpam
GE07mbh_06_u:8132: 06,076.005c praviśya bhīmena nibarhito 'smi; ghoraiḥ śarair mṛtyudaṇḍaprakāśaiḥ
GE07mbh_06_u:8133: 06,076.006a kruddhaṃ tam udvīkṣya bhayena rājan; saṃmūrchito nālabhaṃ śāntim adya
GE07mbh_06_u:8134: 06,076.006c icche prasādāt tava satyasaṃdha; prāptuṃ jayaṃ pāṇḍaveyāṃś ca hantum
GE07mbh_06_u:8135: 06,076.007a tenaivam uktaḥ prahasan mahātmā; duryodhanaṃ jātamanyuṃ viditvā
GE07mbh_06_u:8136: 06,076.007c taṃ pratyuvācāvimanā manasvī; gaṅgāsutaḥ śastrabhṛtāṃ variṣṭhaḥ
GE07mbh_06_u:8137: 06,076.008a pareṇa yatnena vigāhya senāṃ; sarvātmanāhaṃ tava rājaputra
GE07mbh_06_u:8138: 06,076.008c icchāmi dātuṃ vijayaṃ sukhaṃ ca; na cātmānaṃ chādaye 'haṃ tvadarthe
GE07mbh_06_u:8139: 06,076.009a ete tu raudrā bahavo mahārathā; yaśasvinaḥ śūratamāḥ kṛtāstrāḥ
GE07mbh_06_u:8140: 06,076.009c ye pāṇḍavānāṃ samare sahāyā; jitaklamāḥ krodhaviṣaṃ vamanti
GE07mbh_06_u:8141: 06,076.010a te neha śakyāḥ sahasā vijetuṃ; vīryonnaddhāḥ kṛtavairās tvayā ca
GE07mbh_06_u:8142: 06,076.010c ahaṃ hy etān pratiyotsyāmi rājan; sarvātmanā jīvitaṃ tyajya vīra
GE07mbh_06_u:8143: 06,076.011a raṇe tavārthāya mahānubhāva; na jīvitaṃ rakṣyatamaṃ mamādya
GE07mbh_06_u:8144: 06,076.011c sarvāṃs tavārthāya sadevadaityāṃl; lokān daheyaṃ kim u śatrūṃs taveha
GE07mbh_06_u:8145: 06,076.012a tat pāṇḍavān yodhayiṣyāmi rājan; priyaṃ ca te sarvam ahaṃ kariṣye
GE07mbh_06_u:8146: 06,076.012c śrutvaiva caitat paramapratīto; duryodhanaḥ prītamanā babhūva
GE07mbh_06_u:8147: 06,076.013a sarvāṇi sainyāni tataḥ prahṛṣṭo; nirgacchatety āha nṛpāṃś ca sarvān
GE07mbh_06_u:8149: 06,076.014a praharṣayuktāni tu tāni rājan; mahānti nānāvidhaśastravanti
GE07mbh_06_u:8150: 06,076.014c sthitāni nāgāśvapadātimanti; virejur ājau tava rājan balāni
GE07mbh_06_u:8151: 06,076.015a vṛndaiḥ sthitāś cāpi susaṃprayuktāś; cakāśire dantigaṇāḥ samantāt
GE07mbh_06_u:8152: 06,076.015c śastrāstravidbhir naradeva yodhair; adhiṣṭhitāḥ sainyagaṇās tvadīyāḥ
GE07mbh_06_u:8153: 06,076.016a rathaiś ca pādātagajāśvasaṃghaiḥ; prayādbhir ājau vidhivat praṇunnaiḥ
GE07mbh_06_u:8154: 06,076.016c samuddhataṃ vai taruṇārkavarṇaṃ; rajo babhau chādayat sūryaraśmīn
GE07mbh_06_u:8155: 06,076.017a rejuḥ patākā rathadantisaṃsthā; vāteritā bhrāmyamāṇāḥ samantāt
GE07mbh_06_u:8156: 06,076.017c nānāraṅgāḥ samare tatra rājan; meghair yuktā vidyutaḥ khe yathaiva
GE07mbh_06_u:8157: 06,076.018a dhanūṃṣi visphārayatāṃ nṛpāṇāṃ; babhūva śabdas tumulo 'tighoraḥ
GE07mbh_06_u:8159: 06,076.019a tad ugranādaṃ bahurūpavarṇaṃ; tavātmajānāṃ samudīrṇam evam
GE07mbh_06_u:8162: 06,077.001a athātmajaṃ tava punar gāṅgeyo dhyānam āsthitam
GE07mbh_06_u:8164: 06,077.002a ahaṃ droṇaś ca śalyaś ca kṛtavarmā ca sātvataḥ
GE07mbh_06_u:8167: 06,077.003c trigartarājaś ca balī māgadhaś ca sudurjayaḥ
GE07mbh_06_u:8169: 06,077.004b*0322_01 kṛpaś ca saha sodaryais tava rājan padānugaiḥ
GE07mbh_06_u:8171: 06,077.005a deśajāś ca hayā rājan svārūḍhā hayasādibhiḥ
GE07mbh_06_u:8175: 06,077.007a ete cānye ca bahavas tvadarthe tyaktajīvitāḥ
GE07mbh_06_u:8176: 06,077.007c devān api raṇe jetuṃ samarthā iti me matiḥ
GE07mbh_06_u:8177: 06,077.008a avaśyaṃ tu mayā rājaṃs tava vācyaṃ hitaṃ sadā
GE07mbh_06_u:8178: 06,077.008c aśakyāḥ pāṇḍavā jetuṃ devair api savāsavaiḥ
GE07mbh_06_u:8180: 06,077.009a sarvathāhaṃ tu rājendra kariṣye vacanaṃ tava
GE07mbh_06_u:8181: 06,077.009c pāṇḍavān vā raṇe jeṣye māṃ vā jeṣyanti pāṇḍavāḥ
GE07mbh_06_u:8182: 06,077.010a evam uktvā dadau cāsmai viśalyakaraṇīṃ śubhām
GE07mbh_06_u:8190: 06,077.014a nāge nāge rathāḥ sapta sapta cāśvā rathe rathe
GE07mbh_06_u:8191: 06,077.014c anv aśvaṃ daśa dhānuṣkā dhānuṣke sapta carmiṇaḥ
GE07mbh_06_u:8193: 06,077.015c sthitaṃ raṇāya mahate bhīṣmeṇa yudhi pālitam
GE07mbh_06_u:8194: 06,077.016a daśāśvānāṃ sahasrāṇi dantināṃ ca tathaiva ca
GE07mbh_06_u:8195: 06,077.016c rathānām ayutaṃ cāpi putrāś ca tava daṃśitāḥ
GE07mbh_06_u:8197: 06,077.017a rakṣyamāṇaś ca taiḥ śūrair gopyamānāś ca tena te
GE07mbh_06_u:8199: 06,077.018a duryodhanas tu samare daṃśito ratham āsthitaḥ
GE07mbh_06_u:8200: 06,077.018c vyabhrājata śriyā juṣṭo yathā śakras triviṣṭape
GE07mbh_06_u:8201: 06,077.019a tataḥ śabdo mahān āsīt putrāṇāṃ tava bhārata
GE07mbh_06_u:8202: 06,077.019c rathaghoṣaś ca tumulo vāditrāṇāṃ ca nisvanaḥ
GE07mbh_06_u:8207: 06,077.021c svayaṃ yudhiṣṭhiro rājā vyūhaṃ vajram athākarot
GE07mbh_06_u:8212: 06,077.024a bhāradvājo yayau matsyaṃ drauṇiś cāpi śikhaṇḍinam
GE07mbh_06_u:8214: 06,077.025a nakulaḥ sahadevaś ca rājan madreśam īyatuḥ
GE07mbh_06_u:8216: 06,077.026a sarve nṛpās tu samare dhanaṃjayam ayodhayan
GE07mbh_06_u:8218: 06,077.027a citrasenaṃ vikarṇaṃ ca tathā durmarṣaṇaṃ vibho
GE07mbh_06_u:8219: 06,077.027c ārjuniḥ samare rājaṃs tava putrān ayodhayat
GE07mbh_06_u:8221: 06,077.028c abhidudrāva vegena matto mattam iva dvipam
GE07mbh_06_u:8227: 06,077.031c śeṣāḥ pratiyayur yattā bhīmam eva mahāratham
GE07mbh_06_u:8230: 06,077.033a arjuno 'tha bhṛśaṃ kruddho vārṣṇeyam idam abravīt
GE07mbh_06_u:8233: 06,077.034a yuddhābhikāmāñ śūrāṃś ca paśya mādhava daṃśitān
GE07mbh_06_u:8236: 06,077.035c ya ime māṃ yaduśreṣṭha yoddhukāmā raṇājire
GE07mbh_06_u:8237: 06,077.036a evam uktvā tu kaunteyo dhanurjyām avamṛjya ca
GE07mbh_06_u:8240: 06,077.037c taḍāgam iva dhārābhir yathā prāvṛṣi toyadā
GE07mbh_06_u:8241: 06,077.038a hāhākāro mahān āsīt tava sainye viśāṃ pate
GE07mbh_06_u:8242: 06,077.038c chādyamānau bhṛśaṃ kṛṣṇau śarair dṛṣṭvā mahāraṇe
GE07mbh_06_u:8243: 06,077.039a devā devarṣayaś caiva gandharvāś ca mahoragāḥ
GE07mbh_06_u:8244: 06,077.039c vismayaṃ paramaṃ jagmur dṛṣṭvā kṛṣṇau tathāgatau
GE07mbh_06_u:8245: 06,077.040a tataḥ kruddho 'rjuno rājann aindram astram udīrayat
GE07mbh_06_u:8247: 06,077.041a śastravṛṣṭiṃ parair muktāṃ śaraughair yad avārayat
GE07mbh_06_u:8248: 06,077.041c na ca tatrāpy anirbhinnaḥ kaś cid āsīd viśāṃ pate
GE07mbh_06_u:8250: 06,077.042c dvābhyāṃ tribhiḥ śaraiś cānyān pārtho vivyādha māriṣa
GE07mbh_06_u:8251: 06,077.043a te hanyamānāḥ pārthena bhīṣmaṃ śāṃtanavaṃ yayuḥ
GE07mbh_06_u:8253: 06,077.044a āpatadbhis tu tais tatra prabhagnaṃ tāvakaṃ balam
GE07mbh_06_u:8256: 06,078.001a tathā pravṛtte saṃgrāme nivṛtte ca suśarmaṇi
GE07mbh_06_u:8259: 06,078.002c pratyudyāte ca gāṅgeye tvaritaṃ vijayaṃ prati
GE07mbh_06_u:8260: 06,078.003a dṛṣṭvā duryodhano rājan raṇe pārthasya vikramam
GE07mbh_06_u:8261: 06,078.003c tvaramāṇaḥ samabhyetya sarvāṃs tān abravīn nṛpān
GE07mbh_06_u:8262: 06,078.004a teṣāṃ ca pramukhe śūraṃ suśarmāṇaṃ mahābalam
GE07mbh_06_u:8263: 06,078.004c madhye sarvasya sainyasya bhṛśaṃ saṃharṣayan vacaḥ
GE07mbh_06_u:8268: 06,078.007a bāḍham ity evam uktvā tu tāny anīkāni sarvaśaḥ
GE07mbh_06_u:8275: 06,078.010c abhavat tumulo nādo bhayād dṛṣṭvā kirīṭinam
GE07mbh_06_u:8279: 06,078.012c na śekuḥ pāṇḍavā draṣṭuṃ śvetagraham ivoditam
GE07mbh_06_u:8281: 06,078.013c bhrātṛbhis tava putraiś ca tathānyaiś ca mahārathaiḥ
GE07mbh_06_u:8282: 06,078.014a bhāradvājas tu samare matsyaṃ vivyādha patriṇā
GE07mbh_06_u:8283: 06,078.014c dhvajaṃ cāsya śareṇājau dhanuś caikena cicchide
GE07mbh_06_u:8284: 06,078.015a tad apāsya dhanuś chinnaṃ virāṭo vāhinīpatiḥ
GE07mbh_06_u:8285: 06,078.015c anyad ādatta vegena dhanur bhārasahaṃ dṛḍham
GE07mbh_06_u:8287: 06,078.016a droṇaṃ tribhiḥ pravivyādha caturbhiś cāsya vājinaḥ
GE07mbh_06_u:8288: 06,078.016c dhvajam ekena vivyādha sārathiṃ cāsya pañcabhiḥ
GE07mbh_06_u:8293: 06,078.018c āruroha rathaṃ tūrṇaṃ śaṅkhasya rathināṃ varaḥ
GE07mbh_06_u:8294: 06,078.019a tatas tu tau pitāputrau bhāradvājaṃ rathe sthitau
GE07mbh_06_u:8297: 06,078.020c cikṣepa samare tūrṇaṃ śaṅkhaṃ prati janeśvara
GE07mbh_06_u:8298: 06,078.021a sa tasya hṛdayaṃ bhittvā pītvā śoṇitam āhave
GE07mbh_06_u:8301: 06,078.022c dhanus tyaktvā śarāṃś caiva pitur eva samīpataḥ
GE07mbh_06_u:8302: 06,078.023a hataṃ svam ātmajaṃ dṛṣṭvā virāṭaḥ prādravad bhayāt
GE07mbh_06_u:8306: 06,078.025a śikhaṇḍy api mahārāja drauṇim āsādya saṃyuge
GE07mbh_06_u:8307: 06,078.025c ājaghāna bhruvor madhye nārācais tribhir āśugaiḥ
GE07mbh_06_u:8308: 06,078.026a sa babhau naraśārdūlo lalāṭe saṃsthitais tribhiḥ
GE07mbh_06_u:8311: 06,078.027c sūtaṃ dhvajam atho rājaṃs turagān āyudhaṃ tathā
GE07mbh_06_u:8312: 06,078.027e śarair bahubhir uddiśya pātayām āsa saṃyuge
GE07mbh_06_u:8313: 06,078.028a sa hatāśvād avaplutya rathād vai rathināṃ varaḥ
GE07mbh_06_u:8314: 06,078.028c khaḍgam ādāya niśitaṃ vimalaṃ ca śarāvaram
GE07mbh_06_u:8317: 06,078.029c nāntaraṃ dadṛśe drauṇis tad adbhutam ivābhavat
GE07mbh_06_u:8323: 06,078.032c carmācchinad asiṃ cāsya khaṇḍayām āsa saṃyuge
GE07mbh_06_u:8324: 06,078.032e śitaiḥ subahuśo rājaṃs taṃ ca vivyādha patribhiḥ
GE07mbh_06_u:8325: 06,078.033a śikhaṇḍī tu tataḥ khaḍgaṃ khaṇḍitaṃ tena sāyakaiḥ
GE07mbh_06_u:8326: 06,078.033c āvidhya vyasṛjat tūrṇaṃ jvalantam iva pannagam
GE07mbh_06_u:8329: 06,078.034e śikhaṇḍinaṃ ca vivyādha śarair bahubhir āyasaiḥ
GE07mbh_06_u:8330: 06,078.035a śikhaṇḍī tu bhṛśaṃ rājaṃs tāḍyamānaḥ śitaiḥ śaraiḥ
GE07mbh_06_u:8332: 06,078.036a sātyakis tu tataḥ kruddho rākṣasaṃ krūram āhave
GE07mbh_06_u:8333: 06,078.036c alambusaṃ śarair ghorair vivyādha balinaṃ balī
GE07mbh_06_u:8334: 06,078.037a rākṣasendras tatas tasya dhanuś ciccheda bhārata
GE07mbh_06_u:8335: 06,078.037c ardhacandreṇa samare taṃ ca vivyādha sāyakaiḥ
GE07mbh_06_u:8336: 06,078.037e māyāṃ ca rākṣasīṃ kṛtvā śaravarṣair avākirat
GE07mbh_06_u:8339: 06,078.038c nāsaṃbhramad yat samare vadhyamānaḥ śitaiḥ śaraiḥ
GE07mbh_06_u:8340: 06,078.039a aindram astraṃ ca vārṣṇeyo yojayām āsa bhārata
GE07mbh_06_u:8342: 06,078.040a tad astraṃ bhasmasāt kṛtvā māyāṃ tāṃ rākṣasīṃ tadā
GE07mbh_06_u:8345: 06,078.041a tat tathā pīḍitaṃ tena mādhavena mahātmanā
GE07mbh_06_u:8346: 06,078.041c pradudrāva bhayād rakṣo hitvā sātyakim āhave
GE07mbh_06_u:8347: 06,078.042a tam ajeyaṃ rākṣasendraṃ saṃkhye maghavatā api
GE07mbh_06_u:8348: 06,078.042c śaineyaḥ prāṇadaj jitvā yodhānāṃ tava paśyatām
GE07mbh_06_u:8351: 06,078.044a etasminn eva kāle tu drupadasyātmajo balī
GE07mbh_06_u:8355: 06,078.045c vivyathe na ca rājendra tava putro janeśvaraḥ
GE07mbh_06_u:8356: 06,078.046a dhṛṣṭadyumnaṃ ca samare tūrṇaṃ vivyādha sāyakaiḥ
GE07mbh_06_u:8357: 06,078.046c ṣaṣṭyā ca triṃśatā caiva tad adbhutam ivābhavat
GE07mbh_06_u:8358: 06,078.047a tasya senāpatiḥ kruddho dhanuś ciccheda māriṣa
GE07mbh_06_u:8359: 06,078.047c hayāṃś ca caturaḥ śīghraṃ nijaghāna mahārathaḥ

GE07mbh_06_u:8378: 06,078.056c syālasya te mahārāja tava putrasya paśyataḥ
GE07mbh_06_u:8383: 06,079.001c pāṇḍūnāṃ māmakaiḥ sārdham aśrauṣaṃ tava jalpataḥ
GE07mbh_06_u:8384: 06,079.002a na caiva māmakaṃ kaṃ cid dhṛṣṭaṃ śaṃsasi saṃjaya

GE07mbh_06_u:8393: 06,079.006a tathā tat pauruṣaṃ rājaṃs tāvakānāṃ mahātmanām
GE07mbh_06_u:8394: 06,079.006c prāpya pāṇḍusutān vīrān vyarthaṃ bhavati saṃyuge
GE07mbh_06_u:8396: 06,079.007c na doṣeṇa kuruśreṣṭha kauravān gantum arhasi
GE07mbh_06_u:8400: 06,079.009c na hi rakṣanti rājānaḥ sarvārthān nāpi jīvitam
GE07mbh_06_u:8411: 06,079.014a yudhyatāṃ hi tathā rājan viśeṣo na vyadṛśyata

GE07mbh_06_u:8423: 06,079.020a irāvāṃs tu tataḥ kruddho bhrātarau tau mahārathau
GE07mbh_06_u:8428: 06,079.022c pauruṣaṃ khyāpayaṃs tūrṇaṃ vyadhamat tava vāhinīm
GE07mbh_06_u:8430: 06,079.023c vegān bahuvidhāṃś cakre viṣaṃ pītveva mānavaḥ
GE07mbh_06_u:8435: 06,079.026a tatra devāḥ sagandharvā ṛṣayaś ca samāgatāḥ
GE07mbh_06_u:8437: 06,079.027a yathā surapatiḥ śakras trāsayām āsa dānavān
GE07mbh_06_u:8438: 06,079.027c tathaiva samare rājaṃs trāsayām āsa pāṇḍavān
GE07mbh_06_u:8443: 06,079.030a nivṛtteṣu tu pāṇḍūnāṃ punaḥ sainyeṣu bhārata
GE07mbh_06_u:8445: 06,079.030c āsīn niṣṭānako ghoras tava sainyeṣu saṃyuge
GE07mbh_06_u:8447: 06,079.031c śaraiḥ pracchādayām āsa meruṃ girim ivāmbudaḥ
GE07mbh_06_u:8448: 06,079.032a nihatya tāñ śarān rājā rākṣasasya dhanuścyutān
GE07mbh_06_u:8452: 06,079.034a tasya prāgjyotiṣaḥ kruddhas tomarān sa caturdaśa
GE07mbh_06_u:8453: 06,079.034c preṣayām āsa samare tāṃś ca ciccheda rākṣasaḥ
GE07mbh_06_u:8454: 06,079.035a sa tāṃś chittvā mahābāhus tomarān niśitaiḥ śaraiḥ
GE07mbh_06_u:8456: 06,079.036a tataḥ prāgjyotiṣo rājan prahasann iva bhārata
GE07mbh_06_u:8457: 06,079.036c tasyāśvāṃś caturaḥ saṃkhye pātayām āsa sāyakaiḥ
GE07mbh_06_u:8458: 06,079.037a sa hatāśve rathe tiṣṭhan rākṣasendraḥ pratāpavān
GE07mbh_06_u:8461: 06,079.038c tridhā ciccheda nṛpatiḥ sā vyakīryata medinīm
GE07mbh_06_u:8462: 06,079.039a śaktiṃ vinihatāṃ dṛṣṭvā haiḍimbaḥ prādravad bhayāt
GE07mbh_06_u:8464: 06,079.040a taṃ vijitya raṇe śūraṃ vikrāntaṃ khyātapauruṣam
GE07mbh_06_u:8465: 06,079.040c ajeyaṃ samare rājan yamena varuṇena ca
GE07mbh_06_u:8467: 06,079.041c yathā vanagajo rājan mṛdnaṃś carati padminīm
GE07mbh_06_u:8468: 06,079.042a madreśvaras tu samare yamābhyāṃ saha saṃgataḥ
GE07mbh_06_u:8470: 06,079.043a sahadevas tu samare mātulaṃ vīkṣya saṃgatam
GE07mbh_06_u:8473: 06,079.044c tayoś cāpy abhavat prītir atulā mātṛkāraṇāt
GE07mbh_06_u:8475: 06,079.045b*0325_01 dhvajaṃ ciccheda bāṇena dhanuś caikena māriṣa
GE07mbh_06_u:8477: 06,079.045b*0325_03 nijaghāna raṇe taṃ tu sūtaṃ cāsya nyapātayat
GE07mbh_06_u:8478: 06,079.045c aśvān vai caturo rājaṃś caturbhiḥ sāyakottamaiḥ
GE07mbh_06_u:8479: 06,079.045e preṣayām āsa samare yamasya sadanaṃ prati
GE07mbh_06_u:8480: 06,079.046a hatāśvāt tu rathāt tūrṇam avaplutya mahārathaḥ
GE07mbh_06_u:8481: 06,079.046c āruroha tato yānaṃ bhrātur eva yaśasvinaḥ
GE07mbh_06_u:8482: 06,079.047a ekasthau tu raṇe śūrau dṛḍhe vikṣipya kārmuke
GE07mbh_06_u:8486: 06,079.048e prahasann iva tāṃ cāpi śaravṛṣṭiṃ jaghāna ha
GE07mbh_06_u:8487: 06,079.048f*0326_01 pṛṣatkānāṃ sahasrāṇi prahasann iva tāv api
GE07mbh_06_u:8488: 06,079.048f*0326_02 sṛjan rurodha samare megho vṛṣṭyā yathācalam
GE07mbh_06_u:8489: 06,079.049a sahadevas tataḥ kruddhaḥ śaram udyamya vīryavān
GE07mbh_06_u:8491: 06,079.050a sa śaraḥ preṣitas tena garutmān iva vegavān
GE07mbh_06_u:8494: 06,079.051c niṣasāda mahārāja kaśmalaṃ ca jagāma ha
GE07mbh_06_u:8495: 06,079.052a taṃ visaṃjñaṃ nipatitaṃ sūtaḥ saṃprekṣya saṃyuge
GE07mbh_06_u:8498: 06,079.053c sarve vimanaso bhūtvā nedam astīty acintayan
GE07mbh_06_u:8501: 06,079.055a abhidudruvatur hṛṣṭau tava sainyaṃ viśāṃ pate
GE07mbh_06_u:8504: 06,080.001a tato yudhiṣṭhiro rājā madhyaṃ prāpte divākare
GE07mbh_06_u:8508: 06,080.003a sa saṃvārya raṇe rājā preṣitān dharmasūnunā
GE07mbh_06_u:8510: 06,080.004a te tasya kavacaṃ bhittvā papuḥ śoṇitam āhave
GE07mbh_06_u:8511: 06,080.004c asūn iva vicinvanto dehe tasya mahātmanaḥ
GE07mbh_06_u:8512: 06,080.005a pāṇḍavas tu bhṛśaṃ viddhas tena rājñā mahātmanā
GE07mbh_06_u:8515: 06,080.006c rathaśreṣṭho rathāt tūrṇaṃ bhūmau pārtho nyapātayat
GE07mbh_06_u:8516: 06,080.007a ketuṃ nipatitaṃ dṛṣṭvā śrutāyuḥ sa tu pārthivaḥ
GE07mbh_06_u:8517: 06,080.007c pāṇḍavaṃ viśikhais tīkṣṇai rājan vivyādha saptabhiḥ
GE07mbh_06_u:8519: 06,080.008c yathā yugānte bhūtāni dhakṣyann iva hutāśanaḥ
GE07mbh_06_u:8521: 06,080.009c pravivyathur mahārāja vyākulaṃ cāpy abhūj jagat
GE07mbh_06_u:8522: 06,080.010a sarveṣāṃ caiva bhūtānām idam āsīn manogatam
GE07mbh_06_u:8523: 06,080.010c trīṃl lokān adya saṃkruddho nṛpo 'yaṃ dhakṣyatīti vai
GE07mbh_06_u:8524: 06,080.011a ṛṣayaś caiva devāś ca cakruḥ svastyayanaṃ mahat
GE07mbh_06_u:8525: 06,080.011c lokānāṃ nṛpa śāntyarthaṃ krodhite pāṇḍave tadā
GE07mbh_06_u:8528: 06,080.013a tataḥ sarvāṇi sainyāni tāvakāni viśāṃ pate
GE07mbh_06_u:8529: 06,080.013c nirāśāny abhavaṃs tatra jīvitaṃ prati bhārata
GE07mbh_06_u:8530: 06,080.014a sa tu dhairyeṇa taṃ kopaṃ saṃnivārya mahāyaśāḥ
GE07mbh_06_u:8534: 06,080.016a satvaraṃ caraṇe rājaṃs tasya vāhān mahātmanaḥ
GE07mbh_06_u:8535: 06,080.016c nijaghāna śaraiḥ kṣipraṃ sūtaṃ ca sumahābalaḥ
GE07mbh_06_u:8536: 06,080.017a hatāśvaṃ tu rathaṃ tyaktvā dṛṣṭvā rājñas tu pauruṣam
GE07mbh_06_u:8541: 06,080.019c vyāttānano yathā kālas tava sainyaṃ jaghāna ha
GE07mbh_06_u:8542: 06,080.020a cekitānas tu vārṣṇeyo gautamaṃ rathināṃ varam
GE07mbh_06_u:8544: 06,080.021a saṃnivārya śarāṃs tāṃs tu kṛpaḥ śāradvato yudhi
GE07mbh_06_u:8545: 06,080.021c cekitānaṃ raṇe yattaṃ rājan vivyādha patribhiḥ
GE07mbh_06_u:8548: 06,080.022e hayāṃś cāsyāvadhīd rājann ubhau ca pārṣṇisārathī
GE07mbh_06_u:8549: 06,080.023a so 'vaplutya rathāt tūrṇaṃ gadāṃ jagrāha sātvataḥ
GE07mbh_06_u:8550: 06,080.023c sa tayā vīraghātinyā gadayā gadināṃ varaḥ
GE07mbh_06_u:8551: 06,080.023e gautamasya hayān hatvā sārathiṃ ca nyapātayat
GE07mbh_06_u:8552: 06,080.024a bhūmiṣṭho gautamas tasya śarāṃś cikṣepa ṣoḍaśa
GE07mbh_06_u:8553: 06,080.024c te śarāḥ sātvataṃ bhittvā prāviśanta dharātalam
GE07mbh_06_u:8554: 06,080.025a cekitānas tataḥ kruddhaḥ punaś cikṣepa tāṃ gadām
GE07mbh_06_u:8558: 06,080.027a cekitānas tataḥ khaḍgaṃ kośād uddhṛtya bhārata
GE07mbh_06_u:8570: 06,080.032a tathaiva śakuniḥ śūraḥ syālas tava viśāṃ pate
GE07mbh_06_u:8571: 06,080.032c āropayad rathaṃ tūrṇaṃ gautamaṃ rathināṃ varam
GE07mbh_06_u:8573: 06,080.033c navatyā sāyakaiḥ kṣipraṃ rājan vivyādha vakṣasi
GE07mbh_06_u:8574: 06,080.034a saumadattir uraḥsthais tair bhṛśaṃ bāṇair aśobhata
GE07mbh_06_u:8580: 06,080.037a sa ca taṃ ratham utsṛjya dhṛṣṭaketur mahāmanāḥ
GE07mbh_06_u:8582: 06,080.038a citraseno vikarṇaś ca rājan durmarṣaṇas tathā
GE07mbh_06_u:8584: 06,080.039a abhimanyos tatas tais tu ghoraṃ yuddham avartata
GE07mbh_06_u:8586: 06,080.040a virathāṃs tava putrāṃs tu kṛtvā rājan mahāhave
GE07mbh_06_u:8587: 06,080.040c na jaghāna naravyāghraḥ smaran bhīmavacas tadā
GE07mbh_06_u:8589: 06,080.041c saṃvṛtaṃ samare bhīṣmaṃ devair api durāsadam
GE07mbh_06_u:8590: 06,080.042a prayāntaṃ śīghram udvīkṣya paritrātuṃ sutāṃs tava
GE07mbh_06_u:8594: 06,080.043c ete hi bahavaḥ śūrāḥ kṛtāstrā yuddhadurmadāḥ
GE07mbh_06_u:8595: 06,080.043e yathā na hanyur naḥ senāṃ tathā mādhava codaya
GE07mbh_06_u:8598: 06,080.044c rathaṃ śvetahayair yuktaṃ preṣayām āsa saṃyuge
GE07mbh_06_u:8599: 06,080.045a niṣṭānako mahān āsīt tava sainyasya māriṣa
GE07mbh_06_u:8600: 06,080.045c yad arjuno raṇe kruddhaḥ saṃyātas tāvakān prati
GE07mbh_06_u:8601: 06,080.046a samāsādya tu kaunteyo rājñas tān bhīṣmarakṣiṇaḥ
GE07mbh_06_u:8602: 06,080.046c suśarmāṇam atho rājann idaṃ vacanam abravīt
GE07mbh_06_u:8603: 06,080.047a jānāmi tvāṃ yudhi śreṣṭham atyantaṃ pūrvavairiṇam
GE07mbh_06_u:8604: 06,080.047b*0328_01 tatas tvaṃ samare yoddhuṃ rājabhir bahubhir vṛtaḥ
GE07mbh_06_u:8609: 06,080.048e na cainam abravīt kiṃ cic chubhaṃ vā yadi vāśubham
GE07mbh_06_u:8610: 06,080.049a abhi gatvārjunaṃ vīraṃ rājabhir bahubhir vṛtaḥ
GE07mbh_06_u:8611: 06,080.049c purastāt pṛṣṭhataś caiva pārśvataś caiva sarvataḥ
GE07mbh_06_u:8613: 06,080.050c śaraiḥ saṃchādayām āsa meghair iva divākaram
GE07mbh_06_u:8615: 06,080.051c tāvakānāṃ ca samare pāṇḍavānāṃ ca bhārata
GE07mbh_06_u:8617: 06,081.001a sa tudyamānas tu śarair dhanaṃjayaḥ; padā hato nāga iva śvasan balī
GE07mbh_06_u:8618: 06,081.001c bāṇena bāṇena mahārathānāṃ; ciccheda cāpāni raṇe prasahya
GE07mbh_06_u:8619: 06,081.002a saṃchidya cāpāni ca tāni rājñāṃ; teṣāṃ raṇe vīryavatāṃ kṣaṇena
GE07mbh_06_u:8620: 06,081.002c vivyādha bāṇair yugapan mahātmā; niḥśeṣatāṃ teṣv atha manyamānaḥ
GE07mbh_06_u:8621: 06,081.003a nipetur ājau rudhirapradigdhās; te tāḍitāḥ śakrasutena rājan

GE07mbh_06_u:8624: 06,081.004c dṛṣṭvā hatāṃs tān yudhi rājaputrāṃs; trigartarājaḥ prayayau kṣaṇena
GE07mbh_06_u:8625: 06,081.005a teṣāṃ rathānām atha pṛṣṭhagopā; dvātriṃśad anye 'byapatanta pārtham
GE07mbh_06_u:8626: 06,081.005c tathaiva te saṃparivārya pārthaṃ; vikṛṣya cāpāni mahāravāṇi
GE07mbh_06_u:8627: 06,081.005e avīvṛṣan bāṇamahaughavṛṣṭyā; yathā giriṃ toyadharā jalaughaiḥ
GE07mbh_06_u:8628: 06,081.006a saṃpīḍyamānas tu śaraughavṛṣṭyā; dhanaṃjayas tān yudhi jātaroṣaḥ
GE07mbh_06_u:8629: 06,081.006c ṣaṣṭyā śaraiḥ saṃyati tailadhautair; jaghāna tān apy atha pṛṣṭhagopān
GE07mbh_06_u:8630: 06,081.007a ṣaṣṭiṃ rathāṃs tān avajitya saṃkhye; dhanaṃjayaḥ prītamanā yaśasvī
GE07mbh_06_u:8631: 06,081.007c athātvarad bhīṣmavadhāya jiṣṇur; balāni rājñāṃ samare nihatya
GE07mbh_06_u:8632: 06,081.008a trigartarājo nihatān samīkṣya; mahārathāṃs tān atha bandhuvargān
GE07mbh_06_u:8633: 06,081.008c raṇe puraskṛtya narādhipāṃs tāñ; jagāma pārthaṃ tvarito vadhāya
GE07mbh_06_u:8634: 06,081.009a abhidrutaṃ cāstrabhṛtāṃ variṣṭhaṃ; dhanaṃjayaṃ vīkṣya śikhaṇḍimukhyāḥ
GE07mbh_06_u:8635: 06,081.009c abhyudyayus te śitaśastrahastā; rirakṣiṣanto ratham arjunasya
GE07mbh_06_u:8636: 06,081.010a pārtho 'pi tān āpatataḥ samīkṣya; trigartarājñā sahitān nṛvīrān
GE07mbh_06_u:8637: 06,081.010c vidhvaṃsayitvā samare dhanuṣmān; gāṇḍīvamuktair niśitaiḥ pṛṣatkaiḥ
GE07mbh_06_u:8638: 06,081.010e bhīṣmaṃ yiyāsur yudhi saṃdadarśa; duryodhanaṃ saindhavādīṃś ca rājñaḥ
GE07mbh_06_u:8639: 06,081.011a āvārayiṣṇūn abhisaṃprayāya; muhūrtam āyodhya balena vīraḥ
GE07mbh_06_u:8640: 06,081.011c utsṛjya rājānam anantavīryo; jayadrathādīṃś ca nṛpān mahaujāḥ
GE07mbh_06_u:8641: 06,081.011e yayau tato bhīmabalo manasvī; gāṅgeyam ājau śaracāpapāṇiḥ
GE07mbh_06_u:8646: 06,081.012a yudhiṣṭhiraś cograbalo mahātmā; samāyayau tvarito jātakopaḥ
GE07mbh_06_u:8647: 06,081.012c madrādhipaṃ samabhityajya saṃkhye; svabhāgam āptaṃ tam anantakīrtiḥ
GE07mbh_06_u:8648: 06,081.012e sārdhaṃ sa mādrīsutabhīmasenair; bhīṣmaṃ yayau śāṃtanavaṃ raṇāya
GE07mbh_06_u:8649: 06,081.013a taiḥ saṃprayuktaḥ sa mahārathāgryair; gaṅgāsutaḥ samare citrayodhī
GE07mbh_06_u:8650: 06,081.013c na vivyathe śāṃtanavo mahātmā; samāgataiḥ pāṇḍusutaiḥ samastaiḥ
GE07mbh_06_u:8651: 06,081.014a athaitya rājā yudhi satyasaṃdho; jayadratho 'tyugrabalo manasvī
GE07mbh_06_u:8652: 06,081.014c ciccheda cāpāni mahārathānāṃ; prasahya teṣāṃ dhanuṣā vareṇa
GE07mbh_06_u:8653: 06,081.015a yudhiṣṭhiraṃ bhīmasenaṃ yamau ca; pārthaṃ tathā yudhi saṃjātakopaḥ
GE07mbh_06_u:8654: 06,081.015c duryodhanaḥ krodhaviṣo mahātmā; jaghāna bāṇair analaprakāśaiḥ
GE07mbh_06_u:8655: 06,081.016a kṛpeṇa śalyena śalena caiva; tathā vibho citrasenena cājau
GE07mbh_06_u:8658: 06,081.016c viddhāḥ śarais te 'tivivṛddhakopair; devā yathā daityagaṇaiḥ sametaiḥ
GE07mbh_06_u:8659: 06,081.017a chinnāyudhaṃ śāṃtanavena rājā; śikhaṇḍinaṃ prekṣya ca jātakopaḥ
GE07mbh_06_u:8660: 06,081.017c ajātaśatruḥ samare mahātmā; śikhaṇḍinaṃ kruddha uvāca vākyam
GE07mbh_06_u:8661: 06,081.018a uktvā tathā tvaṃ pitur agrato mām; ahaṃ haniṣyāmi mahāvrataṃ tam

GE07mbh_06_u:12242: 06,112.053a arjunaḥ prāpya gāṅgeyaṃ pīḍayan niśitaiḥ śaraiḥ
GE07mbh_06_u:12243: 06,112.053c abhyadravata saṃyattaṃ vane mattam iva dvipam

GE07mbh_06_u:12268: 06,112.066a yathā hi sumahān agniḥ kakṣe carati sānilaḥ

GE07mbh_06_u:12280: 06,112.072a nirmanuṣyān rathān rājan suyuktāñ javanair hayaiḥ

GE07mbh_06_u:12291: 06,112.077a na kaś cid enaṃ samare pratyudyāti mahārathaḥ
GE07mbh_06_u:12294: 06,112.078a śikhaṇḍī tu raṇe bhīṣmam āsādya bharatarṣabha
GE07mbh_06_u:12298: 06,112.080a strītvaṃ tat saṃsmaran rājan sarvalokasya paśyataḥ
GE07mbh_06_u:12299: 06,112.080c na jaghāna raṇe bhīṣmaḥ sa ca taṃ nāvabuddhavān

GE07mbh_06_u:13037: 06,116.035c sa śeṣyate vai nihataś cirāya; śāstrātigo bhīmabalābhibhūtaḥ
GE07mbh_06_u:13038: 06,116.036a tataḥ śrutvā tad vacaḥ kauravendro; duryodhano dīnamanā babhūva
GE07mbh_06_u:13039: 06,116.036c tam abravīc chāṃtanavo 'bhivīkṣya; nibodha rājan bhava vītamanyuḥ
GE07mbh_06_u:13040: 06,116.037a dṛṣṭaṃ duryodhanedaṃ te yathā pārthena dhīmatā
GE07mbh_06_u:13042: 06,116.037e etasya kartā loke 'smin nānyaḥ kaś cana vidyate
GE07mbh_06_u:13043: 06,116.038a āgneyaṃ vāruṇaṃ saumyaṃ vāyavyam atha vaiṣṇavam
GE07mbh_06_u:13045: 06,116.038e dhātus tvaṣṭuś ca savitur divyāny astrāṇi sarvaśaḥ
GE07mbh_06_u:13046: 06,116.039a sarvasmin mānuṣe loke vetty eko hi dhanaṃjayaḥ
GE07mbh_06_u:13047: 06,116.039c kṛṣṇo vā devakīputro nānyo vai veda kaś cana
GE07mbh_06_u:13048: 06,116.039e na śakyāḥ pāṇḍavās tāta yuddhe jetuṃ kathaṃ cana
GE07mbh_06_u:13051: 06,116.040e kṛtinā samare rājan saṃdhis te tāta yujyatām
GE07mbh_06_u:13053: 06,116.041c tāvat pārthena śūreṇa saṃdhis te tāta yujyatām
GE07mbh_06_u:13054: 06,116.042a yāvac camūṃ na te śeṣāṃ śaraiḥ saṃnataparvabhiḥ
GE07mbh_06_u:13055: 06,116.042c nāśayaty arjunas tāvat saṃdhis te tāta yujyatām
GE07mbh_06_u:13057: 06,116.043c nṛpāś ca bahavo rājaṃs tāvat saṃdhiḥ prayujyatām
GE07mbh_06_u:13058: 06,116.044a na nirdahati te yāvat krodhadīptekṣaṇaś camūm
GE07mbh_06_u:13059: 06,116.044c yudhiṣṭhiro hi tāvad vai saṃdhis te tāta yujyatām
GE07mbh_06_u:13060: 06,116.045a nakulaḥ sahadevaś ca bhīmasenaś ca pāṇḍavaḥ
GE07mbh_06_u:13061: 06,116.045b*0500_01 yāvat kṣatraṃ na nighnanti tāvat saṃdhir vidhīyatām
GE07mbh_06_u:13062: 06,116.045c yāvac camūṃ mahārāja nāśayanti na sarvaśaḥ
GE07mbh_06_u:13063: 06,116.045e tāvat te pāṇḍavaiḥ sārdhaṃ saubhrātraṃ tāta rocatām
GE07mbh_06_u:13064: 06,116.046a yuddhaṃ madantam evāstu tāta saṃśāmya pāṇḍavaiḥ
GE07mbh_06_u:13065: 06,116.046c etat te rocatāṃ vākyaṃ yad ukto 'si mayānagha
GE07mbh_06_u:13066: 06,116.046e etat kṣemam ahaṃ manye tava caiva kulasya ca
GE07mbh_06_u:13067: 06,116.047a tyaktvā manyum upaśāmyasva pārthaiḥ; paryāptam etad yat kṛtaṃ phalgunena
GE07mbh_06_u:13068: 06,116.047c bhīṣmasyāntād astu vaḥ sauhṛdaṃ vā; saṃpraśleṣaḥ sādhu rājan prasīda
GE07mbh_06_u:13070: 06,116.048c mā mitradhruk pārthivānāṃ jaghanyaḥ; pāpāṃ kīrtiṃ prāpsyase kauravendra
GE07mbh_06_u:13071: 06,116.049a mamāvasānāc chāntir astu prajānāṃ; saṃgacchantāṃ pārthivāḥ prītimantaḥ
GE07mbh_06_u:13072: 06,116.049c pitā putraṃ mātulaṃ bhāgineyo; bhrātā caiva bhrātaraṃ praitu rājan
GE07mbh_06_u:13073: 06,116.050a na ced evaṃ prāptakālaṃ vaco me; mohāviṣṭaḥ pratipatsyasy abuddhyā
GE07mbh_06_u:13076: 06,116.050c bhīṣmasyāntād etadantāḥ stha sarve; satyām etāṃ bhāratīm īrayāmi
GE07mbh_06_u:13080: 06,116.051a etad vākyaṃ sauhṛdād āpageyo; madhye rājñāṃ bhārataṃ śrāvayitvā
GE07mbh_06_u:13081: 06,116.051c tūṣṇīm āsīc chalyasaṃtaptamarmā; yatvātmānaṃ vedanāṃ saṃnigṛhya
GE07mbh_06_u:13083: 06,116.051d*0503_02 nārocayata putras te mumūrṣur iva bheṣajam
GE07mbh_06_u:13085: 06,117.001a tatas te pārthivāḥ sarve jagmuḥ svān ālayān punaḥ
GE07mbh_06_u:13087: 06,117.002a śrutvā tu nihataṃ bhīṣmaṃ rādheyaḥ puruṣarṣabhaḥ
GE07mbh_06_u:13091: 06,117.004a nimīlitākṣaṃ taṃ vīraṃ sāśrukaṇṭhas tadā vṛṣaḥ
GE07mbh_06_u:13092: 06,117.004b*0504_01 bhīṣma bhīṣma mahābāho ity uvāca mahādyutiḥ
GE07mbh_06_u:13095: 06,117.005c dveṣyo 'tyantam anāgāḥ sann iti cainam uvāca ha
GE07mbh_06_u:13096: 06,117.006a tac chrutvā kuruvṛddhaḥ sa balāt saṃvṛttalocanaḥ
GE07mbh_06_u:13097: 06,117.006c śanair udvīkṣya sasneham idaṃ vacanam abravīt
GE07mbh_06_u:13098: 06,117.007a rahitaṃ dhiṣṇyam ālokya samutsārya ca rakṣiṇaḥ
GE07mbh_06_u:13100: 06,117.008a ehy ehi me vipratīpa spardhase tvaṃ mayā saha
GE07mbh_06_u:13101: 06,117.008c yadi māṃ nābhigacchethā na te śreyo bhaved dhruvam
GE07mbh_06_u:13102: 06,117.009a kaunteyas tvaṃ na rādheyo vidito nāradān mama
GE07mbh_06_u:13105: 06,117.009c kṛṣṇadvaipāyanāc caiva keśavāc ca na saṃśayaḥ
GE07mbh_06_u:13106: 06,117.010a na ca dveṣo 'sti me tāta tvayi satyaṃ bravīmi te
GE07mbh_06_u:13108: 06,117.011a akasmāt pāṇḍavān hi tvaṃ dviṣasīti matir mama
GE07mbh_06_u:13110: 06,117.011d*0506_01 jāto 'si dharmalopena tatas te buddhir īdṛśī
GE07mbh_06_u:13113: 06,117.012a jānāmi samare vīryaṃ śatrubhir duḥsahaṃ tava
GE07mbh_06_u:13114: 06,117.012c brahmaṇyatāṃ ca śauryaṃ ca dāne ca paramāṃ gatim
GE07mbh_06_u:13115: 06,117.013a na tvayā sadṛśaḥ kaś cit puruṣeṣv amaropama
GE07mbh_06_u:13116: 06,117.013c kulabhedaṃ ca matvāhaṃ sadā paruṣam uktavān
GE07mbh_06_u:13121: 06,117.016a tathā ca balavān rājā jarāsaṃdho durāsadaḥ
GE07mbh_06_u:13125: 06,117.018a vyapanīto 'dya manyur me yas tvāṃ prati purā kṛtaḥ
GE07mbh_06_u:13128: 06,117.019c saṃgaccha tair mahābāho mama ced icchasi priyam
GE07mbh_06_u:13132: 06,117.021a jānāmy ahaṃ mahāprājña sarvam etan na saṃśayaḥ
GE07mbh_06_u:13133: 06,117.021c yathā vadasi durdharṣa kaunteyo 'haṃ na sūtajaḥ
GE07mbh_06_u:13134: 06,117.022a avakīrṇas tv ahaṃ kuntyā sūtena ca vivardhitaḥ
GE07mbh_06_u:13135: 06,117.022c bhuktvā duryodhanaiśvaryaṃ na mithyā kartum utsahe
GE07mbh_06_u:13137: 06,117.023a vasu caiva śarīraṃ ca yad udāraṃ tathā yaśaḥ
GE07mbh_06_u:13141: 06,117.023f*0509_01 mā caitad vyādhimaraṇaṃ kṣatraṃ syād iti kaurava
GE07mbh_06_u:13142: 06,117.024a avaśyabhāvī vai yo 'rtho na sa śakyo nivartitum
GE07mbh_06_u:13146: 06,117.026a pāṇḍavā vāsudevaś ca viditā mama sarvaśaḥ
GE07mbh_06_u:13147: 06,117.026c ajeyāḥ puruṣair anyair iti tāṃś cotsahāmahe
GE07mbh_06_u:13148: 06,117.026d*0510_01 vijayiṣye raṇe pāṇḍūn iti me niścitaṃ matam
GE07mbh_06_u:13149: 06,117.026d*0510_02 na cec chakyam avasraṣṭuṃ vairam etat sudāruṇam
GE07mbh_06_u:13152: 06,117.027a anujānīṣva māṃ tāta yuddhe prītamanāḥ sadā
GE07mbh_06_u:13153: 06,117.027c anujñātas tvayā vīra yudhyeyam iti me matiḥ
GE07mbh_06_u:13154: 06,117.028a duruktaṃ vipratīpaṃ vā saṃrambhāc cāpalāt tathā
GE07mbh_06_u:13155: 06,117.028c yan mayāpakṛtaṃ kiṃ cit tad anukṣantum arhasi
GE07mbh_06_u:13157: 06,117.029a na cec chakyam athotsraṣṭuṃ vairam etat sudāruṇam
GE07mbh_06_u:13159: 06,117.030a vimanyur gatasaṃrambhaḥ kuru karma nṛpasya hi
GE07mbh_06_u:13161: 06,117.031a ahaṃ tvām anujānāmi yad icchasi tad āpnuhi
GE07mbh_06_u:13164: 06,117.032c dharmo hi yuddhāc chreyo 'nyat kṣatriyasya na vidyate
GE07mbh_06_u:13165: 06,117.033a praśame hi kṛto yatnaḥ sucirāt suciraṃ mayā
GE07mbh_06_u:13166: 06,117.033c na caiva śakitaḥ kartuṃ yato dharmas tato jayaḥ
GE07mbh_06_u:13168: 06,117.034a evaṃ bruvantaṃ gāṅgeyam abhivādya prasādya ca
GE07mbh_06_u:13169: 06,117.034c rādheyo ratham āruhya prāyāt tava sutaṃ prati
GE07mbh_06_u:13170: 06,117.034d*0512_01 ya idaṃ śṛṇuyād bhaktyā bhīṣmaparva mahādbhutam

GE07mbh_06_u:13178: 06,117.034d*0512_09 bhīṣmaparva idaṃ śrutvā pūjayed yas tu vācakam
